title: (Vuka mphefumulo wami)
lyrics:
Vuka mphefumulo wami Njengelanga vuka nawe Njengelanga yenza namhla Wonke umsebenzi wakho.
Sekuqal' oluny' usuku Kumbe kungolokuphela Hamba namhla ngokungathi Ungeb' usavuka ngomso.
Ningalali ubuthongo Sekusile vuka phansi Mayenyuke inhliziyo Ngokubonga nokucela.
Njengokuthi ngangomuso Singebekho isikhathi Sokuzilungisa kahle Ukubon' inkosi yakho.

Ngokwempela kufanele Ucabang' okuhle namhla Onk' amazwi abe mahle Kebe kuhl' ukwenza kwakho.


Ngokukhanya kwaphezulu Khanya nawe njalo njalo Ukhanyise abakuwe
Uye nabo ezulwini.

Makabonw' uNkulunkulu Yena osibusisayo Makabongwe yikho konke Okudatshuliwe nguye. Amen

title: (Enyaweni zeNkosi)
lyrics:
Enyaweni zeNkosi Sethula lolusuku Singakwazi nakunye Okuzosivelela Kristu malubusiswe
Lib' ilanga elingcwele.

Nxa liletha inhlanhla Siyokubonga Nkosi Nxa lileth' inhlupheko Kunani nxa uvuma?
Kodwa Baba sicela Ukungoni nanamhla.


Thina sibon' ingxenye Yesiyikho neyempi Wena Nkosi uyazi Nokuzosilimaza
Uze ungasishiyi Usimelele njalo.

Sithanda izwi lakho Lon' esihamba ngalo Sizinikela kuwe
Uba sikulalele
Konk' okuphuma kithi Kwamukeleke kuwe.

Nkosi siyakucela Ub' usiphe inhlanhla Yokubanhliziyonye
Sigcwel' uthando lwakho Uze udumiseke
Kristu malanga onke. Amen

title: (Wen' okhanyis' iZulu)
lyrics:
Wen' okhanyis' iZulu Kristu, okhanya wedwa Phuma, Langa ukhanye Uxhoshe ubumnyama Kristu, Ndonsa yokusa Khanya phakathi kwami.

Lumnyama lolusuku Ofihlakele ngalo Ukwethaba akukho Ingekh' imsebe yakho Khanya ufudumeze Lenhliziywana yami.

Hambel' umoya wami Uxoshe kuw' isono Kugcwal' ikloba lakho Kuphel' ukungakholwa Zembule kuwo njalo Namanje naphakade. Amen

title: (Ilanga likhanya)
lyrics:
Ilanga likhanya Siyacela, Baba Khanyisa izinhliziyo Sihol' endleleni.

Beka kude nathi Zonk' izint' ezimbi Uqondise izilimi Uvus' inhliziyo.

Sizulelw' isitha Esisizondayo
Vala iminyango Nkosi Esingena ngayo.
Konk' okubonwayo Nokungabonwayo Kudumisa kungaphezi Kuhubela wena.

Masikudumise Ngomsebenzi wethu Siwuqala ngezwi lakho Sethemb' ubabalo. Amen

title: (E! iLanga Liphumile)
lyrics:
E! iLanga Liphumile Linomsebenzi walo Wokuxhosha ubumnyama Ngokukhanyisa kwalo.

Manje lisikhanyisela Lenza sibone konke Futhi liyathokozisa Ngokusisiza kwalo.
Izwi likaBaba wethu Liyafana nelanga Ngokuxosha ukungazi Ngokukhanyisa kwalo.
Siyakhanyiselwa yilo Enhliziyweni zethu Lisithokozisa njalo Ngobalo ubumnandi.

Baba izwi malihlale Enhliziyweni zethu Lisheshe lifinyelele Nasemhlabeni wonke.
Baze bakubonge bonke Yise nawe Ndodana
Kanye nawe Moy' oNgcwele Unkulunkulu munye. Amen

title: (Ngalolusuku Nkosi)
lyrics:
Ngalolusuku Nkosi Masikusebenzele Fundisa imilomo Ukukhulum' okuhle.

Konke esizokwenza Makuthandeke kuwe Sifeze ngokwenama Yok' imidanti yethu.

Zisobala kuwena Zonk' izindlela zethu Sikhumbuze njalonje Ukuth' uyasibona.

Siph' ubabalo Nkosi Lokuthwala ijoka Sikhuleke silinde Silungela ukufa.
Siphe amandla Nkosi Okudela okubi
Size samukeleke Laph' ukhon' ezulwini.

Mawudunyiswe Baba Mdali wezinto zonke NoJesu uNdodana
NoMoya oyiNgcwele. Amen

title: (Baba Siyawazi)
lyrics:
Baba Siyawazi Umsebenzi wakho
Wenz' umhlaba wenz' izulu Wenz' izinto zonke.

Wasebenza njalo Awuphumulanga Wasebenza wawuqeda Lomsebenzi wonke.

Usibiza Namhla Size sisebenze
Selekele ngomsa wakho Ngokusiph' inhlanhla.

Sifundise njalo Sikusebenzele
Ngakho konk' esikwenzayo Ngokwamandla ethu.

Masikukhumbule Ngezikhathi zonke Sisobala kuwe noma Singabonwa muntu.

Labo abakhona Endaweni yakho Bayothokoziswa nguwe Bekubona wena.
Senze sisebenze Sisesemhlabeni
Size sihlangane nabo Ekuphumuleni. Amen

title: (Igama likaNkulunkulu)
lyrics:
Igama likaNkulunkulu silidumisa Sibonge ubuthong' obuhl' esibutholile.

Kuyasijabulis' ukus' esikubonayo Sizinikel' eNkosini, sib' abantu bayo.

Sicela Nkos' usiqinis' inhliziyo zethu Ukuba silalele wena, sikhonze kahle.

Ukuz' ezintweni zonke esizakuzenza
Sandis' udumo lwakho, Nkosi, ngay' uMsindisi.

Kadunyisw' Unkulunkulu kanye neNdodana Naye uMoya Ongcwele, manje naphakade. Amen


                 9. (a) Baba Wethu Baba wethu obongwayo
Nkulunkul' umlondolozi Ilanga seliphumile Ngokukhanya kwal' okuhle

Vikel' izilimi zethu Ekonakaleni konke Ngay' uJesu oyindlela Neqiniso nokuphila
Nezilingo nxa zifika Sizehlule ngezwi lakho NjengoJesu wazinqoba Ngezwi lakhw' elinamandla

Masinqobe zonk' izitha Ezisinyonyobelayo Sibheke kuy' umSindisi Inkos' esinqobisayo.
Makube kuwe udumo Yise naye uNdodana Benay' uMoya oNgcwele
Nkulunkulu Munye njalo. Amen


                 9.(b) Lusha njalo Lush njalo loluthando
Olusivusa silele Siphephisw' ezingozini Siphiliswe ngalamandla.

Musha lomsa nsuku zonke Usihaqa sikhuleka Sithethelelwe izono Kuvuk' ithemba ngezulu.

Sengath' ingqondo namhlanje Ingafuna wena njalo
Izuz' ingceb' engethengwe Kube ngumnikelo kuwe.

Ezidingweni zosuku Uyosiph' esingenakho Simlandele sizidele Sisondezwe eNkosini.

Ngalo lodw' uthando lwakho Silungiselel' izulu
Sisize nsukuzonke la
Sihlale ngokukhuleka. Amen
                 10 (Yizwa Baba) Yizwa Baba wethu
Usizwe Nkosi Usihole namhla Ngayo indlela Usibheke njalo Nxa sihambayo Usilondoloze Ngomusa wakho.
Baba wethu thuma Izingelosi Zisilethe kuwe Lapho ukhona Zisilondoloze Ezingozini Esihamba kuzo Uzusigcine.

Nkosi masihambe Ngokuthokoza Size embusweni Umbuso wakho Sidumise wena Inkosi yethu Ngezikhathi zonke
Kubephakade. Amen


             11 (O'Mbusi Onamandla) O'Mbusi onamandla
O Nkosi yeqiniso Ukuohenduka konke Kuvela kuwe Nkosi.

Uwen' owenz' okuba Kukhanye ekuseni Kushise nasemini Kwenziwa nguwe konke.

Bhubhisa konk' okubi Okuphakathi kwethu Noma kuhkon' inkani Nezinkanuk' ezimbi.
Sindisa imizimba Thulis' izinhliziyo Usiphe lokh' okuhle Esingephiwe muntu.
Akube njalo Nkosi Okhona njalonjalo Uyise neNdodana
NoMoya oyiNgcwele. Amen.

title: (Wen' Ongaphendukiyo)
lyrics:
Wen' ongaphendukiyo Ophendulayo konke Ilanga liyaphuma Litshone ngezwi lakho.

Usiphe lelo Langa Elingayikushona Ukuba sesifile Sihlale kahle njalo.

Akube njalo Nkosi Okhona njalonjalo Uyise neNdondana
NoMoya oyiNgcwele. Amen

title: (Siyaphuma Namhla Nkosi)
lyrics:
Siyaphuma namhla Nkosi Senz' umsebenzi wethu Sesifuna ukukhonza Wen' ezintweni zonke Mawenziwe ngezwi lakho Umsebenzi wethu.

Lokho osiyaleleyo Massikwenze kuphele Sibhekile kuwe njalo Siwugcin' uphelele
Wonk' umthetho wakho Nkosi Ngenhliziyo yakho yonke.

Masihambe ngezwi lakho Silinde ngomkhuleko Sizilungisele izulu Sisahamb' emhlabeni Ngalusizo lwakho Nkosi Ngezikhathi zonke.

Baba masikhonze wena Ngakh' osinika khona Uma sesiqede lapha Size sihlale nawe Embusweni wakho njalo Wena oyiNkosi. Amen

        14 (Ilanga Seliphumile) Ilanga seliphumile
Sizithoba phambi kwakho Khanyis' izindlela zethu Wen' okhanyisayo.

Nkosi konk' esikwenzayo Akuvez' udumo lwakho Sandulele nxa siqala Noma sesiqeda.

Namhla masiyeke konke Okub' emehlweni akho Akubuse iqiniso Kubuse nothando.

Laph' usuku selwedlule Sobanakh' ukuphumula Wena ongaphumuliyo Uzusivikele.

Siyabonga wena Baba Nawe Jesu Indodana Nawe Moya oyiNgcwele Kube naphakade. Amen


          15 (Nkosi yethu Ngezwi Lakho) Nkosi yethu Ngezwi Lakho
Ilanga seliphumile Ligiya njengaliqhawe Ligijima njalo.



Masikhanye njengelanga Senze okufaneleyo Sijabule siqiniswe Ukukhanya kwakho.
Izimemezelo zakho Ziyasitshengis' indlela Zisiyala ngokulunga Owakwethembisa.
Nxa siduka sibuyise Thethelel' izono zethu Ziyabonakala kuwe Nesingazaziyo.


Siyabonga wena Baba Nay' uJesu iNdodana
Kanye nawe Moy' oNgcwele Nkosinye Phakade. Amen




(Wen' Owenz' Izinto Zonke)

Wen' Owenz' Izinto Zonke Ongozeli
Osisebenzis' emini Siza manje Masilindw' izingelosi Sivikelwe ebubini Nkosi silalise kahle Ebusuku.


Londoloz' abantu bakho Njalonjalo
Sibe sesandleni sakho Ekufeni
Nxa sibizwe yicilongo Ungamuki kithi Nkosi Kodwa senyusele kuwe Ophezulu. Amen

title: (Usuku Luphelile)
lyrics:
Usuku Luphelile Sibong' eNkosini Sisize siyacela Singon' ebusuku Ngilondoloze Jesu Ngilele ubuthongo.

Okuhle kwasemini Kuphelile manje Masithokoze nokho Kuza ubumnyama Ngilondoloze Jesu Ngilele ubuthongo.

Asisebenzi manje Sizakuphumula Masingehlelwa ngozi Lapha sekuhlwile Ngilondoloze Jesu Ngilele ubuthongo.
Ngicela uvikele Umphefumlo wami Nguwena ongaxosha Yonk’ impi yesitha Ngaphandle kwakho Jesu
Ngingeze ngasindiswa. Amen
              18 (Ngiyakudumisa Baba) Ngiyakudumisa Baba
Ngokuhle konke kwanamhla Ngilondise okwetshwele Phansi kwamaphiko akho.


NgeNdodana thethelela Okubi engikwenzile Kuthi lapho ngilalayo Ngingabi nanxa nabani.

Ngenze ngiziphathe kahle Ngize ngingesab' ukufa Ngiphe ukufa okuhle Ngize ngivuke ngodumo.
Ngeze ngiphumule kuwe Ungiph' ubuthong' obuhle Obuyongipha amandla Okukukhonza ngomuso.

Nxa ngiqwashil' ebusuku Ngiph' imicabang' emihle Xosha amaphuph' amabi Nempi yonke yobumnyama.
Makabongw' uNkulunkulu Uyise beneNdodana Benay' uMoya oNgcwele Makabongw' izingelosi.
Amen

             19 (Ungabi kude Nkosi Kuhlwile) Ungabi kude Nkosi kuhlwile
Lishonil' ilanga hlala nathi Akukho muntu ongasisiza Wena ongumSizi hlala nathi.

Liyashesh' ukushona ilanga Namagugu omhlaba adlule Konk' okomhlaba kuyaguquka Wen' ongaguquki hlala nathi.

Singehambe kahle ungenathi Singeze samehlula nomyengi Ngubani ongalingana nawe? Noma nini Nkosi hlala nathi.
Nxa unathi asesabi lutho Kuyathwaleka nokusindayo Nokufa akukwaz' ukwehlula Abahlala nawe hlala nathi.

Lapho esefiphala amehlo Sibhekis' isiphambano sakho Sihlale sikwethemb' emnyameni
Manje naphakade, hlala nathi. Amen

              20 (Ludlulil' Usuku) Ludlulil' Usuku
Sekuhwalala Amathunz' okuhlwa Asefikile.

Manje ziyaphuma Izinkanyezi Zonke izinyoni Seziyalala.

Jesu baphumuze Abakhathele Ubathuthuzele Ngezibusiso.
Vikel' izihambi Ezingozini
Noma ziselwandle Noma zikuphi.

Baduduze bonke

Abagulayo Abenza okubi Ubayekise.

Thum' izingelosi Zizosilonda Ubusuku bonke Zilale nathi.
Mangivuswe nguwe Entathakusa Ngingenasisici Kwawakh' amehlo.
Kadunyisw' uYise Nay' iNdodana NoMoya oNgcwele Nkos' inye njalo.
Amen
              21 (Langa Lomphefumulo Wami) Langa Lomphefumulo Wami
Nxa unami kuyakhanya Ungashoni langa lami Ucash' emehlweni ami.


Nxa ngilala ubuthongo Ngicabange ngawe wedwa Khona ngophumula kuwe Ngizwe ubumnandi bakho.

Yiba nami yonk' imini Ngingephile ungenami Yiba nami ebusuku Ngingefe kahl' ungenami.
Bahawukel' abonile

Beqa imithetho yakho Baph' intethelelo Nkosi Nobabalo lokungoni.

Linda bonk' abagulayo Ucebise abampofu Ududuz' abakhalayo Ubasize ngomsa wakho.
Sibusise siselapha Nasekuvukeni kwethu Ungasishiyi nanini
Sihlal' othandweni lwakho. Amen

              22 (E Langa Lenhliziyo) E Langa Lenhliziyo
Wozusikhanyisele Ubumnyama abukho Nxa wen' useduze.
Makungabikho 'thunzi Elivel' emhlabeni Elisisithe wena Ngoba sokweduka.

Siz' ulalise Nkosi Amazol' obuthongo Phezu kwamehlo ethu Sizumeke kahle.


Lapha kuthath' ukusa Sivuse ngomsa wakho Usiph' inkambo enhle Osukwin' olusha.

Yiba nathi emini Ube nath' ebusuku Uma wen' ungenathi Siyesab' ukufa.
Silonde kahle Nkosi Sonke sikwethembayo Usiyise' Zulwini
Ngomhla wokuphela. Amen


              23 (Selishonil' Ilanga) Selishonil' Ilanga
Selinyamalele Bufikil' ubumnyama Busisibekele.


Baba osithandayo Silond' ebusuku Usivus' ekuseni Sihlumekile.
Sibong' izibusiso Osiphile zona Ezokuphila kahle Neziny' eziningi.
Ngazo zonk' izinsuku Siphe ubabalo
Nxa sesidlula lapha Usiyis' ekhaya. Amen

title: (Uma Sesilele)
lyrics:
Uma Sesilele, Baba siyacela Usilondoloze thina bantu bakho Asesabi lutho silondiwe nguwe Yiba nomsa kithi siyacela Baba.


Thina siyizoni sizilahla kuwe Sithi, hlambulula izidalwa zakho Masiphiwe nguwe okuthandekayo
Size singeniswe ezulwini lakho. Amen



           25 (Kulo Lonke Lelilanga) Kulo Lonke Lelilanga
Sivikelwe luthando Kubo bonke ubusuku Nxa sihlaselw' isitha Jesu silondoloze
Kuhl' ukwethemba wena.
Thina sihaqwe yisitha Sisahlez' emhlabeni Wosigcina usigone Ezingalweni zakho Kothi lapha simuka Siphumule sikuwe.
Amen

title: (Baba Sijabulise)
lyrics:
Baba Sijabulise Ngemsebe yomsa wakho Nxa selizakushona Siphi' ukukhanya.

Mhlengi masiqiniswe Nxa kuphel' okomhlaba Nxa sesidlula kuwo Siph' ukukhanya.

Wena Moya oNgcwele Nxa sihlushw' izinhlungu Nokufa kusondela
Siph' ukukhanya.
Nkulunkul' obuthathu Wen' okhanyayo njalo Ubapha bonk' abakho Lokho Kukhanya. Amen
                    27 (Nxa Silele Baba) Nxa Silele Baba siyacela
Usigcine kahle usigone Londoloz' umzimba nenhliziyo Engozini zonke zobumnyama.

Izingelos' eziseZulwini Nxa silele ziyakudumisa Zibabaza wena oyiNkosi Azikhawuli zonk' izikhathi.
Sengathi singahlangana nazo Sibabantu ababonga njalo Umsa wakho esiphethwe ngawo Lapha emhlabeni naphezulu.

Kuze kuthi ngokufika kwakho Kuqedwe konke okuyisono Sivuswe nguye onguMsindisi Sihlale naw' eZulwini lakho.
Amen

title: (Ilanga Selizakushona)
lyrics:
Ilanga selizakushona kuzobamnyama Kanjalo sekuzakuphel' ukuhamba kwethu.


Wazelulizandla zakho esiphambanweni Ukuze kusondezwe bonke abantu bakho.

Sisize Nkosi sisithande isiphambano Sizinikela kulezozandla nxa sifayo.
Kabongw' uYise wakho konke nay' iNdodana Kabongw' uMoya oNgcwele manje naphakade. Amen

title: (Lishonil' Ilanga)
lyrics:
Lishonil' Ilanga Ludlulil' usuku Ulilanga lethu Elingashoni Jesu oyiNgcwele Jesu sicela Usikhanyisele
Ngemsebe yakho.
Siyabonga wena Siguqa kuwe Siyahub' igama Lethu lokuhlwa Lokhu sikhuleka Sicela kuwe Siphe sikukhonze Laph' emhlabeni.

Lezo zindlu zakho Zikhanyisiwe Wena ulilanga Elingashoni Inhliziyo zethu Zikhanyiselwe Zize zithokoze Ngemsebe yakho.

Bonke abakhona Laph' emhlabeni Nengelosi zonke Zise zulwini Mazibonge wena Ophethe konke Ulilanga lethu
Siholwa nguwe. Amen

title: (Unamandla Onke)
lyrics:
Unamandla onke Baba wethu Isihlalo sakho sobukhosi Simi naphakade ezulwini Ngezikhathi zonke siqinile
Nkos' ebongekayo Wena Jesu Wehlelw' ubumnyama ngenxa yethu Wafa wangeniswa elibeni
Siyakulo thina, singesabi

Kuyadlul' imini nobusuku, Kulalela njalo izwi lakho Sisekhona ngawe sifa ngawe Sisindiswa thina ngomsa wakho

Wen' osindisayo sizwe Nkosi Sisesemhlabeni usisize Uyinqaba yethu, unamandla Engozini zonke yiba nathi
Usithokozise sekuhlwile Ngokukhanya kwakho okumnandi Size sife sethabiswa nguwe
Sibe nawe embusweni wakho. Amen
                  31 (Kudlule Ukukhanya) Kudlule Ukukhanya
Sicela Baba wethu Siph' ukulala kahle Sigcin' usivikele.

Singahlushw' amaphupho Nengozi zobusuku
Nazo zonke izitha Zomzimba nomphefumlo.

Sibheke themba lethu Siyakhuleka kuwe Namhla sikuhubela Amahub' okubonga.
Yizwa Nkos' ephezulu Sihub' ingoma yethu Namabandla ezulu Sikuhubela wena.
Sikudumisa Baba Nawe Jes' uMsindisi Nawe Moya Ongcwele
Nkos' inye njalonjalo. Amen

title: (Ngosuku Lokuqala)
lyrics:
Ngosuku Lokuqala Sibong' uNkulunkulu Inkosi yamakhosi Yadal' umhlaba wonke.

Indodan' ephakade Yanqob' ukufa namhla NoMoy' oNgcwele wehla Wez' eBandleni layo.

Sengath' izinhliziyo Zangagcwala uthando Lusenze simdumise Owaveza ilanga.
Baba wen' owangenza Ngomfanekiso wakho Ngigcwalise ngothando Lwakho lwaseZulwini.

Jesu Nkosi eNgcwele Ngiph' ukuba ngimbelwe Ngivuswe kanye nawe Ngibe ngowakho njalo.
Wena owab' izipho Ngiphe wena uqobo Ub' ukukhanya kimi Nesisusa sothando.
Ngizinikela kuwe Wena Mthathu eMunye
Ngenze ngibe ngowakho Ngizinikela kuwe. Amen

title: (Namhla Lusuku)
lyrics:
Namhla Lusuku lweNkosi Oluthandwa ngama Kristu Masont' onke luwatshela Ngokuvuka kukaJesu.


Ngebandla lakh' usitshela Ukuba sivuke naye Nobani omethembayo Usevuke kanye naye.


Bonke abaphethwe nguye Banomcebo abaphethe Ngob' ebapha isabelo Kowakuthwala, nakwenza.
Udumo nokuphumula Nokuphila kwaphakade Nokuthula nokubusa Sikuphiwa nguye konke.

Sibabaz' uthando lwakho Negama lakh' eliNgcwele Wena, Nkosi yaphakade Namanje nanininini. Amen
            34 (Lung' Suku Lwakho Nkosi) Lung' Suku Lwakho Nkosi
Olumisiweyo
Bayethab' abantu bakho Ngalemini yakho.

Namhlanje wavuka Nkosi Elibeni lakho
Khona kwakunqotshwa' ukufa Ngokuvuka kwakho.

Uvukile wena Jesu Nhloko yamakholwa Sizovuka nathi sonke Thina' bakholwayo.
Malizwiwe izwi lakho Ngabaningi namhla Mabavuswe ekufeni Namhla basindiswe.
Sidumisa wena Jesu Laph' endlini yakho Sinethemb' elihle thina Ngokuvuka kwakho. Amen
                  35 (Baba Wethu Babheke) Baba Wethu Babheke
Bonk' abaphambi kwakho Vum' ukubemukela Ubaphathe ngomusa.

Jesu wen' owafela Bonke owabenzayo Benze baz' umsa wakho Ngob' ubahluphekele.
Hlanz' inhliziyo zabo Wena Moya oNgcwele Bahlanze babemhlophe Bafanele iZulu. Amen

title: (Kade sisezonweni)
lyrics:
Kade sisezonweni Sasiphuphutheka Kade sihamba kabi Kwakumnyama kithi Lafik' izwi leNkosi Lezwakala kithi
Laph' izithunywa zayo Zilishumayela.
Nkos' ukulunga kwakho Kusobala kithi Sesikuqonda kahle Nokufuna kithi Sesimaz' uMsindisi Oleth' insindiso NoMoya oyiNgcwele OnguMthokozisi.

Indlela sesiyazi Eya eZulwini
Siza kuw' usithole Silungiswe Nguwe Nkosi unobubele Usiphatha kahle Sowudumisa njalo
Umsa wakh' ongaka. Amen

title: (Jesu Nkosi Yethu)
lyrics:
Jesu Nkosi yethu Sithinte sonke Samkelise iZwi Uligxilise.

Yiba nathi sonke Singalikhohlwa Vus' izinhliziyo Zilazisise.

Kade abaningi Bese mnyameni Kwenza ukukhanya Kwakhanya kubo.
Namhla Simakade Bayakubonga Abayikuphika Bayakuvuma.

Kepha abaningi Basezonweni Ak' ubaphendule Baze baphile.
Jesu Simakade Siphathe sonke Fundis' inhliziyo
NgoMoya wakho. Amen

title: (Baba Sibuthene)
lyrics:
Baba sibuthene Laph' endlini yakho Sesifuna ukuphiwa Okwomusa wakho.

Izindaba zakho Ziyashunyayelwa Thina sizakulalela Okwelizwi lakho.

Lona lingukudla Esiphila ngako Lingamanzi okuphila Esiwaphuzayo.
Kusemnandi konke OkwaseNkosini Masiphiwe thina sonke OkwaseZulwini.

Siyabonga wena Osabele kahle Sibongela okwangomso Nkosi enomusa. Amen

title: (Sondelani Sivume)
lyrics:
Sondelani Sivume Sibong' uNkulunkulu Siz' ebusweni bakhe Sikhon' endlini yakhe.

Yen' uyiNkos' enkulu Yaw' amakhosi onke Wenz' wa nguye umhlaba Nolwandle nakho konke.
Siguqa phambi kwakhe Simdumisa uMenzi Thina esingabakhe
Yen' uyiNkosi yethu. Amen

title: (Nkosi Baba Silapha)
lyrics:
Nkosi Baba Silapha Thina bantu bakho Sizwe sisize namhla Ngobubele bakho.



Jesu Msindisi wethu Thina singabakho Sifundis' izwi lakho Senz' intando yakho.
Nkosi, Moya Ongcwele Yiba nathi sonke Asinakh' ukusizwa Nxa ungekho kithi.
Nkosi uhlala nathi Ngaphakathi kwethu Masithokoze njalo Ngokufika kwakho. Amen

title: (Osebeni LweJordani)
lyrics:
Osebeni LweJordani Wabikezel' uJohani Wath' iseduze iNkosi Eletha indaba enhle.


Hlanzan' inhliziyo zenu Niqondis' indlela yayo Inhliziy' azilungele OyiNkosi yamakhosi.
Nkosi wen' onguMsindisi Nenqaba nomvuzo wethu Nxa lungekho ubabalo Sibunisa okwembali.
Yelul' isandl' uphilise Uvus' izon' eziwile Wenze umhlab' ubukeke
Ngokukhanya kwakh' okuhle.
Siyakubonga Ndodana Ozokhulula abakho Sikubonga unoYise
Kanye noMoya oNgcwele. Amen

title: (Bhek' Uyeza Emafwini)
lyrics:
Bhek' Uyeza Emafwini Owafela izoni AbaNgcwele abaningi Benaye bejabula
Haleluya Haleluya Haleluya Ubuyel' ukubusa.

Amanxeba asekhona Awathol' ekufeni Yikho okujabulisayo Bonke abahlengiweyo
Bewabona bemangele bemangele Bejabul' eNkosini.


Uyobonw' amehlo onke Ehlobe ngobukhosi Abamdela bamthengisa Bamhlupha bambethela
Bayolila kabuhlungu benovalo Nxa bebon' uMesiya.

Ngokushaywa kwecilongo Wonk' umhlab' uzophela Libalek' iZulu futhi
Bonke abamzondayo Bayakuzwa izwi lithi izwi lithi Uz' ukunahlulela.



O! Amen mabakhuleke Bonke kuwe Msindisi Thatha Nkos' amandla akho Bus' embusweni wakho Haleluya Haleluya Haleluya
Wena wedw' oyiNkosi. Amen

title: (Umi Ngasemnyango Jesu)
lyrics:
Umi Ngasemnyango Jesu Uyangqongqotha kuwo Ungqongqotha ngeZwi lakho Osimemeza ngalo.


Jesu zonk' izinhliziyo Zingumnyango lowo Umi khona usibiza Size sikuvelele.

Masivume, silalele Sinake izwi lakho Thint' izinhliziyo zethu Zenze zikwamukele.
Ukuvuma nokuvula, Singakuphiwa nguwe Siyacela siph' amandla Okuvula ungene. Amen
                    44 (Woza Jesu Olindelwe) Woza Jesu Olindelwe
Uzokhulul' abakho
Senze siphumule kuwe Singabi nakwesaba.





Mandla noMqinisi wethu Ulithemba lomhlaba Funwayo wezizwe zonke Ntokozo yenhliziyo.
Wozokhulula abakho WeNdodana yeNkosi Sondeza umbuso wakho Umbuso waphakade.

NgoMoya wakh' ophakade Busa thina abakho Senyusel' enkazimulweni Ngezinzuzelo zakho. Amen

title: (Mawuze Umbuso)
lyrics:
Mawuze Umbuso Umbuso kaKristu Ngamandl' amakhulu Chitha bonk' ububi.


Kubus' ukuthula Kanye nobungcwele Ukuze kuphele Inzond' emhlabeni.



Ngaleso sikhathi Kophele ukulwa Ubabuse bonke Kuxoshwe bonke
Vus' amandla akho Siyacela, Nkosi Usivul' amehlo
Az' abone wena.
Ababi bethuka Lon' iGama lakho

Impisi zichitha Abomhlambi wakho.

Abangakholiwe Bahlez' emnyameni Bakhanyise bonke Nkanyezi yokusa.
Sibonga uYise neNdodana futhi NoMoya oNgcwele
Nkulunkulu munye. Amen

title: (Lizwakele Izwi Lakhe)
lyrics:
Lizwakele Izwi Lakhe
Izwi loMsindisi wethu Usesondel' useduze Umhlaba wonk' ulizwile.
Sekubalek’ amathunzi Sekudamuk’ izinkungu Ngokub’ uKrist’ usondele Usilethel’ ukukhanya.


Usesondel' uMkhululi Oyilanga lokulunga Uzekuxosha' ubumnyama Asisindis' ekufeni.


Nathike masize kuye Sinenhliziy' ekhalayo Sicel' ukuthethelelwa Zonk' izono esinazo.
Ukuze mhla ebuyayo Singaxoshwa phambi kwakhe

Kodwa, sivikelwe nguye Ngamandla nothando lwakhe.

Kabongwe onguButhathu Uyise, nay' uNdodana Naye uMoya oNgcwele,
Nkulunkulu Munye njalo. Amen

title: (WOZA WOZ' EMMANUEL)
lyrics:
Woza woz' Emmanuel Khulul' uIsrael' oboshiwe Okhal' eyedwa ekuboshweni Elinda wen' uz' ufike
Jabula wena Israel Uyeza uEmmanuel.


Woza woza kukhanya Sithokoze ngemisebe yakho Uchith' amafu onk' ebusuku Uxosh' okusethusayo Jabula wena Israel
Uyeza uEmmanuel.


Woza mpande kaJesse Khulul' abantu bakho kusatan Ubasindise bonk' eGehena Ubaph' ukwahlul' iliba
Jabula wena Israel Uyeza uEmmanuel.

Woza usivelele
Usivulel' ekhay' eZulwini Senyukele khona singesabi Laph' inhlupheko ingekho Jabula wena Israel

Uyeza u Emmanuel.
Nkosi yebandl' Adonai Owafika ngefu nobukhosi Kwabakh' entabeni eSinayi Wabapha umthetho ngezwi Jabula wena Israel
Uyeza uEmmanuel. Amen
          48 (E! Llizwi laphezulu elikaYise Laphakade) E! Llizwi laphezulu elikaYise Laphakade
Elazalelwa thina sonke esidukileyo.


Khanyis' inhliziyo zeth' uphemb' uthando lwakho kuzo Silahl' izono zethu inxa sibizwa nguwe,
Mhla ufika emhlabeni usamkele thina sonke Bayakuphel' ababi babuse abaNgcwele.


Ngosuku lokwahlulelwa usimise phambi kwakho Ngalolusuku olukhul' usamukel' eZulwini.


Makadunyisw' uNkulunkul' uYise nay' iNdodana Benay' uMoya oyiNgcwele manje naphakade. Amen
                     49 (Lilindil' Ibandla Lakho Nkosi) Lilindil' Ibandla Lakho Nkosi
Libhek' ukufika kwakho njalo Kuyakuba nini sithokoze Ngokukhanya kwakho sikubone?

Embusweni wakho woz' ubuse Wisa phansi zonk' izitha zethu Hlelisisa Nkos' izizwe zonke Uthabis' abantu bonke bakho.
Nkosi enomusa Wena Jesu Wosibus' umzimba nenhliziyo Chitha amacebo ethu onke Aphambene nemithetho yako.

Masilinde njalo sikhuleka Sihlomel' esakho isikhathi Embusweni wakho ophakade Silungiswe nguwe singeniswe.


Siyabonga Wena, Nkosi Jesu Simbabaza naye onguYise Simdumis' uMoya oyiNgcwele Nkosi inye njalo naphakade. Amen

title: (Somandla Ngibonani)
lyrics:
Somandla Ngibonani Kuphela okwomhlaba Uyeza uMahluli Ehlezi emafwini Kukhala icilongo Avulwa amaliba Kafike ngimlindile.
Abafelayo kuye Baqala ukuvuka Bahlangabez' iNkosi Bambona bejabula Bangabi nal uvalo Abazilingisile
Iyez' iNkosi yabo.

Bayamesab' ababi Evel' ethukuthele Sebembona bakhala Bangeze basizeka Balahl' umusa wakhe Bathuthumela manje Bengakalungiselwa.
Mahluli siyacela Sizithobela kuwe Sigcine kukh' okubi Ngothando olukhulu Nxa sisalingw' okubi Masilalele Wena
Sizilungise ngawe. Amen

title: (Ukuza KweNkosi)
lyrics:
Ukuza KweNkosi Siyakukhumbula Sihlabelela igama Sidumisa ngalo.
Nkosi yaphakade Eyathathisintu Ukuba ibakhulule Bonk' abantu bayo.



Vukanini nonke Niye eNkosini Eyeza ithobekile Ileth' ukuthula.
Iyakuza futhi Izokwahlulela

Ihlanganise abayo Babuse' ezulwini.



Kokhanya mhla eza Buxosh' ubumnyama Kuphele konk' okudala Kukhanye ngokusha.
Simdumis' uKristu Osisindisayo Abuse naye uYise
NoMoya Ongcwele. Amen

title: (Uyeza uMsindisi)
lyrics:
Uyeza uMsindisi Esimbheke kade Masijabule ngaye Ngokufika kwakhe.

Uyez' ukukhulula Abathunjiweyo Ugqabul' izibopho Avul' amasango.

Weza ukuphilisa Bonk' abagulayo Ababusise bonke Abahluphekile.
Ngegam' elidumile LeNkosi yomusa Unkulunkulu wethu Umnini mandl' onke. Amen

title: (Mawuze Nkosi Yethu)
lyrics:
Mawuze Nkosi Yethu Uleth' ukukhanya Sihlezi emhlabeni Sisebumnyameni.

Bonk' abangcwele bakho Balindele wena
Mawuze ubakhiphe Ensizini zabo.


Ibandla lakho Nkosi Lizula ehlane Mawuze ulihole Lingenis' ekhaya.

Nkosi woza ngamandla Uzahlul' izitha
Wena oyiNdodana Mninimandla onke.

Mawuz' ukwenze konke Kube kusha konke Ubuyisele bonke
Kuy' umenzi wabo. Amen


                   54 (Kwakukhona Emuzini) Kwakukhona Emuzini
KaDavid' eBetlehem Indlu yezinkomo lapho Kwazalelwa uJesu Eyingane encane Yintombi uMariya.


Inkosi yasezulwini Yehlela emhlabeni Ngobuphofu yalaliswa Emkhomben' obandayo UmSindisi oNgcwele Wayintula indawo.



Esemncane wahlonipha Walalela uNina LeyoNtombi ethobile Eyamphatha ngothando Mabafuze uJesu Nabantwana bamanje

Uyisibonelo sethu Masikhulis okwakhe Uyakwaz' ukuhlupheka Nentokozo, nosizi Uhleka kanye nathi Akhale kanye nathi.
Lomntwana othandekayo Uyinkosi yezulu Siyombon' ekhupheleni Ngenxa yothando lwakhe Uhol' abantabakhe Abase laph' ekhona.


Asiyikumbon' elele Ehaqwe yizinkomo Sombon' engasekunene. KukaYis' ezulwini Ekakwe ngabantwana

Abamdumisa njalo. Amen

title: (Yen' Ozelwe uNkulunkulu)
lyrics:
Yen' Ozelwe uNkulunkulu Umhlaba ungakabikho UnguAlfa noOmega Ungumthombo wokugcina Kwakho konke okukhona Nakho okuyoba khona Kuze kube phakade.



Ngezwi lakhe kwadatshulwa Konke okubonakele
Nal' izulu naw' umhlaba Nal' ulwandle okukhulu Konke okukhanyisiwe Nangelanga nangenyanga Kuze kube naphakade.



Wafunyanwa engumuntu Ezakuhlupheka afe Ukubani son' isintu Singabhubhi singapheli Leso esaqalekiswa Sinecala elinzima
Kuze kube naphakade.

Laba lihle lelolanga Mhla iVirg' elinenhlanhla Lalizala umSindisi
Ngay' uMoya oNgcwele Uyingan' eNgcwele yena

Eza ukuhleng' umhlaba Kuze kube phakade.

Nguye owabhekisiswa Ngabo bonke abendulo Uye owashumayela Ngabo bonk' abaprofethi Nang' uyeza umSindisi
Mawubong' umhlaba wonke Kuze kube naphakade.
Malihlabele' izulu Liyibong' iNkosi yalo Mazethab' izingelosi Nazo isikhulu zazo Bababaz' abantu bonke Bedumis' iGama lakhe Kuze kube naphakade.


Kadunyisw' uNkulunkulu OnguYise neNdodana Naye uMoya oNgcwele Izingqobo ezintathu Makhlatshelelwe kuye Amahubo okubonga
Keze kube naphakade. Amen

title: (Wozani maKristu)
lyrics:
1. Wozani maKristu jabulani namhla Wozani masiye eBetlehema Niyakubona oyiNkosi yenu
Wozani sikhuleke, wozani sikhuleke Wozani sikhuleke kuy’ uKristu

title: Yen’ ongukukhanya, onguNkulunkulu Wazithobisa wazalwa yiNtombi Owavelayo engadatshulwanga
lyrics: Wozani sikhuleke, wozani sikhuleke Wozani sikhuleke kuy’ uKristu

title: Yenanelanini bandla lengelosi Kudume izulu nomhlaba Mayibatshazw’ iNkosi ephezulu Wozani sikhuleke, wozani sikhuleke Wozani sikhuleke kuy’ uKristu
Kunjalo, Bayede Nkos’ ozelwe namhla Sidumisa wena Jesu iNkosi
lyrics: Wen’ onguLizw’ uzithathel’ isintu Wozani sikhuleke, wozani sikhuleke Wozani sikhuleke kuy’ uKristu	Amen.

title: (Lalelani Izingelosi)
(Vukani Nina Enikholiwe)
lyrics:
Vukani Nina Enikholiwe Nibingelele iNkosi yenu Manijabule mhla wokuzalwa Nifike phambi kwayo nobonge Nihlabele nezingelosi Nishumayele indaba enhle.

Kwashunyayelwa kub' abelusi Bezwa izwi lengelosi lithi Bhakani nans' indab' ebikelwa Nina namhla nakubantu bonke Namhla kuzelw' uMsindisi wezwe Izithembiso zigcwalisiwe.


Isibikile kwathi masinya Zaqhamuka zonk' izingelosi Zihlabelel' ihubo zibonga Zijabula eNkosini zithi Makube ukuthul' emhlabeni Nakubo bonk' abalungileyo.

Abelusi baphuthuma baya Ebethlehem umzi kaDavida Bafumana khon' inga' engcwele Ile' emkhombeni wezinkomo Bayikhonza basebebuyela Ezimvwini zabo bejabula.

Nathi bakith' asigcine kahle Enhliziyweni zethu lendaba Yothando lwakhe uNkulunkulu Owasihleng' ezonweni zethu Uye ozelwe njenganamuhla Owasifel' eziphambanweni.

Masithokozeni sidumise Esizalelwa yena namuhla Uyen' oyiNkosi yamakhosi Uyen’ esiphethwe nguye sonke
Wab' ekhona singakadatshulwa Uyobakhona kube phakade. Amen

title: (Kwathe Ebusuku)
lyrics:
Kwath' ebusuk' abelusi beluse izimvu Yehlela kub' ingelosi ikhany' okwelanga.

Bayizwa ithi nignesabi ngize nendaba Manijabule nabo bonk' abant' abezwayo.

Ebethlehema uzelwe namhla umSindisi Ukristu oyiNkosi inzalo kaDavida

Endlini yezinkomo niyakubon' iNkosi Iyona leyo ngan' encan' elel' emkhombeni.

Izingelos' eziningi zahlangana nayo Zihub' ihubo zibong' uNkulunkulu zithi.

Unkulunkulu kadunyisw' opha ukuthula
Laph' emhlabeni othand' ukuba sisindiswe. Amen

                 60 (Uzwil' Usomandla) Uzwil' Usomandla
Usiz' aluphele Bhekukuthula kwehlela Abakuthenjiswa.

Naz' izingelosi Zicula kamnandi Zimemezela ukuthi Uzelw' umSindisi.


Bona abelusi Begijima bonke
Masiye nab' emkhombeni Siyokhonz' ingane.

Yisimangaliso Laphaya phakathi
Kukhon' ingane noNina Nomkhomb' onendwangu.
Ngabe nguKristu lo Inkos' enamandla
Uyen' ongophas' umhlaba Kanye nenkanyezi.
Noma ungabonwa Ubonwa ngokholo Sikutusa nengelosi Ezikukhonzayo.

Mfundis' onomusa Uth' umbhalo wakho Inyam' esivimbelayo Sisuke kokubi.
Siyacela Nkosi Susa ukuzidla
Zalelw' enhliz' yweni zethu Ndodana eNgcwele. Amen

title: (Kwathub? uKristu azalwe)
lyrics:
Kwathub? uKristu azalwe Emzini eBethlehema Zahub? ingelosi zithi

Refrain: In excelsis gloria
In excelsis gloria In excelsis gloria In excelsis gloria In excelsis gloria

Zabikela abelusi Indaba enhle yokuthi
Namhla kuzelw? umSindisi
Refrain: In excelsis gloria


Inkosi izosindisa Njengokusho kwemibhalo Ngakhoke sihuba sithi:

Refrain: In excelsis gloria


Siphe, Nkos? ethandekayo Uba size sikubone Sikubonge njalo sithi:
Refrain: In excelsis gloria

title: (Thokozani nina bantu bami)
lyrics:
Thokozani nina bantu bami Nisho kulo iJerusalema Amazwi amnandi odwa nithi:
Ukulwa kwakho sekuphelile.

Refrain: Thokozanini nina abami Nibingelele inkos? iNdodana Ingane ezelweyo uJesu.
Izono zakho zithethelelwe Lokhu iNkosi ikusho kuwe Izwi lomemez? ehlane lathi: Lungisan? indlela yomSindisi.
       Refrain: Thokozanini nina abami Niyiqondise imendo yayo
Nizigqibe zonke izigodi Nileleze futhi nezintaba Niqondise okuyizigwegwe.
       Refrain: Thokozanini nina abami Amaw? ayakuba ngamathafa
Ekuveleni kodumo lwakhe
Lubonakale kubantu bonke Lokhu kushiwo wumlomo
wakhe.
       Refrain: Thokozanini nina abami Bheka! iNtomb? iykukhulelwa
Kuzalw? iNdodana bayiqambe
Igam? elithi: Emmanuweli
Okuth? uNkulunkulu unathi.
Refrain: Thokozanini nina abami

Yenkul? entaben? ephakeme Wen? obikel? iZiyon? okuhle Mawuphakamise izwi lakho Wen? obikel? iJerusalema.
Refrain: Thokozanini nina abami


Umemeze ungesabi lutho Uthi emizini yakwaJuda Bheka nangu oyiNkosi yakho
Bheka nangu onguNkulinkulu.
       Refrain: Thokozanini nina abami Ingalo yakhe igcwel? amandla
Yonqoba konke okunamandla
Uyakukuchithachitha konke Abavuze bonk? abanqobile.

Refrain: Thokozanini nina abami
Amen.



                  63 (Babesebumnyameni) Babesebumnyameni
Babona ukukhanya Babehamba ezweni Emfundeni yokufa Sebekhanyiswa nabo Ngoba sebezalelwe Yen? onguNkulunkulu Ozokubakhulula.
Umbus? uzob? owakhe

Lowo esimzalelwe Kothiw? iGama lakhe LiwuSimangaliso Ngamandlakhe wehlula Zonke izitha zakhe Uyakubus? abakhe Ngal? uthando noxolo.
Kwath? abelusi bemi Belus? izimvu zabo Yabehlel? ingelosi Yathi: Maningesabi Ngilethe izindaba Zensindiso ezweni Nenjabulo yabantu Uzelwe uMsindisi.

Emzini kaDavidi UKristu usezelwe Namhla eBetlehema Ozokunikhulula Bhekan? izingelosi Ezehla ezulwini Zibong? uNkulunkulu Ngenjabulo enkulu.

Zwanini abelusi Babonisana bethi: Masiy? eBetlehema Siyokuzibonela Basuka masinyane Bafica uMariya NoJosefa nengane Besesitebeleni.

Nampo sebekhothama Beyitusa iNkosi Basukake bahamba Bayokwazis? abantu Konk? abakubonile

Nababekutsheliwe Nathi masilingise
Ngokukhonza iNkosi. Amen



                  64 (Wesab? ize uHerodi) Wesab? ize uHerodi
Nxa beth? uyeza uKristu Engezobusa umhlaba Eleth? umbus? ongapheli.
Zabon? inkanyez? iZazi Zikude zayilandela Zazifun? ongukukhanya INkos? ezayikhungayo.

Yema iMvana yezulu Emanzin? eJolidani Noma yon? ingenasono Ukuz? isis? ezabantu.
Namanj? izwe lidukile Liding? inkanyezi yakho Lithumele yona Nkosi Lisuke liyilandele.
Yeka isimangaliso Samanz? abaliwayini Wash? izwi laminineka Ngendlel? engachazekiyo.
Makadunyiswe uJesu Ngalomkhosi wokwembulwa Abatshazwe naphakade
noYise noMoy? oNgcwele. Amen.

title: Jabulani bakaKristu Ngenhliziyo nomphefumulo Lalelani sinitshel? indaba Enhle usezelwe Ziyamkhonz? izinkomo Elele emkhombeni Usezelw? uKristu
lyrics:
Uzelwe namhla.


Jabulani bakaKristu Ngenhliziyo nomphefumulo Nothokoza naphakade Jabulani usezelwe Wazalelwa lokh? uKristu Ukusivulel? izulu
Sithokoze njalo MSindisi wethu.

Jabulani bakaKristu Ngenhliziyo nangomphefumulo Alisasabek? iliba
Phumlani usezelwe Sosindisw? uJesu Kristu Nibizwa nguye namhla Nize ezulwini Nizosindiswa. Amen.

title: Kwakusebusika Laph? eBethlehem Ngesikhath? uJesu Eza ngaso Lalikhithikile Kwaze kwamhlophe Kwakunamakhaza Muhla ezalwa.
lyrics:
Kepha nokho yeza INkosi yethu
Iz? ukubahlenga ?bantu bayo Yayizalwa khona Kuwo umkhombe Kanti unguMdali Womhlaba wonke.

Yathi sekwanele Ngilalisiwe Esitebeleni
Saz? izilwane Yas? ihlonipheka Ezilwaneni Zayikhothamela Ziphambi kwayo.

Yebo ne? ngelosi

Ezabuthana Zahubel? igama Elinamandla UMariy? uNina Wasekhothama Edumisa yena Ngob? uyiNkosi.
Mina ngolethani Kuwena Nkosi Ngiyiswel? impahla Elingeneyo
Kepha ngingamnika Uqobo lwami Thatha Nkosi nansi
?Nhliziyo yami. Amen.

title: Umthetho omdala Awusasebenzi Isivumelwan? esisha Senziwa ngothando.
lyrics:
Yen? ongukukhanya Okucwazimlayo Wasithwalel? ubuhlungu Umntwana oNgcwele.


Wabuzw? ubuhlungu Esokw? eyingane Igazi lakhe elopha Lish? ukufa kwakhe.
Waqanjwa igama Elihlonishwayo Elingu Jes? uMsindisi

Yiba nguye kithi.
Mawubongwe Nkosi Ngoba wasihlenga Ubongwe kanye noYise noMoya oNgcwele. Amen.

title: Muzi waseBetlehema Wedlula yonk? eminye Kwavela kuwe iNkosi EnguJes? uMsindisi.
lyrics:
Yayinhle leyankanyezi Kunelang? ekuseni Eyabikela umhlaba Ngokuzalwa kweNkosi.
Nazo iZazi zimkhonza Zimkhunga ngezipho Ngegolide nangamakha Nangenhlaka zifola.

Zikhuluma ziyaqeda Leziziphiwo zazo Igolide laz? elihle Lish? ukuth? uyiNkosi.
Kanti impepho nenhlaka Khona kuth? uwumPristi Nanokuth? uyohlupheka Afele abomhlaba.
Siyakudumisa Jesu Owakhonzwa yiZazi Ukanye naye uYise
noMoya oyiNgcwele. Amen.

title: Ubumnyama buyadlula Kwabahlezi kubo Abangazi ukukhanya Bafikelwe ikho.
lyrics:
Izwi leli lisitshela Ngokuzalwa kwakhe OyiNkosi yakho konke Ozokwakha kithi.
Kwabalele ethuneni Izwi lizwakele Elivela ezulwini Lizokubavusa.

Yena umSindisi wethu Uyabusa konke Uyabusa ngokulunga Manje naphakade.
Bonk? abantu bayukuza
Uma bezwa lona Zonk? izizwe zithokoze Ngokubheka kulo.
Jesu siyacela kuwe Usibuse thina Ulungis? izinhliziyo Nemizimba yethu.
Jesu mawuzithathele Ubukhosi bakho Udunyiswe yibo bonke Abasemhlabeni. Amen.

title: Njengalokhu iZazi Zabona inkanyezi Zihamba ngenjabulo Izihola ikhanya
lyrics:
Siphe Nkos? enomusa
Uba sikulandele.
Njengalokhu zashesha Zeza kuwe, Msindisi Zafike zakukhonza Wen? okhonzwa yindalo Nathi masikufune Sikhonze wena wedwa.

Njengalokhu zamkhunga Ngamagug? ezinawo Nathi masikunike
Kristu Nkosi yezulu Onk? amagugu ethu Ngenhliziy? evumayo.
Zonk? izinsuku, Jesu Sifake endleleni Kuthi ekupheleni Usise ezulwini
La kungekhonkanyezi Naf? elikufihlayo.

Ezweni laphezulu Bahlez? ekukhanyeni Wen? ukukhanya kwabo Nelanga laphakade Siyise kulo nathi
Nkosi, siyokubonga. Amen.

title: Siyakubonga Jesu Nkosi eyembuleka Ngenkanyez? eyinqaba Ezazini zakude
lyrics:
Gatsha likaDavidi Owahlum? eEfratha Mawuhutshelwe njalo Nkosi eyembuleka.
Wembulw? eJolidani Ukuth? unguMesiya EKhana emshadweni Ukuthi uyiNkosi Wavez? amandl? ezulu Ngokuphendul? amanzi Ngalokho bamangala Nkosi eyembuleka.


Wembulwa uphilisa Imzimba nemphefumlo Wembulwa ngobuqhawe Ufojisa umhlebi Wembulwa ngobubele Wenz? ubuhle ngobubi Mawuhutshelwe njalo Nkosi eyembuleka.
Ilanga lofiphala Izulu libaleke
Abesekhany? uKristu Evele njengonyazi Lizwakal? icilongo Bese bevuka bonke Ngalokho bamangala Nkosi eyembuleka.
Sense sibone wena Ezwini lakho Nkosi Nokuba sikufuze

Sibemsulwa njengawe Size sifane nawe Ekufikeni kwakho Sikudumise njalo
Nkosi eyembuleka. Amen.

title: Izazi ngolwazi Zaphikelela Zivelekudeni Empumalanga Zeza eNkosini EBhethlehema Zaziholwa njalo yinkanyez? enhle.
lyrics:
Zayithol? iNkosi EnguMsindisi Manj? izizwe zonke Noma zikuphi Zabona zakholwa Kwelenkanyezi Ohambeni lwazo Ziqond? ekhaya.

Wen? owalaliswa Kuloyamkhombe Ubusa izizwe Ebukhosini
Biz? abangakholwa Nabasahlwelwe Abangakaboni Leyonkanyezi.

Qed? amahlubuka Nabalahliwe Ubakhanyisele Abangakwazi

Inxa benhlanhlatha Bakhanyisele Ngaleyonkanyezi Engacimiyo.
Khanya phambi kwabo Kulobusuku
Damul? ubumnyama Ngobhaqa lwakho umJuda nomGriki omsha nomdala baqonde ekhaya ngalenkanyezi.
Zize zonk? izizwe Noma zinjani Zilindele wena Jes? okhanyayo Zeqe izintaba Kanye nesono Ziye eZulwini Ekubuseni. Amen.

title: Bandla hlanganani nimdumise kahle Yena ozelweyo nguJesu Kristu.
lyrics:
Sondelani kuye ningesabi lutho UyiNkosi yenu enithandayo.

Uphakathi kwethu lapha emhlabeni Uyakhonzwa manje ngabakhe bonke.

Nesibhakabhaka sesiyafakaza Nenkanyezi yakh? ekhazimulayo.

Zafika nezazi ziphethe izipho Zizokuyikhunga iNkosi yezwe.

Masilethe nathi iziphiwo zethu Sikhombis? uthando oluphelele.

Masihlabelele futhi simdumise Ongumhlengi wethu nonguMsindisi. Amen.

title: Min? engona ngaboshwa Ngikhathele ngifuna Inkululo nekhefu Ngihawukele. Nkosi.
lyrics:
Anginakh? ukulunga Ngileth? ububha kodwa Bungihaqile ububi Ngihawukele. Nkosi.


Ngingeze ngakubheka Ngamehlo akhalayo Wen? ozw? isilingozi Ngihawukele. Nkosi.
Ngoshiy? inhliziy? embi Ngibalekele kuwe Ngokuba ngingowakho Ngihawukele. Nkosi.
Muny? olithemba lami Ukuwe eZulwini Enginxusela njalo Ngihawukele. Nkosi.

Nguy? onguMmeli wami Oyongikhulumela Ngokwami konke ngaye Ngihawukele. Nkosi. Amen.

title: Inhliziyo elimele Enenxeb? elibi
lyrics:
Ingathotshwa sandla sinye Isandl? esahlatshwa.


Laph? usizi seluzile Zehla inyembezi Yinhliziyo eyahlatshwa Engazwel? izoni.
Nxa kuhlabek? inhliziyo
Ikhale ngesono Munye umfula wegazi Okhukhul? izono.
Ngalo igazi lemvana Sizuz? intobeko Inhliziy? ibenozwelo Izikathi zonke.

Vula ichibi legazi Ngesandl? esophayo Luhlangothi lwakho lodwa Esicasha kulo. Amen.

title: Wena okholwayo Uyayibona
lyrics:
Lempi yobumnyama Enyonyobayo
Vuka wena ulwe Phum? uhlasele

Shaya ngenzuzelo Zesiphambano.


Wena okholwayo Nans? impi embi Isingene kuwe Enhliziyweni Ungathuthumeli Ungajabhiswa Nqoba ngokuzila Nangomkhuleko.

Wena okholwayo Uyayizwa na Ikulinga ithi:
Yek? uphumule Yisho ngesibindi Uthi: Ngingeke Ngeke ngikuyeke Ukulwa kwami.

Ngiyalwazi lonke Usizi lwakho Ukhathel? impela Ufuze mina Kodwa loluhlupho Luzakuphela Uthokoze njalo
Kim? embusweni. Amen.



77(a)

Izinsuku eziningi Wawuzil? ehlane Kristu Izinsuku eziningi Wawulingwa awahlulwa.

Wawushisw? Ilang? emini Wawugodola ebusuku Izilwane sakuhaqa Wawulal? emhlabathini.
Singekulingise na Sikhuleke sizithobe Sithokoze ngawe wedwa Singanaki okwomhlaba.
Nxa sihlushwa ngusathane Silwe ngakho konk? okwethu Simahlule nathi ngawe Kristu wen? owanqobayo.

Size sibe nokuthula Sithokoze ngokungcwele Ingelosi zisihaqe
Lapha sesiphumelele.
Usilondoloze Jesu Sime kuwe siqinile Size sibe kanye nawe
Njalonjalo eZulwini. Amen.



77(b)
Izinsuk? eziningi Wazil? ehlane Kristu Izinsuk? eziningi Walingwa awahlulwa.

Washisw? ilang? emini Wagodol? ebusuku Zakuhaq? izilwane Ulel? emhlabathini.

Singekulingise na Sikhuleke sithoba Sithokoze sikuwe Singanak? okomhlaba.
Nxa sihlushw? uSathane Silwe ngokwethu konke Sinqobe nathi ngawe Kristu owanqobayo.
Masibe nokuthula Sihlal? ebungcweleni Zisihaq? ingelosi Nxa sesiphumelele.

Jesu usilondoloze Siqine sime kuwe Ukuze sibe nawe
Njalonjal? eZulwini. Amen

title: Ngesikhathi somusa Siselaph? emhlabeni Siyakhuleka kuwe.
lyrics:
Jesu siph? ukukhala Nokuzihlolisisa Funa silahlwe kabi.
Siphe umoya wakho Nxa siguqe emnyango Ungakavalwa njalo.

Ngobusuku bosizi Nokukhal? okumunyu

Nokuqoma ukufa.
Ngezinyembezi zakho Ukhalela umhlaba Masihlale sikuwe.

Masikwethembe Nkosi Khona singekulahlwa Ngamhla wokwahlulelwa

Samukele ngomusa Nkosi usiqondise Size kuwe ekhaya.
Nkosi sikhoselise Phansi kwephiko lakho
Lapha naseZulwini. Amen.


79(a)


Jesu zwana ngomsa wakho Lokhu engikucelayo Yamukela inhliziyo
Yenza ibeyakho njalo Thath? uthando lwami Nkosi Thatha nay? ingqondo yami Hlambulula konk? okwami Ngiph? uMoya wakho njalo.

Njengomfazi owasinda Ngokuthint? ingubo yakho Nami ngiyelul? isandla Ngiphilise Nkosi yami Ukuphila kuyaphuma
Kuwe ngokuthanda kwakho Njengomthombo ompompoza Ngiphuzise Nkosi yami.

Ngigcwalise Nkosi yami Ngal? uthando olukhulu Mawulisho izwi lodwa Uthi, sinda uphelele Vivi olwasezulwini Ulethil? izulu kimi
Ngingowakho Jesu Nkosi Ungowami njalo njalo. Amen.



79(b)


Jesu zwana ngomusa Lokh? engikucelayo Yamukel? inhliziyo Yenz? ibeyakho njalo Thatha uthando lwami Thatha nengqondo yami Ngihlambulule Nkosi Ngiphe uMoya wakho.

Njengomfaz? owasinda Ethint? ingubo yakho Nami ngilul? isandla Ngisiz? ungiphilise Ukuphila kuphuma Kuwe ngentando yakho
Njengomthomb? ompompoza
E Nkosi ngiphuzise.

Ngigcwalise Nkosi yami Ngal? uthando olukhulu Mawulisho izwi lodwa Uthi, sinda uphelele Vivi olwasezulwini Ulethil? izulu kimi
Ngingowakho Jesu Nkosi

Ungowami njalo njalo. Amen..

title: Ngibheke Nkosi Jesu Ungigez? izono Ususe kimi ububi
lyrics:
Wenza ngibemhlophe.
Ngibheke Nkosi Jesu Lapha ngihlushwayo Ngenze ngithandane nawe Ngibe nokuthula.

Ngibheke Nkosi Jesu Nxa ngidukaduka Ebumnyameni bomhlaba Ungihole kahle.
Ngibheke Nkosi Jesu Ngihlaselw? izitha Yiba yisihlangu sami Ngize ngivikelwe.
Ngibheke Nkosi Jesu Ngikhangwa ngumhlaba Nxa kusondela okubi Man? eduze nami.
Ngibheke Nkosi Jesu Nxa kuphela konke Uba ngihlale ngikuwe
Ngithokoze njalo. Amen.

title: Siyamdumisa yen? owafayo Owasifel? esiphambanweni Kuphela kwakh? olithemba lethu Silahl? amathemb? amanye ngaye.
lyrics:
Kulotshiw? esiphambanweni sakhe
Igam? elihl? eliqinisayo Elith? uNkulunkulu luthando Uyasindisa bonke abakhe.
Esakh? isiphambano sisusa Zonk? izono zabasemhlabeni Siduduz? abadabukileyo Sihlambulul? abangcolileyo.

Siyaqinisa bonk? abalwayo Sibaph? amandl? ekulweni kwabo Sinqob? ukuf? okubahlulayo Senz? ithuna libelihle kubo.
Siyethabis? abalungileyo, Sibakhulul? ababoshiweyo, Sibongw? izingelos? ezulwini,
Siyethenjwa ngabasemhlabeni. Amen.

title: Ungafulatheli Nkosi ngisenkathazweni Ngezono zami ngikhal? eThempeleni lakho.
lyrics:
Isango livulelwa abazikhalelayo Mangingavalelwa Nkosi kodwa ngingeniswe.

Ungabuz? engakwenzayo emhlabeni Nkosi
Ngiyaz? amacala ami angingcolisayo.
Ngicel? umusa wakho Nkosi ngiyazithoba
Ngicel? isihawu sakho yiba nomsa kimi. Amen.

title: Isiphambano sikaJesu Kristu
lyrics:
Esila phambi kwethu siyakhazimula Ngokuba kuso wafa umSindisi Owaf? ukusihlenga ezonweni zethu.

Kwathi kuhlatshwa uhlangothi lwakhe Kwaphuma khona igazi kanye namanzi Ukuze sifumane won? umthombo Wokusihlambulula ensileni yonke.
Ligcwalisekil? izwi likaDavid Elakhulunywa nguye khona emandulo Ngokuba nangu oyiNkosi
Ebus? elenga esiphambanweni sakhe.
Muthi omuhle odumil? impela
Owaw? uthwele yena oyiNgcwelengcwele Uhlotshisiwe ngaw? umbal? obomvu Wegazi elophiswa umSindisi wethu.

Kuwo kwalinganiselwa intengo Intengo yokuhlawulela zonk? izoni Engakhokhelwa nguye yena yedwa UJesu yena ongumNqobi kaSatane.
Mawudunyiswe wen? ongubuThathu Ngendumiso efanele wena wedwa vo Wen? owahlula ngas? isiphambano Mawusibusise futh? usihole njalo. Amen.

title: Cula welulimi lwami Utuse impi enhle KaKristu owanqobayo Lapho afel? emthini
lyrics:
Wawuhleng? umhlaba wonke
Ngalokhu kufa kwakhe.

Waze wamhle siphambano Umhlel? imithi yonke Ngasisiqu nesithelo Kawufani namuthi Lukhulu lwalenga kuwe Ulukhuni lwenhlanhla.
Sesiphelel? isikhathi Wavum ukunikelwa Ahlupheke abulawe Ophis? igaz? emthini Wezela lokh? emhlabeni Wakwemkela ngothando.

Muthi okhazimulayo

Thobis? amagatsh? akho Uthambise nokuqina Kwakh? okungokwemvelo Iphatheke kahle kuwe INkos? enhle yeZulu.

Imfanele indumiso Uyise neNdodana
Kanye noMoya oNgcwele OmThathu ophakade EMunye ngokuphelele Okhonzwa yizidalwa. Amen.

title: Yizwa ngikutshele EkaNkulunkulu Yokuthandwa kwethu NgeNdodana yakhe.
lyrics:
Sazalwa nesono Ngokwemvelo yethu Sasisesonweni Sakhululwa nguye.
Yena wasibona Sihlez? ekoneni Wayenaluthando Lokub? asihlenge.


Wathum? iNdodana Kithi bantu bakhe Ukusibuyisa Nokusisindisa.

Weza waba ngumuntu Wazalelwa thina Wasifel? uJesu Emthini wehlazo.
Ngamanxeba akhe Ngemivimbo yakhe Babusisw? abantu Zasindisw? izoni. Amen.

title: Nkosi yiba nomsa kithi Thin? abantu bakho Siyizoni phambi kwakho Masingalahleki.
lyrics:
Sikhulule usihlanze Usithethelele Usivuse sikukhonze Ngezikhathi zonke.
Siyavuma sinecala Sikwenzil? okubi Asinakho ukulunga Singasizwe nguwe.
Senze Nkosi sibemhlophe Emehlweni akho Sihanjisw? uMoy? omuhle Endleleni yakho. Amen.
               87 (Siyakhany’ isiphambano) Siyakhany’ isiphambano

Esihamba phambi kwethu Esilenga umSindisi Owasihlawulelayo.

Wahlatshwa ohlangothini Kwaphum’ amanzi neGazi Lelochib’ elinqabile Okugeza kul’ izoni.
Kugcwalisekile manje Okwashiwo nguDavidi Nang’oyiNkosi yezizwe Ebusa nom’ ibethelwe.
Muthi omuhle wodumo Uthwel’ umzimba ongcwele Uhlobe ngombal’ obomvu OyiGazi lomSindisi.

Yalinganiselwa kuwe Intengokazi yezoni Engakhokhwa nguye yedwa OnguMnqobi kaSathane.
Mabakudumise bonke
Mthath’ eMunye ongoNgcwele Owasihlenga ngoJesu
Sibuse sonk’ usihole. Amen.

title: Kadunyisw? uJesu Owangophisela Lonk? iGazi lakhe Esiphambanweni.
lyrics:
Ngisindiswa ngalo leloGazi lakhe kabatshazwe njalo yena onomusa.
Mawubongwe njalo Lomfula oNgcwele Owahleng? isintu Emandlen? esono.
Bhek? iGazi lelo Elika Abela Lamemeza lathi Malikhokhiselwe.

Kodwa leloGazi LoMsindisi wethu Lithi eNkosini Masithethelelwe.
Zonk? izinhliziyo Ezifafaziwe Ngalo leloGazi Ziyahlanjululwa.
Ukulibabaza Kuxosh? uSathane Kuzijabulise Zonk? izingelosi.
Ngakho masivume Masilandelane Silibong? iGazi Elinqabileyo. Amen.

title: Nxa ngimbona uMsindisi Ef? esiphambanweni Mangidele yonk? imfuyo Nakh? ukuzidla kwami.
lyrics:
Mangenqabe imikhuba Ephambene neNkosi Konke engikhangwa yikho Ngikwale ngenxa yakhe.

Bhekani ikhanda lakhe Nezandla nezinyawo Yek? uthando, yek? usizi Olukhandene kuye.
Uba benginganikela Ngomhlaba nokukuwo Bekungeze kwalingana Nomhlatshelo kaKristu.
Mangimkhonze min? uqobo Ngengqondo nomphefumulo Nangamandla nenhliziyo Nakho konk? enginakho.
Yena owasisindisa Ngobunzima nosizi Kadunyiswe yibo bonke. Labo abahlengayo. Amen.

title: Khangelani uMsindisi Yena owasifela Nowahawukel? izoni Wazithwalel? izono.
lyrics:
Inkathazo, nenhlupheko Wakuzwa ngenxa yethu Bamqambela, bambethela Wafa engenasono.

Sisahamb? ebumnyameni
Singayazi indlela Wehla, weza emhlabeni Wazosikhanyisela.

Wazishiy? izingelosi Wabushiy? ubukhosi Ngenxa yezinswelo zethu Kanye nezono zethu.
Moya wami, bheka kuye LowoMsindisi wakho Umdumis? umthokozise Okuqedel? icala.

Ubozisondeza kuye USomandl? onomusa Uz? uhlale nabangcwele
Nithokoze phakade. Amen.

title: Wozani nam? asikhale
lyrics:
Asiye kuy? uMsindisi

Wozani phel? asilile
Usebethelwe uJesu.
Azikho yin? inyembezi Bamhlek? usul? abaJuda Bhekan? eleng? ethulile
Usebethelwe uJesu.
Eleng? esiphambanweni Wabakhulekela bonke Wacel? ukuba bamkelwe
Usebethelwe uJesu.

Masim? esiphambanweni
Igaz? eliphuma kuye
Lopha lophe phezu kwethu Usebethelwe uJesu.

Celani ukuzisola Kungasingathand? iNkosi Sikhaleli zono zethu
Kobethelwa ngenxa yethu. Amen

title: (WOZANI NAM’ASIKHALE)
lyrics:
Wozani nam’asikhale Asiye kuy’umsindisi Wozani phel’asilile Usebethelwe uJesu

Azikho yin’inyembezi Bamhlek’usul’abaJuda Bhekan’eleng’ethulile

Usebethelwe uJesu


Eleng’esiphambanweni Wabakhulekela bonke Wacel’ukuba bamkelwe Usebethelwe uJesu

Masim’esiphambanweni Igaz’eliphuma kuye
Lopha lophe phezu kwethu Usebethelwe uJesu

Celani ukuzisola Kungasingathand’iNkosi Sikhaleli zono zethu
Kobethelwa ngenxa yethu.	Amen.

title: Kukhon? intab? engaphandle kweJerusalema
lyrics:
INkosi yafa khona ukuze sisindiswe.

Thin? asinakho ukuyaz? inhlupheko yayo
Sikholw? ukuthi yalenga yafa ngenxa yethu.
Yathand? ukuba sifuman? ukuthethelelwa
Silunge siyeZulwini ngakho yasophela.

Nguye kuphela ongasihlawulel? icala
UJesu yedwa yena wasivulel? iZulu.

Owasithanda wasithanda nath? asimthande
Sithemb? igazi lakhe sihambise okwakhe. Amen.


                    93Wafa wafa uMkhululi Wafa ngenxa yabeqayo
    Imithetho yakhe Wafa ukubasindisa Wafa ukubangenisa
Ezulwini lakhe.
Haw? umusa awupheli
Haw? umusa usahlezi
    Nkosi siyizoni Nkosi usimangalisa Nkosi usijabulisa Ngento oyenzayo.

Ukukhumbula Nkosi Ukuhlawulela kwakho
   Amacala ethu Kunga kungahlala kithi Kuzihlabe kuzivuse
Inhliziyo zethu. Amen.

title: Refrain: Uyabongeka Nkosi
lyrics:
OnguMhlengi wethu Owake wadunyiswa Yibo abaJuda.

Ndodana kaDavidi UyiNkosi yethu Makabongwe ozayo Ngegama leNkosi.
      Refrain: Uyabongeka Nkosi Ibandla lengilosi
Likubonga njalo
Nabantu nakho konke Bakubonga njalo.
      Refrain: Uyabongeka Nkosi Abantu bakwaJuda
Beza namasundu Ukhonzwa yithi manje Sihuba sinxusa.
Refrain: Uyabongeka Nkosi

Bahuba bekubonga Ungakahlupheki
Laph? usuphezu konke
Udunyiswa yithi.
Refrain: Uyabongeka Nkosi

Wabemukela bona Semukele nathi Wena othand? ubuhle
Nkos? enhle nemnene.
Refrain: Uyabongeka Nkosi Amen.

title: Nans? imfihlakal? enkulu Yomzimb? obongekayo NeGaz? elinqabileyo Elophiselwa thina YiNkos? eyabanguMuntu Ukuze sisindiswe.
lyrics:
Yayizalw? iNkosi leyo Yazalelw? abomhlaba Yalihlwanyel? iqiniso Iphakathi kwabantu Kodwa bona bayihlupha Bayibulala kabi.
Ngobusuku bokugcina Idla nabaPostoli Ngokomthetho wamaJuda Yalenza iPhasika Yayisiguqul? umkhosi Wabalidili layo.

IZwi elabayinyama

Lenz? uMzimba ngesinkwa Lenz? iGazi ngewayini Kahlanzek? odla lokhu Lezi izimfihlakalo Mazibhekwe ngokholo.

Ngakho masilazisise Leli iSakramente Sekwadlul? okwakudala Nakhu manje okusha Sense sandelwe lukholo Sikubone ulapha.

Kadunyisw? uNkulunkulu UYise neNdodana Ahlonishw? atusw? abongwe Phakade, naphakade Nophuma kuye onaye
Kadunyiswe, athandwe. Amen.

title: Bathethelele Baba Benza ngokungazi Kwash? umSindisi wethu Lapho bembethela.
lyrics:
Akabasongelanga Ababembethela Wabacelel? okuhle Ngothand? olukhulu.
Wazizwa ngenxa yami Lezozinhlupheko

Ngithethelele nami Njengalabo Nkosi.

Emthini wabethelwa Ngokuzidla kwami Nobulukhuni bami Wabethelwa yimi.
Kaningi ngiweyisa Amazw? akho Nkosi Ngithethelele Jesu Ngenza ngokungazi.

Ngothando nenhlupheko Mabathethelelwe Abakudelelayo
Benza ngokungazi. Amen.

title: Nkos? ungikhumbule embusweni Kwasho ofayo komuny? ofayo UKholo lwabehlul? ubumnyama Lwabon? ubukhosi obuzayo.
lyrics:
Abubonakali ubukhosi Nomsebe okhanyisa ithemba Kubonakal? umqhele wameva Nezandla ezibuthakathaka.

Nokho yizwa uMsindisi ethi Namhl? uzoba nam? ePharadisi Ukholo lwaphendulwa ngothando Okhulekayo wabanethemba.

Uma ngikhuleka ekufeni Mangikubone ngokhol? ubusa Ngicabang? isiphambano sakho Ngize ngithi: Ngikhumbule Nkosi.
Izono zam? usuzihlanzile Khumbula mina ukhohlwe yizo Ngokufa kwakho sengixolelwe Igazi leNkosi langihlenga.
Ngikhumbule nxa ngedlula lapha Shono ngiqiniswe ngikhululwe Wethembise inhliziyo yami Namhl? uzoba nam? ePharadisi.
Amen.

title: Bheka esiphambanweni Nangu uMariy? ekhala Ebon? iNkos? ilenga Siyamhlab? enhliziyweni Siyamhlaba isinkemba Njengokwaphrofethwayo.
lyrics:
Yek? ukudabuka kwayo INtombi ebusisiwe Eyamzala oNgcwele
Yezw? ubuhlung? obukhulu Lapho imbon? ebethelwa Umntanayo oNgcwele.

Nxa sibona ubunzima

Benhlupheko yakh? unina
Singeyek? ukukhala Nxa sizindla ngal? usizi Ayeluzwa uMariya Sikhal? izinyembezi.
Ekuhluphekeni kwakhe Mangihlanganyele naye Mina engonileyo
Ngibe nas? isiboniso Senhlupheko abenayo Ngikhumbula laph? efa.

Wadelelwa yen? uJesu Wethwesw? umqhele wameva Ngenxa yezono zethu Wathethiswa amacala Walahlelwa ekufeni Sebemhlamuke bonke.
Jesu ngivikele njalo Ube nami ungithande Ngaso isiphambano Nxa ngimuka emhlabeni Ngingenise endaweni
Eyabangcwele bakho. Amen.

title: Khangela uMsindisi Ebethelw? emthini Ai uthand? olukuye Ukufel? izono.
lyrics:
Refrain: Ai imvan? eyophayo

Ehlatshelwe thina Ai ummeli wezoni Omelela thina.

O! Nkulunkulu wami Ungishiyeleni Waligebis? ikhanda Wafa ngenxa yethu.
Refrain: Ai imvan? eyophayo


Kwazamazam? umhlaba Ekufeni kwakhe Lafiphala Ilanga Kwaqhephuk? amatshe.
Refrain: Ai imvan? eyophayo


Bhek? icala lisuswe Ngenhlupheko yakhe Nakithi uzwakele Lowomusa wakhe.

Refrain: Ai imvan? eyophayo

title: Eyakhe yonk? imifula Ephuma ezintabeni Ihlokomis? izihosha Othi: Sengomile.
lyrics:
Yonk? inhlobo yobuhlungu Ababuzwayo abantu Buhlanganisw? egameni Alisho uJesu.
Womile yeb? ukomele Ukusindisa isintu Esamlahla sambulala Ungomele nami.

Wena oluthando ngiphe Ubabalo ngilomele Lobubuhlungu nokoma Wakuzwela mina. Amen.



               101 (Sekupheleliswe Konke) Sekupheleliswe konke
Kwash’ uJesu wasefa Sekupheleliswe konke Washo njalo kandafe Sekwaphela sekwaphela Yen’ umphilisi wafa.

Umhlaba wadikizela Uvuna umniniwo Laf’ ilanga eZulwini Imisebe yacisha
Kufa konke, kufa konke

Konke kwahlulw’ ukufa.


Sekupheleliswa konke Abeze ukukwenza
Nxa engafi angenqobe Weza, wafa, wanqoba Wasevuka, wasevuka Wakunqoba ukufa.

Sekupheleliswe konke Yizwani nina zoni Nani zingelosi nizwe Kuzwakele nakuphi
Ungumnqobi, ungumnqobi Kalokhu naphakade.

Sekupheleliswe konke Abeze ukukwenza Zon’ enidabukileyo Yizwan’ indaba enhle
Ungumnqobi, ungumnqobi Uninqobel’ isono.

Masivuke simbabaze

Osinqobel’ isitha
Bonk’ abantu bamdumise Nezingelosi futhi Kadunyiswe, kadunyiswe Kuleli naphezulu. Amen.



                102 (Nkosi Jesu Kuphelile) Nkosi Jesu kuphelile
Umoy’ usuhambile Wena onguNkulunkulu Sifunda kuw’ ukufa.

Umzimba wakho wasongwa Wabekwa elibeni Njengengubo esongiwe Waya ngaph’ umoya na?

Waya kwabasemnyameni Wayobakhanyisela OyiNkosi yabo bonke Angevinjelwe muntu.

Bheka esondez’ abakhe

Ephahlwe ukukhanya Bezwa amazwi amnene Abethabisa bonke.

Uyabafundisa bonke Ngokuthatha inyama Nangokubafela kwakhe Okuleth’ insindiso.

Abangcwele basendulo Bema naye bamphahla Bemdumisa bejabula Nangamanxeba akhe.

Uthi bonk’ abahlengiwe Mabeze baphumule Babushiye ubumnyama Bangen’ ePharadisi.






Usemi naye nomphangi Edumis’ ethokoza

Uwutholile umvuzo Lowo awethenjiswa.

Jesu Nkosi yabo bonke Sithele ngobabalo
Sithi sesidlule lapha Sifinyelele kuwe. Amen.

title: (Uphumule uJesu)
lyrics:
Uphumule uJesu Uselel’ elibeni
Usongwe ngezindwangu Izinyawo nomzimba Useyedw’ elibeni
Kuvalwe ngetsh’ emnyango.


UMariya wahlala Walinda kwaze kwahlwa Edabuke kakhulu Wahamba kungakasi Way’ ensimini leyo Laph’ ithuna likhona.

Ngolinda naye name Njalo nxa ngisekhona Yiba nendlu ebanzi Ehlala wena wedwa Kulenhliziyo yami Elukhuni sokwetshe.

Mangilethe amakha Othando ngikugcobe Kungabikho okunye Okuthandeka kimi Ngilinde ngingaphezi
Uz’ uzembule kimi. Amen.


               104 (Thimba lase Jerusalem) Thimba lase Jerusalem
Culani kamtoti Ngokwesasa okuNgcwele Inqobil’ imvana.

INgonyama yakwaJuda Inqobe isitha
Yabhonga kwelaba phansi Kwavuk’ abafile.

Yakhuphula ngezwi layo Abahlengiweyo Ezinzulwini zethuna Bamlandel’ uJesu.

Unqobile unamandla Usenkazimlweni
Bamkhonza bonk’ abaNgcwele Phansi naphezulu.

Nxa sibong’ iNkosi yethu Sicela umusa
Wokusisa kuy’ ekhaya Sibe khona nathi.

Kadunyisw’ uNkulunkulu Yise neNdodana
Kanye noMoya oNgcwele Nkulunkulu munye Haleluya. Amen

title: (UKristu uvukile, Haleluya)
lyrics:
UKristu uvukile, Haleluya Sihuba sijabula, Haleluya Wafa kanye emthini, Haleluya Wahlawulele thina, Haleluya.

Ngakho thin’ asimbonge, Haleluya INkosi yaphakade, Haleluya Eyadlul’ ekufeni, Haleluya.
Nxa insindis’ izoni, Haleluya.
Ngezinhlupheko zakhe, Haleluya Sithole insindiso, Haleluya Usebus’ eZulwini, Haleluya
Edunyisw’ ingelosi, Haleluya.	Amen.


            106 (Haleluya Sekuphelile ukulwa) Haleluya, Haleluya, Haleluya
Sekuphelile ukulwa Sekunqotshiwe ukufa Masibonge sonke sithi:
Haleluya.
NgeSonto wavuka futhi Enodumo ezobusa Masihalalise sithi
Haleluya.
Amandl’ obunyama alwa Kodw’ uJesu wawachitha Masimpompoloze sithi:
Haleluya.

Sivaliwe isihogo Selivuliwe izulu Masihube sisho sithi:
Haleluya.
Nkosi ngemivimbo yakho Sikhululiw’ ekufeni
‘Kuze sithi kuwe njalo Haleluya. Amen.

title: (Uvukile uKristu)
lyrics:
Uvukile uKristu Uphumil’ elibeni Yizwanin’ ingelosi
Ziyahlokoma zithi: Haleluya.
Yen’ owafela thina Wadela ukuphila UyiMvan’ eyahlatshwa
Nathi simbonga sithi: Haleluya.
Wathwala ubuhlungu Waf’ esiphambanweni Usenkazimulweni
Usenxusela khona, Haleluya.
Wehlela Kwabaphansi Ngendlela engaziwa Wanqoba isiqhwaga Usethwele umqhele, Haleluya.

Owalal’ elibeni Usephakanyisiwe Onk’ amaKristu athi
Uyimvana neNkosi, Haleluya.

Wathi shumayelani Ngenkululo yezoni Eziphendukileyo
Zize zingen’ izulu, Haleluya.
Kristu, Phasika lethu Yondla obahlengile Sus’ isono necal
Khona sohlala sithi: Haleluya.	Amen.


             108 (Haleluya, Hubelani iNkosi) Haleluya, Haleluya
Hubelani iNkosi
Nge nhliziyo nangomlomo Nibonge ngentokozo uJesu Kristu iNkosi Owabethelw’ emthini Wophela ukusihlenga Uvukil’ ekufeni.

Ivukile iNgqalabutho Yesivun’ esingcwele Isivuno sophelela Mhla efik’ isibili Amabele avuthiwe AngamaKrist’ amahle
Ayakuma phambi kwakhe Evukil’ ekufeni.

Nath’ esevuke noKristu Siph’ ubabalo lwakho Oluyimvula yezulu Evel’ ekukhanyeni

Size sithel’ izithelo Siselaph’ emhlabeni Silandwe yizingelosi Siyoba naye njalo.
Haleluya, kongu Yise Ophezu kwakho konke Haleluya, kumSindisi Ozuze ukunqoba Haleluya nakuMoya UMthombo wobuNgcwele Haleluya, Haleluya
kuNkulunkulu munye. Amen.


                109 (Uthando lwayinqoba) Uthando lwayinqoba
Eyesitha impi Laphum’ ilanga lethu Elingashoniyo.
Yize itshe nomlindi Kuyize nokufa UJesu uhambile Way’ ePharadisi.
INKosi iyaphila Bonke bazophila Luph’ udosi lukufa Neqholo leliba.
Masimlandele uKristu Laph’ekhona manje Simhluphekele lapha

Khon’ eyosivusa.
Mawudunyiswe Nkosi Luvuko nomNqobi Udunyiswe kuleli Nakweliphezulu

Haleluya, Halelu Hale	Haleluya Haleluya, Halelu
Hale	Haleluya. Amen


NB: The refrain “Haleluya” can either be sung at the end of the last verse or it can also be sung after each verse.

title: (INkos’ ivukile)
lyrics:
INkos’ ivukile Yakufeza konke Ikhulule abathunjwa Yahlula ukufa.
INkos’ ivukile Laphangw’ iGehena Ivuke nabahlengiwe Ezobusa nabo.
INkos’ ivukile Ayisenakufa Iphilele ukumela Eyabafelayo.

INkos’ ivukile

Mazizw’ ingelosi Ziyobikela izulu Lezindab’ ezinhle.

Thathan’ izigubhu Nihub’ izingoma Kuze kwenanel’ izulu
Nihubel’ iNkosi. Amen.

title: (MHLA KUVUKWA KWOHLANGANA)
lyrics:
Mhla kuvukwa kwohlangana Imizimba nemimoya Kuyophela lonk’usizi Nobuhlungu.

Lapha yahlukana khona Iphumule imizimba Ithulile ibhekile Lolusuku.

Kepha imimoya yethu Iyohlala ikhuleka
Mhla kuvukwa siyobonga Ngamahubo.

Khona iyakuhlangana Imizimba nemimoya Isifuze yen’uKristu Yenamile.

Yek’ubuhle nenjabulo Yal’usuku lokuvuka Injabulo emi njalo Engedlule.

Mhla kuvukwa bohlangana Ab’ahlukanisw’ukufa Nawoyise nawonina Nabantwana.

O! sengathi Jesu Kristu Singabambelela kuwe Mhla kufiwa mhla kwabiwa Ube nathi.	Amen

title: (Uvukile uKristu)
lyrics:
Uvukile uKristu Kulo iliba lakhe Ukwehlulil’ ukufa

Waphuma elibeni Behlulek’ abalindi Bahlehla bawa phansi.

Ngakho abantu bonke Kuhle bahlabelele Ngokuthokoza ngaye Ongumhlengi wesintu Wavuka elibeni Waphindel’ embusweni.

Wen’ oyiNkosi yethu Nguw’ osisindisayo Thina abantu bakho
Ngamandla akh’ amakhulu Siph’ ukuvuka nawe
Size sibuse nawe. Amen.



                 113 (Ngqazukani nonke) Ngqazukani nonke
Namhla ngolwenjabulo nentokozo INkos’ ivukile
Yavuka ingqalabutho yoqobo ‘Kuba kayifanga
Ngabe sabhubha sonke Namhla ivukile
‘Kuze nathi sivuke, sivuke,	Sivuke sikuyo.
Wehlulwe Sathane Jabhake kufa dela Hayidesi Uliqhawe ngaphi?

Iqhawe lamaqhawe likwehlule Wehlel’ ekufeni
Umholi weyakithi Was’ uhleka wena
Lapha usudangele, wadela, Wadela, wesaba.


Amasango onke Asegengelezile yizwa moni Usisebenzele
Umqondis’ opheth’ izinhluthulelo Wehla wayokhipha AbaseHayidesi
Ngakho thina nabo
Wasivulel’ ikhaya, ikhaya, ikhaya phezulu. Amen.

title: (Uvukile uKristu)
lyrics:
Uvukile uKristu Masize kuye sonke Siyibonge imvana Eyahlatshelwa thina Sihuba namhla sithi Uvukile uJesu Uyabusa phakade Kayikuphinda afe.

Mvana engenasici Wanqob’ isitha sethu Wagqabul’ izibopho Sakhishwa ekufeni Namhla masikubonge Sihub’ igama sithi Uvukile uJesu

Kayikuphinde afe.
Kristu ohlatshwe kanye Ngenxa yezono zethu Wen’ oyingqalabutho Yabo abaleleyo Usuhlez’ ezulwini UyiNkos’ ephilayo Usiqinisa njalo
Size siphile ngawe.	Amen.

title: (UKristu uvukile)
lyrics:
UKristu uvukile Thina asesab’ ukufa UJesu uvukile Singeboshwe elibeni Haleluya.

UKristu uvukile Sesithola ukuphila Lelithemb’ esinalo Lisisiza ekufeni Haleluya.
UKristu uvukile
Yen’ owafa ngenxa yethu Masivuke simbonge Sihambis’ okwakhe njalo Haleluya.

UKristu uvukile Singehlukaniswe naye Ngempilo nangokufa Nagamandla eGehena Haleluya.

UKristu uvukile
Uyabus’ umhlaba wonke Nkosi siph’ ukubusa Kanye nawe njalo njalo Haleluya.	Amen.



            116 (Jabulani bantu nithi Haleluya) Jabulani bantu nithi Haleluya
Asimbong’ uKristu osihlengileyo Wasethul’ umthwalo weGibhith’ onzima Wasidabulel’ ulwandle olubomvu.

Sewufik’ umkhosi onobuhle bonke Onedili lethu elethabisayo
Thina bendlu yakho iJerusalema Senze simemeze ngokuvuka kwakho

Owafa walala kwaba nsukuntathu Uvukele thina langa laphakade Zonk’ izono zethu sezinjengeliqhwa Ziyancibilik’ ukubalele kwakho.
Siyadumisa Nkulunkul’ uYise Sithi Haleluya kuwe Jesu Kristu Nkosi yaphakade eyanqob’ ukufa
Haleluya kuwe Moya oyiNgcwele. Amen.

               117 (Ngosuku lokwenyuka) Ngosuku lokwenyuka,
Sibong’ uNkulunkulu, NgeNkosi yethu’ uJesu, Engena ezulwini.

Wahlangatshezwa khona, Libandla lengelosi Lincom’ udumo lwakhe, Umhlengi wabomhlaba
Wazithoba kakhulu, Wehlela emhlabeni, Wazokufela thina, AbenguMhlengi wethu.
Wavuka ekufeni, Wabonakal’ ephila, Waba fundis’ abakhe, Izindaba zombuso.

Wath’uba baqede konke Wenyukel’eZulwini Izulu lavulek
Wangena engumnqobi


Usesebukhosini Ekhonzwa zingelosi Nokho uyabamela, Bonke abantu bakhe.

Masimlandele njalo

Siselaph’ emhlabeni Ukuba ezulwini, Sihlale naye njalo.

Mabandl’ asezulwini, Esinikuye,
Ake nisinxusele,
KuJes’ iNkosi yethu. Amen. NB: First tune- repeat last line.

title: (Namhla sibong’ uJesu; Haleluya)
lyrics:
Namhla sibong’ uJesu; Haleluya Enyukel’ ezulwini; Haleluya Owahlatshelw’ izoni; Haleluya Uyangen; ezulwini; ; Haleluya.

Unendaw’ ephakeme; Haleluya Vulekani masango; Haleluya Unqobe konk’ okubi; Haleluya Kangene uyiNkosi; Haleluya.
Wemukelwe yizulu; Haleluya Keph’ usenathi laph; Haleluya Nom’ ebuyel’ ekhaya; Haleluya Uyasithand’ isintu; Haleluya.
Nango elul’ izandla; Haleluya Lez’ ezinamanxeba; Haleluya Yizwa umlomo wakhe; Haleluya Ubusisa ibandla; Haleluya.
UsunguMmeli wethu; Haleluya ‘Sinxusela ngokufa; Haleluya ‘Silungisel’ indawo; Haleluya Ingqalabutho yethu; Haleluya.

Nkosi usunyukele; Haleluya Phezulu ezulwini; Haleluya Senyuse ngenhliziyo; Haleluya Sifinyelele kuwe; Haleluya.	Amen.



                119 (Uvukil’ uJesu Kristu) Uvukil’ uJesu Kristu
Ululibo lwabalele Luphi udosi lokufa Nokunqoba kwaliliba.

Bhek’ izandla nezinyawo Nobuso naluhlangothi Lapho bamlimaza khona Wakunqoba konke lokho.
Khothamani phambili kwakhe Mabandla asezulwini
Yena uyiNkosi yenu Ngoba ukubusa konke.
Nin’ abakhe emhlabeni Hubelan’ udumo lwakhe Wezela ukunihlenga Nibe nokuphila ngaye.
Wenyukela ezulwini Ukuba animelele Anilungisel’ indawo
Bandla dumisan’ iNkosi. Amen.

title: (Haleluya bong’uJesu)
lyrics:
Haleluya bong’uJesu OyiNkos’ebusayo Haleluya unguMnqobi Wehlul’izitha zonke Yizwa kuzwakel’mdumo Okomful’ungenisa Ngob’uJesu ehlengile Kuzo zonke izizwe.

Haleluya asikhali Njengabahluphekile Haleluya useduze Nom’engabonakali Wenyukela ezulwini Laph’ebusela khona Nokho usahlezi nathi Njengoba ethembisa.

Haleluya thinabakho Siphethwe nguwe njalo

Haleluya zonk’izoni Zibalekele kuwe
Wena ongummeli wethu Wahlenga abomhlaba Simelele nathi Nkosi Phambi koPhezukonke.

Haleluya Simakade UyiNkosi yodumo Haleluya wen’ozalwa Yintombi uMariya Usungene ezulwini Wembeth’inyama yethu Inyama osipha yona
Esidlwen’esingcwele. Amen.

title: (UNkulunkulu endulo)
lyrics:
UNkulunkulu endulo Wehlika ngamandla Kwakukhona phansi kwakhe Umlilo nomnyama.

Kwathi’esephinda esebuya Wafika ngothando
UMoya oNgcwele weza Kubantu bebandla.

Umlilo waseSisinayi Wabethusa’abantu Umlilo ePentekhoste Waleth’intokozo.

Icilong’elakhalayo Nomsindo omkhulu Kwathuthumel’ingelosi Zizwa lowomsindo.

Mhla kwehla uMoy’oNgcwele Ezophemb’ibandla Kwavunguz’uMoy’omkhulu Kwezwakala kude.

Usagcwele ebandleni UMoya oNgcwele Inhliziy’ezilukhuni Angengene kuzo.

Wazohlala kithi Nkosi Usiphe udlebe Siholel’ensindisweni Moya oyiNgcwele. Amen.

title: (Woza Moya oNgcwele)
lyrics:
Woza Moya oNgcwele Mawusikhanyisele Icebis’abampofu Imisebe eNgcwele Ilungis;inhliziyo Ib’ukukhanya kwethu.

Wena ongumduduzi Ofunwa ngumphefumulo Ngoba uyahlulela
Usitha isivuvu Uphumuz’0khathele Umduduz’olusizi.

K uklhanya kwaphezulu Usigcwalise ngawe

Khanyisa kithi sonke Asilutho ungekho Singekwenze okuhle Kungcole konk’okwethu.

Siyagula selaphe Usabele amandla Usesule izono Ugobe umiselo Usiph’intshisekelo Usihambise kahle.

Kwabakukhonza kahle Bevuma wena njalo Thela izipho zakho Baph’umvuzo wobuhle Ubaphe insindiso Nenjabulo zafuthi. Amen

title: (Sondela Moya oNgcwele)
lyrics:
Sondela Moya oNgcwele Sithele ngokwaseZulwini Uwena ongasiphamandla

Ngezipho ezipheleleyo.


Okwakho okwaseZulwini Okokuphila nokothando Sinike njalo ukukhanya Sizimpumputhe ungenathi.

Sigeze lapha singcolile Ngomusa wakho ongapheli Sinike ukuthul’ekhaya Kukuhle laph’ubusa khona.

Sibong’uYise neNdodana Sibonga nawe onguMoya Sisize sifundise manje Ihubo lokubong’elithi:
Ufanele ukubongwa Wena onguNkulunkulu

NB: Words are syllable extra.

title: (Moya oyingcwele)
lyrics:
Moya oyingcwele

Woza kithina Usikhanyisele Enhliziyweni.

Siyakulahleka Nxa ungenathi Vuz’izinhliziyo Ezicelayo.

Moya oyingcwele Woza kithina Wenze simazise Ongumkhululi.

Siholele Nkosi KumHlengi wethu Sifumane kuye Intethelelo.

Moya oyiNgcwele Wozakithina Uzihlanzisise Izinhliziyo.

Siyathemba wena Othembekile Siyabonga wena Olungisayo. Amen

title: (Nkosi Moya oyiNgcwele)
lyrics:
Nkosi Moya oyiNgcwele Sicel’ubuse kithi
Ngomsa wakho ukhanyise Zonk’izinhliziyo zethu.

Phefumula phezu kwethu Sibe nakh’ukulunga Sifuman’amandla kuwe Simahlule umyengi.

Thela namhla phezu kwethu Zonke izipho zakho Zokulungisa lapha
Sifanele izulu.


Masithokoziswe yikho Lokh’okuvela kuwe

Sikuthande nge’nhliziyo Ezifundiswe nguwe.

Awuvul’amehlo ethu Abon’indlela yakho Siqhubeke kahle kuyo Ngenjabul’engapheli.

Sengathi singakukhonza Nkosi laph’emhlabeni Uze usiphakamise
Sibe nawe phakade.


Masimaze onguYise Naye oyiNdodana Nawe Moy’oyiNngwcele
UmTath’eMunye njalo. Amen

title: (UJes’umSindisi wethu wabatshel’abakhe)
lyrics:
UJes’umSindisi wethu wabatshel’abakhe Wath’uyoza onganenza nibe Ngcwele.

Wenyukela azulwini wathumela kubo

UMoya oNgcwele abathokozise.


Namanje ukhona kithi ngezikhathi zonke Uphila enhliziyweni yothobile.

Uyena osikhuzayo nxa sesikhona Siyanqoba ngaye konk’okusehlulayo.

Nxa senz’okuhle siqiniswa ngamandla ache Simnqoba uSathane nempi yakhe.

Wena Moy’oNngcwele hlala kithina njalo njalo Sihlolwqe nguwe imihla yonke yethu. Amen

title: (Vuthisa, Jes’umlilo wakho)
lyrics:
Vuthisa, Jes’umlilo wakho Wez’ukuphonsa emhlabeni, Usithelel’uthando lwakho Sivuthe njalo emoyeni.

Ikhona kumbe, inhlansana Efihlwe khona emlotheni;

Vuthela, Nkosi, lomlilwana Uvuthe njalo enhliz’weni!

Uwenze lowomlilo wande, Afudumal’osepholile; Nezitha zethu sizithande Ngothando esilutholile.

Usheshe uze kithi, Nkosi! Siyaluding’uthando lwakho. Sophule, Jesu kulengozi, Phuthuma ngobubele bakho!

Sibenamandl’okuhambisa Indaba yakho emhlabeni. Sengathi ungabasindisa Abantu abasezonweni!

Nangomhla siyoshiya umhlaba, Lomlilo uvuthe elathini; Singabi nakho ukwesaba,
Mhla sizobizwa eNkosini.

title: (Sihawukele Nkosi yethu sicela kuwe)
lyrics:
Sihawukele Nkosi yethu sicela kuwe
Yiba nomusa kithina wen’ ongubuThathu.


Wena esingekuqonde sizithoba kuwe Yiba nomusa kithina wen’ ongubuThathu.

Kungakenziw’ izintaba nesibhabhaka Wen’ oyiNkosi wawukhona uhlezi wedwa.

Simangala sizibona izint’ ozenzayo
Wen’ onguMenzi unobuhle unamandl’ onke.


Ngeke seza phambi kwakho ungasibizanga Sihawukele ngomusa wen’ ongubuThathu. Amen.



            129 (Ngcwele, Ngcwele, Ngcwele) Ngcwele, Ngcwele, Ngcwele, Nkosi, uSomandla, Siyakuhubela wena singaphezi
Ngcwele, Ngcwele, Ngcwele, Wen’ onesihawu Onqobo Ntathu, ube uMunye.

Ngcwele, Ngcwele, Ngcwele, wen’ odunyiswayo

Ngabangcwele bonke bethul’ imiqhele, Nengelosi zonke, ziwa phambi kwakho Wen’ uphelele ngendlela zonke.

Ngcwele, Ngcwele, Ngcwele, wen’ ongabonwayo, Nom’ udumo lwakho lungebonwe muntu, Ungongcwele kakho olingene nawe
Wen’ uphelele ngendlela zonke.


Ngcwele, Ngcwele, Ngcwele, Nkosi uSomandla Konke okwakho kuyakubonga wena
Ngcwele, Ngcwele, Ngcwele, wen’ onesihawu, Onqobo Ntathu, ube umunye.

title: (Nkulunkul’ obusayo)
lyrics:
Nkulunkul’ obusayo BuThathu ebunyeni Sizwe nxa sikhuleka Sikuhubela.

Wen’ okhanyisa konke Sikhanyisela sonke

Usiphefumulele Ngothando lwakho.

Wen’ okhanyisa konke Siphe intethelelo Usiphe nokuthula Okuphelele.

BuThathu obuNgcwele Sikubona ngokholo Sizuz’ umqhele wethu SinabaNgcwele. Amen.

title: (Woza Nkosi yethu)
lyrics:
Woza Nkosi yethu Ongamandla ethu Usisize
Baba okhanyayo Wena onqobayo Wena osizayo Usibheke.

Jesu Mbusi wethu Nqob’ izitha zethu Uzahlule
Vez’ amandla akho Ubahleng’ abakho Inhliziyo yabo
Ime kuwe.


Moya OyiNgcwele Woz’ uzosihola Sibusise Uzihlanzisise Inhliziyo zethu Ubephezu kwethu Silungise.

Nkulunkulu munye Wen’ ongubuThathu Mawubongwe
Thina size kuwe Embusweni wakho Nobukhosi bakho Sibubone. Amen.

title: (Wen’ ovele usisiza)
lyrics:
Wen’ ovele usisiza Olithemba lethu Uyisivikelo sethu Nekhay’ elimiyo.

Abangcwele bakho Nkosi Baphephele kuwe Simelwe ukulwethemba Uvikelo lwakho.

Ungakenziwa umhlaba Nokuny’ okukuwo Wawukhona wena Nkosi Okhona phakade.

Kuwe Nkosi iminyaka Ifana nosuku
Idlulisa okwekhwezi Elimika kusa.

Njengemiful’ egcweleyo

Bayadlul’ abantu Bakhohlakala masinya Kanjengephupho nje.

Nkulunkulu Msizi wethu Olithemba lethu
Yiba ngumvikeli wethu Usiyis’ ekhaya. Amen.

title: (Uyingcwele Ophezulu)
lyrics:
Uyingcwele Ophezulu Wenz’ izinto zonke
Wenz’ umhlaba wenz’ izulu Ngobukhosi bakhe.

Uyingcwel’ uNkulunkulu Ngayebongwa njalo, Wasithanda wasidala Ngobukhulu bakhe.

Wasinika umntanakhe Weza emhlabeni,

Waba nguMkhululi wethu Ezonweni zethu.

Thin’ abantu siyizoni Yasifela ngakho Indodana yakh’ uJesu Umsindisi wethu.

Sifumana yen’ uJesu Esakramenteni Elomzimba nal’ iGazi Asiphile lona.

Uyingcwele Ophezulu, Makabongwe njalo, Wasithanda wasifela NgeNdodana yakhe. Amen.

title: (Ngobuhle balomhlaba)
lyrics:
Ngobuhle balomhlaba Nobesibhakabhaka Ngothand’ esilugqoke

Selokhu sabakhona Nkosi yethu sihuba Ihubo lokubonga.

Ngobuhle bezikhathi Zonyaka nezosuku Nobuhle bezintaba Nobelanga nenyanga Nkosi yethu sihuba Ihubo lokubonga.

Ngenxa yokujabula Komzali nabantwana Nokwezihlobo zethu Nangakho konk’ okunye Nkosi yethu sihuba Ihubo lokubonga.

Ngezipho zonk’ oziphe Abesizwe sakithi Ngobabal’ oluNgcwele Ngokuhloba komhlaba Nkosi yethu sihuba Ihubo lokubonga.


Ibandla lakho Liphakamis’ izandla Ngomhlatshelo wothando Eliwunikelayo
Nkosi yethu sihuba Ihubo lokubonga. Amen.

title: (Unamandl’ uSimakade)
lyrics:
Unamandl’ uSimakade Zonk’ izinto zenzwa nguye UyiNkosi yamabandla Aphezulu eZulwini.

Ulungil’ iSimakade Nemithetho yakhe yonke Kodwa thina sidukile Sinecala phambi kwakho.

Unokwaz’ uSimakade Uyazaz’ izinto zonke Thin’ abantu asizazi

Sinokwazi okuncane.


Uyingcwel’ uSimakade Singevele phambi kwakhe Kodwa uyasivumela Ngayo iNdodana yakhe.

Unomus’ uSimakade Usiphethe sonke ngawo Kufanele ukunxusa
Konk’ okuhle singesabi. Amen.

title: Ukubantu bakho Nkosi Ngezikhathi zonke, Ubagcina ubasiza Endaweni zonke.
Nxa bewela imifula Usenabo Wena,
lyrics: Nxa beshiswa nangomlilo, Usenabo Wena.

title: Lapho behlupheka khona Bayamelwa nguwe, Nasezingozini Nkosi Bavikelwa nguwe.
Bayabheka kuwe Nkosi Bonke abantu bakho, Bakuthande wena Baba Bakwethembe njalo.
Bayabonga Wena, Baba NeNdodana futhi
lyrics: Nawe Moya oyiNgcwele Nkulunkulu munye.	Amen.

title: (Baba uyamangalisa)
lyrics:
Baba uyamangalisa Ngobukhulu bakho Yek’ ubuhle besihlalo Sakho sobukhosi.

Ngiyakholwa Nkosi yami

Ngiyathuthumela Ngiyakukhonza nginethemba Nginezinyembezi.

Umi njal’ uyesabeka Nkosi yaphakade Ebusuku nasemini Kudunyiswa wena.

Nokho Bab’ uyathandeka Mninimandla onke Ngokuba ufun’ uthando Lwenhliziyo yami.

Yek’ ubuhle nesimanga Obukhona kuwe Amandla nenhlakanipho Awunas’ isici.

Olomzali lon’ uthando Alungangolwakho Ubekezelela konke Engikonileyo.
Baba Yise weNdodana

Kuyamangalisa
Ukugaqa phambi kwakho Ngikubonge wena

title: (Lihle Nkos’ igama lakho)
lyrics:
Lihle Nkos’ igama lakho Emhlabeni wonke Umisil’ udumo lwakho Phezu kwamazulu.

Mina ngiyawukhumbula Umsebenzi wakho Ophezulu eZulwini Omisiwe nguwe.

Usenzile sangaphansi Kwengelosi zakho Kodwa wasiphakamisa Sibe phezu kwazo.

Zonk’ izimvu nezinkomo Nezilwan’ ezinye

Nezinyoni nezinhlanzi Nakho konk’ okunye.

Emlonyeni wezingane Uvezil’ amandla Ukub’ uthulise njalo Abayimpi kuwe.

Thina Nkosi semitone Sikhunjuliwe nguwe Ngabe wabona kithi Ukub’ uze kithi.

Usenzile siwuphathe Umsebenzi wakho Ubekile phansi kwethu Zonk’ izinto zakho.

Nkosi lihl’ igama lakho Emhlabeni wonke Ulenzile lidunyiswe
Phezu kwakho konke. Amen.

title: (Umnene uSomandla)
lyrics:
Umnene uSomandla Ezweni lethu lonke Yez’ iNdodana yakhe Yab’ umSindisi wethu.

Yasuka eZulwini Yazosifela sonke Yabethelw’ emuthini Ithwel’ izono zethu.

Namhla uyasibiza Uba silahl’ izono Samukel’ iNdodana Singay’ ekulahlweni.

Masamukel’ uJesu Ab’ umSindisi wethu Asibus’ asihole
Size sibuse naye. Amen.

title: (Baba wasenza thina)
lyrics:
Baba wasenza thina Wen’ onamandla onke Unomusa kubobonke Abadaliwe nguwe.

Usiph’ ukudla kwethu Usiphe nezingubo Silondoloze sonke
Thin’ esiphethwe nguwe.


Ulizwi wab’ inyama Wahlala nathi sonke Wez’ ukusisindisa Sibon’ umbuso wakhe.

Ngakho sikubabaza Siphakamis’ udumo Sibonga ngenhliziyo
Sikhonza ngokubonga. Amen.



141(Nkosi enomusa Mdali wesintu)

Nkosi enomusa Mdali wesintu Wen’ ulilanga sikhanyiswa nguwe Nguwe wedwa olithemba lesizwe Nkosi yamabandla.

Sizwe namuhla siyacela kuwe Amaz’ olwandle ayasivukela Izitha kithi ziyasihlomela
Uz’ usisize.


Uz’ usisize nxa siphel’ amandla Uz’ usisize nxa sihlushw’ izitha Kungesinqobe ukona nokufa Uma unathi.

Nkosi sisize kubalek’ izitha Usiph’ amandla ukuze sinqobe Sizinqobe qede sikhuphukele Kuwe phezulu. Amen.

title: (Wen’ obus’ eZulwini)
lyrics:
Wen’ obus’ eZulwini

Onomusa nokwazi Konk’ ukuphila kwethu Kungezwi lakho lodwa Wasenza emhlabeni Sihole ngezwi lakho Zonk’ izikhathi zethu Usilungise kahle.

Uhlela izikhathi Zempilo nezokufa Nengcebo nokuswela Izinhlanhla namashwa Ukwenama nosizi Nokulingwa kokubi Makusenze siqine Ngawo amandla akho.

Wena olungileyo Unomusa nothando Sibheka kuwe njalo Asesabi okubi Ngokub’ ungumvikeli
Wen’ ongumhlengi wethu Singabantwana bakho

Wena unathi njalo. Amen.

title: (Kukhon’ incwadi..)
lyrics:
Kukhon’ incwadi abantu bangafunda yona Bangafunda nxa bekholiwe enhliziyweni.

UNkulunkul’ angaziwa ngabayifundayo Izint’ ezenziwa ngayo ziyincwadi leyo.

Izulu libonakele kubo bonk’ abantu Lisitshengisa uthando asiphethe ngalo.

Ilanga likhanyis’ inyanga isikhanyisele Owenz’ ilanga umi njal’ ekhanyis’ ibandla.

Uyena umSindisi okhanya njengezulu Abakhe bayomphahla njengayo inkanyezi.

Izipho zakhe ziyehla kuhle kwamazolo Akuzwakali lutho kumila konk’ okuhle.

Igama lakhe lidunyiswa izingelosi Ulwandle ngokuduma kwalo luyadimisa.

Umlil’ odumayo nesiphepho esikhulu Kutshengis’ amandla akhe asesabisayo.

Umoy’ othambileyo osiphephetha kahle Uyasitshela ngay’ ongoMoya enomusa.

Ngalezozinto sibon’ esikufihlelweyo Amnyama amehlo abo abavam’ ukona.

Usinik’ amehlo Nkos’ usiphe nenhliziyo
Ukuba sibone ngakho lokh’ okwenzileyo. Amen.

title: (E! Malus’ omuhle Jesu)
lyrics:
E! Malus’ omuhle Jesu Othand’ izimvu zakhe Usiphethe kahle njalo Thina abantu bakho Uma usisiza manje Kungaphel’ ukuswela.

E! Malusi ungashiyi

Thin’ abomhlaba wakho Usihole endleleni
Yakho ngentando yakho Usisize usihole Sikulandele njalo.

Gez’ izinhliziyo zethu Ngegazi lakho Jesu Lanele lona lilodwa Ukususa izono Elembuzi nelenkomo Lingezisus’ izono.

Akusifundise kahle Ngezwi lakh’ eliNgcwele Siqinise siligcine Ngothando nobabalo Kukhanyele bonk’ abantu Ukuthi singabakho.



Sifundis’ ukukubonga Sikubong’ emhlabeni Sikubonge wena wedwa

Sibong’ ukusalusa Sibonge naseZulwini
Namabandl’ aphezulu. Amen.

title: (Usekhona umSindisi)
lyrics:
Usekhona umSindisi Usekhon’ uyaphila Sinethemba thina zoni Ngob’ uphilela thina.

Wafa yena umSindisi Ukuf’ okunqabile Wabulawa ngenxa yethu Size thina singafi.

Uvukile umSindisi Ngovuko lokunqoba Kanakufa futhi ngoba Sewakunqob’ ukufa.

Wenyukela ezulwini Phezu kwamazul’ onke Uyasimelela thina

Ngoba yen’ unguMmeli.


Uyanxusa umSindisi OnguMnxuseli wethu Ukuba siyek’ okubi Sithole insindiso

Uyathandwa umSindisi Ngenxa yothando lwakhe Kabatshazwe kadunyiswe UyiNkosi yodumo. Amen.

title: (Jes’ ungumalusi wethu)
lyrics:
Jes’ ungumalusi wethu Sithembela kuwe
Wena unguMbusi wethu Singabantu bakho.

Wasifuna silahleka Weza unomusa Wasihlanza wasamukela Emhlambini wakho.

Siyabong’ umusa wakho Osiphethe ngawo
Onke amacala ethu Wawathwala wena.

Imizimba ingeyakho Sokukhonza ngayo Zingezakho nenhliziyo Sokuthanda ngazo.

Zonk’ izono sozishiya Sizwe izwi lakho Singenqabe ukuhlushwa Senz’ intando yakho.

Hlala kithi usisize Lapha emhlabeni Ekufeni usamkele Kuwe ezulwini. Amen.

title: (Igazi lakho Nkosi)
lyrics:
Igazi lakho Nkosi Lophiselwa mina Ukuba ngikhululwe Ngivusw’ ekufeni
Ngingabonga ngani kuwe Wena owa ngifelayo.

Miningi iminyaka Ungihluphekela Ukuba ngikhuliswe Ngibe nawe njalo Sengikhonze isikhathi Esingakanani Nkosi.

Wasuka ezulwini Walishiy’ ikhaya Wavuma ukudinga Uhamb’ emhlabeni Ngigadela ntoni mina Ukuba uz’ udunyiswe.

Wathwala ubuhlungu Obungachazeki Ukuba ngisindisiwe

Ngingay’ eGehena Wabuthwala ngenxa yami Ngingabonga ngani kuwe.

Impela kufanele Ngihamb’ endleleni Ethandekayo kuwe Ngizwe, ngisabele Wazinikelela mina
Sengizinikela kuwe. Amen.

title: (Amakhos’ alomhlaba)
lyrics:
Amakhos’ alomhlaba Adume ngokuthumba Ujesu yen’ udume Ngokusindis’ abantu.

Yigama lakhe lodwa Elinikezw’ abantu Livis’ abafileyo Libayis’ ezulwini.

Lokh’ akwenzay’ uJesu Ukunihlawulela Leyonsindiso yenu Niyakuyilahla na?

Ngenxa yalelogama Thwalan’ isiphambano Nimfele ngenjabulo Ukufa wakunqoba.

Wena ovum’ ukuthi Ungumhlobo wezoni

Sizwe nxa sikhuleka Sibong’ igama lakho.

Kadunyiswe uYise Kanye nawe Ndodana Nay’ uMoya oNgcwele
Unkulunkulu Munye. Amen.

title: (Igama elithi Jesu)
lyrics:
Igama elithi Jesu Lithandwa ngabakhe Liyaduduza lelaphe Lixoshe uvalo.

Lelogama eliNgcwele Lithob’ inhliziyo Liyiph’ amandla iqine Uma ilethemba.

Liyasisekela sonke Lisiph’ insindiso Lisiphe konke okuhle Okungapheliyo.

Lihl’ igama lakho Nkosi Wena ongondlayo UngumPhrofethi nomPhristi UyiNkosi yami.

Wen’ ongumqondisi wami. Engikhona ngawe
Vum’ ukungizwa ngilapha Ngiz’ ukukubonga.

Ngingekhuleke ngibonge Ngo kufaneleyo Ngiyokwazi eZulwini
Nxa sengikubona.


Ngizoshumayel’ uthando Lwakho ngiselapha Mangiduduzwe yigama Lapha ngizakufa. Amen.

title: (Igama elithi Jesu)
lyrics:
Igama elithi Jesu Lithandwa ngabakhe Liyaduduza lelaphe Lixoshe uvalo.

Lelogama eliNgcwele Lithob’ inhliziyo Liyiph’ amandla iqine Uma ilethemba.

Liyasisekela sonke Lisiph’ insindiso Lisiphe konke okuhle Okungapheliyo.

Lihl’ igama lakho Nkosi Wena ongondlayo UngumPhrofethi nomPhristi UyiNkosi yami.

Wen’ ongumqondisi wami. Engikhona ngawe
Vum’ ukungizwa ngilapha Ngiz’ ukukubonga.

Ngingekhuleke ngibonge Ngo kufaneleyo Ngiyokwazi eZulwini
Nxa sengikubona.
