Ngizoshumayel’ uthando Lwakho ngiselapha Mangiduduzwe yigama Lapha ngizakufa. Amen.

title: (Igama elithi Jesu)
lyrics:
Igama elithi Jesu OnguNdodana NomSindisi wethu Sizwe sicela.

Masithethelelwe Izono zethu Sivikele kukho Okuhungayo.

Siph’ inkululeko

Kanye nothando Siholele Jesu Kokwaphezulu.

Sihol’ ohambeni Ubeyindlela
Nxa sihamba lapha Siy’ eZulwini.

Jesu onomusa OnguNdodana NomSindisi wethu Sizwe sicela. Amen.

title: (Jesu wen’ uyindlela)
lyrics:
Jesu wen’ uyindlela Yokuya eZulwini Ofun’ ukuya khona
Angaqondiswa nguwe.


Jesu uliqiniso Nezwi lakho linjalo Uhluzisa ingqondo

Uhlanze nenhliziyo.


Jesu ungukuphila Walehlula ithuna
Bonk’ abakwethembayo Bokwehlula ukufa.

Sazise leyondlela Nokuphila okusha Neqinis’ elembula Impilo yenjabulo. Amen.

title: O Jesu Nkulunkulu wami Ngizwe ngikhala kuwe Nkosi Uthel’ umusa wakho kimi Uhlezi eZulwini lakho
lyrics: Nkosi Jesu ngiyakuthanda Lwandise njal’ uthando lwami.

title: Ngiphuze Nkos’ ukukufuna Alufanel’ uthando lwami
lyrics:
Angazi ukulidumisa Igama lakho elingcwele
Nkosi Jesu ngiyakuthanda Lwandise njal’ uthando lwami.

title: Wawubonani kimi Nkosi Ukuba ungithande njalo Yek’ ubukhulu benjabulo Oyizw’ umoya wami ngawe Nkosi Jesu ngiyakuthanda
lyrics: Lwandise njal’ uthando lwami.

title: Ngiyakuthanda Nkosi yami Eyakho inhliziyo yami
lyrics:
Konk’ enginakho kungokwakho Nawe mSindisi ungowami Nkosi Jesu ngiyakuthanda
Lwandise njal’ uthando lwami.	Amen.

title: (Jes’ uyiNqaba yami)
lyrics:
Jes’ uyiNqaba yami Mangisindiswe nguwe Lawomanzi, neGazi

Okopha ngenxa yami Makususe izono Ngigezwe ngibe mhlophe.

Ungenam, anginakho Ukugcina umthetho Noma ngizikhalela Zingesulwe izono Zingasulwa kuphela Nguwe ngeGazi lakho.

Ngibambelela kuwe Owafel’ emuthini Angisethembi lutho Ngethemba umsa wakho Jesu ngiyakucela Ngihlanza funa ngife.

Nkosi ngisekhona la Noma sengingasekho Noma ngikubon’ uza Ukwahlulel’ abantu Wen’ uyinqaba yami
Mangisindiswe nguwe. Amen.

title: (Vuman’ amandla kaJesu)
lyrics:
Vuman’ amandla kaJesu Zifol’ ingelosi.
Lethani lapha iqhele, Nimthwes’ umqhele mqhele, Abuse konke.

Mabamqhelis’ abafeli, Odumisekayo,
Batus’ impande kaJese, Bambeke, mbeke, mbeke Abuse konke.

Maliqheliswe iKhwezi Umseki womhlaba, Netshe likaIsrayeli, Libekwe, bekwe, bekwe, Libuse konke.

Zoni, manithi ngokwakhe, Ukunqoba kwenu,

Owanithanda kangaka, Nimbeke, beke, beke, Abuse konke.

Sizwe sakh’ esikhethiwe , Esihlengiweyo,
Vuman’ owanisindisa, Nimbeke, beke, beke, Abuse konke.

Zonk’ izizwe nezilimi, Mazimkhothamele, Zivum’ ubukhosi bakhe, Zimbeke, beke, beke, Abuse konke. Amen.



                  155 (Bayethe! Nkos’ enkulu) Bayethe! Nkos’ enkulu,
Yendlu kaDavidi, Sekufik’ isikhathi, Sokuba ubuse, Bonke abathunjiwe Uzobakhulula

Kuze kuphel’ ububi, Kubus’ ukulunga.

Wobongwa ngamakhosi, Akuph’ izethulo,
Izizwe zikukhonze, Zikubonge njalo, Bonk’ abantu baguqe, Bakukhulekele
Umbuso wakho wande, Ungabinamngcele.

Umhlaba uyethaba, Kumila ubuhle, Bayathokoza bonke, Abakuvumayo Amazwe mawathule, Ezwe izwi lakho Bayabusisw’ abakho, Endaweni zonke.

Inkosi yamakhosi, Iyohlal’ ibusa,
Wena, Jes’ ufanelwe,

Ukutuswa konke Izethembiso zakho, Zimi naphakade Impela, unothando,
Ubathanda bonke. Amen.

title: (Nxa kubhej’ ezansi)
lyrics:
Nxa kubhej’ ezansi Ngiphaphama ngithi Kabongwe uJesu Ngomsebenzi wami Nangokukhuleka Kabongwe uJesu.

Liyohuba ulimi Lungaphezi luthi Kabongwe uJesu. Lengoma iNgcwele Ayinasidina, Kabongwe uJesu.

Kuhlala kukhanya

Nxa sihuba sithi Kabongwe uJesu Impi yobumnyama Ixoshwa wukuthi Kabongwe uJesu.

Nxa kukhal’ insimbi Izwakala kude Kabongwe uJesu.
Ithi: Wozanini Nizokusho, nithi Kabongwe uJesu.

Nxa ngidabukile Kuyasiz’ ukuthi Kabongwe uJesu. Uma ngidangele Nas’ isiduduzo Kabongwe uJesu.

Uma ngisekhona Mangihube ngithi Kabongwe uJesu Nasekuvukeni

Ngosho njalo ngithi Kabongwe uJesu. Amen.

title: (Nxa kuphath’ uJesu)
lyrics:
Nxa kuphath’ uJesu Bonke baguqa Zisho izilimi
Zith’ uyiNkosi Uma zisho njalo KowayeYizwi Kwasekuqaleni Kuthand’ uYise.

Ngezwi lakhe lodwa Kwavela konke Yonke imikhosi YaseZulwini
Zonk’ ingelosi Nezinkanyiso Ngezigaba zazo Ezihleliwe.

Wakhuphuka nalo Linokukhanya Waya eZulwini Ngasekunene KukaNkulunkulu Empakameni Ligcwele udumo Oluphakade.

Lapha emhlabeni Wethiw’ igama Ngabantu ababi Abafileyo Waliphatha kahle Ngokukholeka Wakunqoba ngalo Ngisho nokufa.

Manimbize nani Ngothando njalo Kanye nokwesaba Nangenhlonipho UnguKrist’ iNkosi Esindisayo

Oyakudunyiswa Akhonzwe njalo.

Azibuswe nguye Izinhliziyo Azakhiphe kuzo Konk’ ukungcola Ab’ umholi wenu Nxa nilingwayo Nisingathwe nguye
Ngamandla akhe. Amen.

title: (Zinceku zeNkos’ enilindile)
lyrics:
Zinceku zeNkos’ enilindile Hlomani ngelizw’ eliyinkemba Manihlale niqaphile njalo nje Nibe ngamabutho athembekile.

Inkosi yen’ ishilo lindani Ngempela manje isiseduze Ningasho ukuthi isilibele Nibesenidla, niphuze nidakwe.

Zikhanyisen’ izibani zenu Nizibhukul’ izingubo zenu Nilind’ ukubuya kweNkosi yenu Uba niyivulele ngokushesha.

Ziyakubusiswa lezo’ nceku Ayozifumana zilindile
Ziyoba neNkosi enkazimulweni Zethweswe imqhele eyokunqoba.

UKrist’ uqobo usezobuya

Abiz’ abakhe beze ekhaya Abancome bonke abenz’ okuhle Ngaphambi kweBandla
lezingelosi. Amen.

title: (Jesu singabakho)
lyrics:
Jesu singabakho Sethemba wena Uyinqaba yethu Nosilwelayo.

Siyadlul’ ezweni Linezingozi Zokuyibulala Imiphefumulo.

Jes’ ungabashiyi Abantu bakho Nom’ izinhliziyo Zingaphelele.

Siphe ukukholwa Sithemba wena Sibe nokuphila Sigcwel’ uthando.

Uma singathembi

Lungekh’ uthando Singehambe kahle Singelwe kahle.

Impi ephakathi Nxa inqotshiwe Leyo engaphandle Ayinamandla.

Nkosi singabakho Mawusihole Uyinqaba yethu
Kube phakade. Amen.

title: (Jesu Kristu ungumvini)
lyrics:
Jesu Kristu ungumvini Thina singamagatsha Lawo angahlala kuwe Athel okuhle njalo.

Amagatsh’ angatheliyo Ayosuswa alahlwe

Sisindise Nkosi yethu Ukuze singalahlwa.

Masihlale kuwe Jesu Ukuz’ uhlale kithi Uma ungenathi Nkosi Singeze senza lutho.

Nkosi yethu enomusa Mthombo ophilisayo Masihlale kuwe njalo Sizuze ukuphila.

Makabongw’ uNkulunkulu Uyise neNdodana
Kanye nawe Moy’ oNgcwele Unkulunkulu munye. Amen.

title: (Inyang’ enkul’ ikhona la)
lyrics:
Inyang’ enkul’ ikhona la Ogama lingu Jesu

Umlulamis’ ophansi la Animlalel’ uJesu.



Chorus:


Liphi eliny’ igama na Esisindiswa ngalo la? Alikh’ eliny’ igama qha ElikaJesu lodwa.


Uyazesul’ izono nya, Animlalel’ uJesu; Nihambe niye ezulwin’ Nihlale nay’ uJesu.

Wozani bazalwane bam’, Nibong’ iNkos’ uJesu Bodade, nilihlabelel’, Igama likaJesu.

Udumo lonke kuye la. Sengimethemb’ uJesu Ngiyalithanda leligam’, Igama lika Jesu.

Bantwana, wozanini bo, Nonk’ enimthand’ uJesu, Nibizwa nani namhlanye, Nibong’ iNkos’ uJesu.

Liyaphelis’ icala lam’ Igama likaJesu.
Liyangithokozisa nam’, Igama likaJesu.

Nxa senyukele ezulwin’ Sibon’ iNkos’ uJesu, Sohlabelela futhi le, Igama likaJesu.

title: (O bayede Nkos’ engcwele!)
lyrics:
O bayede Nkos’ engcwele! Owangithwalel’ umqhele; Lowo mqhele wakuhlaba Kuze ngibe nokwethaba.
O, bayede, Nkosi yam‘! O, bayede, Nkosi yami’!

Wawungenasici, Nkosi, Wawumuhle hlabahlosi; Kepha wakudela konke Ngaz’ izono zethu zonke.
O, bayede, Nkosi yam’!


Nant’ uthando olukhulu Olumhlophe, olwezulu; Wazincoma ngokuphana Ngobukhosi beNdodana
O, bayede, Nkosi yam’!


Lokhu kungimangalisa, Yebo, kuyangithobisa, Kuphelisa yonk’ inkani. Ngiyathandwa-- Ngingubani?
O, bayede, Nkosi yam’!

title: Umzuzu nay’ uJesu Uyaguqula njalo Usizi nenkathazo
lyrics: Uyaluxosh’ uvalo. Ngingenwa ukwethaba Nanxa ngimbheka ke, Ubuhle balomhlaba Ngishay’ indiva nje.

title: Umzuzu nay’ uJesu Khangel’ uthand’ analo! Ngilethe njalo kuye Usizi nemithwalo. Nanxa ngidinw’ indlela Aphel’ amandla nya, Kuyongisiz’ impela Umzuzu naye la.
Sengathi ngibe nawo ‘Mihleni yonke yami Umzuzu nay’ uJesu Ekuhambeni kwami. Kufisa kwami konke Impela yikho-ke: Kuze kube phakade
lyrics: Ngihlale naye le!	Amen

title: (Ubani lo osemkhombeni)
lyrics:
Ubani lo osemkhombeni, Ekhonzwa ng’ abalusi na?

Refrain:
INkosi-iNkosi yezulu INkosi-iNkosi yomhlaba, Masiguqe phambi kwayo, Sidumis’ iNkosi yezwe.

Ubani lo ososizini, Ozilayo esehlane?

Ubani lo okhala khona Elibeni lika Lazaro?

Ubani lo okhulekayo Ensimin’ eGetsemane?

Ngubani lo obethelwayo Enxusel’ abaMbethelayo?

Ubani lo oselibeni

Sengathi Usehluliwe?


Ubani lo ongophilayo Ongeboshwe enqobile?

Ubani low’ enyukayo Ebusis’ abantu bakhe?

Ubani lo osezulwini Ebusa ebukhosini?

Ubani lo oyakufika
Nobukhosi nangamandla? Amen.

title: (Jesu uyabusa)
lyrics:
Jesu uyabusa Unamandla onke INkosi yodumo Ezizweni zonke

Jabulani bantu Ngoba enithanda Kuyabonakala Ngesihawu sakhe

Manibong’ uJesu Onamandla onke Wavuk’ ekufeni OyiNkosi yethu

Umlamleli wethu Usekhona kithi Wasihlawulela Masimthande njalo. Amen.

title: (Kristu ulithemba lethu)
lyrics:
Kristu ulithemba lethu Wen’ ungumkhululi wethu Sikhulule thina zoni Sizibika kuwe namhla.

Sinezono eziningi Siyakhala phambi kwakho Sikhulule manje Nkosi Usiphathe ngomsa wakho.

Usiphendulele kuwe Sibe nenjabulo ngawe Wena uyiNkosi yethu Thina singabantu bakho.

Yakha ngaphakathi kwethu Uzibus’ izinhliziyo
Zib’ ezakho ngakho konke Zenz’ intando yakho njalo.

Size sibabaz’ uYise Nawe Jesu indodana Nawe Moya oyiNgcwele
Nkosi inye naphakade. Amen.

title: (Wozani nijabule)
lyrics:
Wozani nijabule

Kuye uMsindisi Weza ukusihlenga Thin’ esonileyo.

Wez’ ukusisindisa Sase sizokufa Wasibizela kuye Endleleni yakhe.

Jesu wez’ emhlabeni Wab’ umuntu wena Usakhon’ ebantwini Abathanda wena.

Nkosi ngomusa wakho Weza uthobile
Lab’ abakholwe kuwe Bazakukufuza. Amen.

title: (Wena mphefumlo wami)
lyrics:
Wena mphefumlo wami Zwan’izwi loMsindisi Ukhulum’ethi kuwe Wen’uyangithanda na?

Ngakuhleng’uboshiwe Ngakwelaph’ ulimele Ngakuthol’ udukile Ngakukhiph’ emnyameni.

Nom’unin’ angashiya Zon’ izingane zakhe Nom’ angakhohlwa yizo Angikhohlwa ngezami.

Angiyek’ ukuthanda Luqin’uthando lwami Ludlulakonk’ okunye Aluqedwa ngukufa.

Uyangibona wena Ngikulungiselele Izibusiso zami Ezingunaphakade.

Nkosi sengiyavuma Lufuph’uthando lwami Ake ungandisele
Jes’osithandwa sami. Amen.

title: (Jesu wen’ oyindodana)
lyrics:
Jesu wen’ oyindodana Sihambis’ endleleni Sandulele ngomsa wakho Silandelw’ iwo futhi.

Jesu wen’ oyindodana Sifundis’ izwi lakho Ukuze sikulandele Ngokukhanyiswa yilo.

Sibonis’ indlela yakho Jesu malusi wethu
Wena mthombo wokuphila Sizophiliswa nguwe.

Usilwele njalo njalo Sivikel’ ezimpini Usigcine engozini Njengomalusi wethu.

Sifundis’ intando yakho Senz’ okufaneleyo Masihambe kahle lapha Sobonan’ ezulwini. Amen.

title: (Kristu O Msindisi wethu)
lyrics:
Kristu O Msindisi wethu Wena Ulithemba lethu Ulithemba labo bonke Abalahl’ ukwona konke.

Abazond’ izono zabo Abadel’ intando yabo Abakheth’ indlela yakho Abathwal’ umthwalo wakho.

Ulithemba ngeqiniso

Awunayo inkohliso Uyagcin’ abathembayo Ngize Nkosi-nangu mina

Ngithi sengizidelile Ngingowakho ngivumile Ma ube ithemba lami
Ngenz’ intando yakho njalo. Amen.

title: (Moy’ oNgcwele siqinise)
lyrics:
Moy’ oNgcwele siqinise KuKrist’ oliqiniso Sinokholo nokuqonda Sisizw’ izipho zakho.

Moy’ oNgcwele siduduze Woza uzosimela
Moya ovela kuYise Siph’ usizo ngoKristu.

Wazo usihlumelele Siphilise luqobo

Masingcweliswe ngezipho Nangobukhona bakho.

Moya oNgcwele siphathe Luthando oluNgcwele Moya oNgcwele kaYise
Ophuma kuNdodana. Amen.

title: (Nkosi bhek’ ibandla lakho)
lyrics:
Nkosi bhek’ ibandla lakho, Uyabona selomile Limatise ngomsa wakho, Konk’ okwethu kuphelile.

Thel’ uMoya! oyiNgcwele Phezu kwabantwana bakho! Vus’ owakho umsebenzi, Libatshazw’ igama lakho.

Usizwise lawamandla Abafundi bathenjiswa,

Silifuze lelobandla Elaqala, labusiswa.

Usathane simnikile Amathuba enhliz’ weni, Keph’ uMoya simcimile,
Sekumnyam’ emphefumlweni.


Siyavum’ izono zethu, Asikukhonzanga kahle, Ngakho emoyeni wethu, Nant’ usizi luthi phahle.

Washo: “Celanini, njalo Nizophiw’ uMoy’ oNgcwele” Sesibhek’ eyakh’ ingalo Yebo, sesikuhlalele.

Haleluya, siyakholwa Ubekil’ indlebe yakho Lesosipho siyatholwa Ngokwethemb’ igama lakho.

title: (Moy’ oNgcwele wobabalo)
lyrics:
Moy’ oNgcwele wobabalo Odala uthando
Phemba ngaphakathi kwethu Umlilo weZulu.

Wen’ ohlanganis’ uYise Kanye neNdodana Senze nathi sithandane Sibe Moya munye.

Makadunyiswe uYise NeNdodana futhi
Nawe Moya oyiNgcwele Manje naphakade. Amen.

title: (Wena Moya oNgcwele)
lyrics:
Wena Moya oNgcwele Siyacela sabele Emuthasheni wakho Siphe uthando.

Uthando lunomusa Lubekezela njalo Aluphel’ ekufeni Siphe uthando.

Kophel’ ukuphrofetha La sesiphambi kwakho Lume njalo uthando Siphe uthando.

Luyophela ukholo Nethemba ngokunjalo Loma kade uthando Siphe uthando.

Ukukholwa nethemba Kuhlangene nothando Okukhulu kwalokhu Nokuhl’ uthando.

Uthando lungephele Loba khona phakade Kanye naw’ eZulwini

Siphe uthando. Amen.

title: (Woz’ usebenze kithi)
lyrics:
Woz’ usebenze kithi Nkosi Moya Ongcwele Ufundis’ ulungise Nkosi Moya Ongcwele.

Vul’ inhliziyo zehtu Nkosi Moya Ongcwele Usinik’ ukuqonda Nkosi Moya Ongcwele.

Sifundis’ imithetho Nkosi Moya Ongcwele Sisize siyigcine
Nkosi Moya Ongcwele.


Siyise kuMkhululi Nkosi Moya Ongcwele Usisiz’ endleleni
Nkosi Moya Ongcwele.

Hlanzi’ inhliziyo zethu Nkosi Moya Ongcwele Sibenalo ukholo
Nkosi Moya Ongcwele. Amen.

title: (UMsindisi engakafi)
lyrics:
UMsindisi engakafi Wathi kwabakhe, Uzofika uMluleki, Oqotho.

Manje sewafika ithi, Nosizo lwakhe, Uyohlala kithi njalo, Azinze.

Ukhuluma ngaphakathi, Asiduduze
Aqede ivuso lonke, Novalo.

Ubulala inkanuko, Eyonisayo,
Adal’ uthand’ olumi Lobuhle.

Okuhle esikwenzayo, Sikwenza ngaye, Nguye nosinqobelayo, Empini.

Nkosi, Moya oyiNgcwele, Siphe amandla
Wakhe ezinhliziyweni, Zabakho.

Kadunyiswe uMluleki, Kanye noYise, NoMsindisi onguJesu, Kabongwe. Amen.

title: (Ngingumfokazi laph’ emhlabeni)
lyrics:
Ngingumfokazi laph’ emhlabeni,

Ngifun’ izulu ikhaya lam’; Nom’ inkathazo isendleleni Ngophumelela ngoJesu wam’; Useceleni eduze nami, Ebheka njal’ ukuhamba kwam’ Uzongisiza nasekufeni, Angingenise ekhaya lam’.

Noma ngigqok’ amanikiniki, Ikhon’ ingubo emhlophe qwa. Icolekile ngizoyembatha, Mhla ngiqedile ibanga la.
Nxa nginosizi nezinkathazo, Ngihlekw’ usulu, ngidelwa nje, Kolunga konke nxa ngingenile Ekhaya lami elihle hle!

Nonxa ngithwele isiphambano, Sinzima sona, ngisindwa la Ngizowuthola umqhele lapho, Owokuphila. Haleluya!
Ngimbone yena ongithandayo, Ngihlale naye uMfeli wam’ Ngihube khona igam’ elisha

Lokudumisa iNkosi yam’.

title: (Izithembiso zeNkosi yethu)
lyrics:
Izithembiso zeNkosi yethu Ziqine zona kunezintaba.
Nxaziwa izisekelo zethu Elayo izwi limi.

IKORUSI
Izithembiso zeNkosi yethu Ziqine kunezintaba la.
Nokuba ziwa izinkanyezi Zingew’ izethembiso qha.

Izithembiso—nxa ngihlangana Nezinhlupheko, ngiphel’ amandla Ishisa impi, ngizofumana
Impela zona zimi.


Izithembiso nasekufeni Ziyema zona, azijabhisi,
Kuzakukhanya nasengcwabeni,

Ezika Jesu zimi.


Isithembiso nasekufeni Ngcwabeni lami ngizofumana, Zazinganela ekumukeni, Nasezulwini zimi.

title: (Qaphelani nilalele)
lyrics:
Qaphelani nilalele Ngezindlebe zenu Ngonitshela izindaba Zokunilungisa.

Niyathand’ ukub’ abanye Bathandane nani Ngakho manilinde kahle Izilimi zenu.

Maniyek’ amazw’ amabi Ningawakhulumi Dedanini kwabonayo Nikushiy’ okubi.

Bayakubusiswa bonke Abalungileyo Bayaqala ukulunga
Abathand’ uJesu. Amen.

title: (Baba wethu ophezulu)
lyrics:
Baba wethu ophezulu Phakamis’ ingqondo zethu Sifundise sibonise
Baba wethu sibusise.


Ebuthakathakeni bethu Siphamandla siqinise Size sikukhonze njalo
Baba wethu sihaw’ kele. Amen.

title: (Umus’ omangalisayo)
lyrics:
Umus’ omangalisayo Wasindisa mina Ngeduka ngatholakala Ngavulek’ amehlo.

Umusa wangifundisa Kwaphela uvalo Isimanga salomusa Uyigugu kimi.

Engozini, engcingweni Ngacusha ngomusa Ngomusa wodwa ngahlengwa Wongiyisekhaya.

Nanxa sengiyokufa nya Kucime impilo Ngiyoceba ngenjabulo Ngethabe ngoxolo.



Amazing grace how sweet the sound

That saved a wretch like me
I once was lost, but now am found Was blind but now I see.

‘Twas grace that taught my heart to fear And grace my fears relieved
How precious did that grace appear The hour I first believed!

Through many dangers, toils and snares,
I have already come
‘Tis grace that brought me safe thus far And grace will lead me home.

Yes, when this heart of flesh shall fail And mortal life shall cease
I shall possess within the vail A life of joy and peace.

title: (Baba wethu owadala konke)
lyrics:
Baba wethu owadala konke

Sibong’ umusa wakho Udumo malube kuwe Nkosi Haleluya Haleluya.

Umhlaba wonke mawuhlokome Ubong’ uSimakade
Ubabalo lwake olukhulu Haleluya Haleluya.

Hubelan’ uMninimandla wonke Ngokuba kufanele Makadunyisw’ abaseZulwini Haleluya Haleluya.

Imikhosi yonke yaseZulwini Mayithi Haleluya
Nezihlwele zonke zasezweni Haleluya Haleluya.

Haleluya dumisani njalo UYise neNdodana
NoMoya phakade naphakade Haleluya Haleluya. Amen.

title: (Thokoza zulu nomhlaba)
lyrics:
Thokoza zulu nomhlaba US’makade luthando Akahutshelwe yindalo Ngephimbo lenhlokomo Yen’ owasekel’ umhlaba Nowendlal’ amazulu Yena owadala konke
Ul’ uthando phakade.


US’makade uluthando Ufukamel’ umhlaba Ngemfudumal’ ephelele Nabantu bakhe bonke Uboph’ inhliziyo zonke Ezidabukileyo Bafuman’ inqaba kuye Bakhosel’ eNkosini.

US’makade uluthando Noma sizimpumputhe

Olwakhe olwaphakade Luludondolo lwethu Sono kufa unqotshiwe US’makade uluthando UL’ uthando keme njalo
Abuse naphakade. Amen.

title: (Sheshani nize nina bangcwele)
lyrics:
Sheshani nize nina bangcwele Kuyiz’ ukukhandleka Lungisan’ indlela ngokwethaba Uhambo lunzima
Ubabalo luyavama Njengobude bosuku nje Kusifanele ukuba Sizabalaze qha.

Izinto zonke zakulomhlaba Sizishay’ indiva
Ngokwenz’ enjal’ inhliziyo zenu Ziyakuchichima
Injabulo eyofunyanwa

Ngokukhonza uJesu lo Laph’ ibandla selikhonza Kukuhle kudele.

Nikhala nicabanga ukuthi Uhambo lunzima
Nokho akunjalo-ke ngempela Konke kulungile
Sifunelani umvuz’ omkhulu Kanti singamagwala Bophan’ izinkalo zenu Niqung’ isibindi.

Manini ngomumo niqinile Nilwe neyesitha USomandla weth’ uliqhawe Kasoz’ asishiye
Wethembeke njalo nje Akajabhisi namunye Iqiniso lakhe lonke
Limi naphakade. Amen.

title: (Nithini ngaloluthando)
lyrics:
Nithini ngaloluthando ‘Lusegazini loMhlengi Wangifela mina soni
Wezw’ inhlungu ngenxa yami Loluthando olungaka UMsindisi wangifela.

Imfihlo yokufa kwakhe Ayinakuqondwa muntu Kwehlula amaSerafi Ukujula kwal’ uthando Lubabalo vuma mhlaba Kwananel’ izingilosi.

Wadela ubukhosi bakhe Ngothando nangobabalo Wophel’ inzalo kaAdam Eyayibanjwe izono Kulubabalo lwezulu Olwazuza mina soni.

Ngangiboshwe uSatane Ngicindezelwe isono Iso lakho lakhanyisa

Ngavuka etilongweni Kwagqabuka iketango Ngakhululwa ngalandela.

Akukho ukujabhiswa Kubobonke abakuye Phila kuye oyinhloko
Mbath’ ubuNgcwele bezulu Ngesibindi ngizakuwe
Ngizuz’ umqhele kuKristu. Amen.

title: (Izwi lakho Nkosi)
lyrics:
Izwi lakho Nkosi Lisihola njalo Libakhanyisele Abalikholwayo.

Uma kuza impi Izosihlasela Liyasiduduza Liyasisindisa.

Uma sekumnyama

Singaboni lutho Singaholwa izwi Ngokukhanya kwalo.

Kungechasiselwe Ukuthokoziswa Kwabahamba ngalo Belalela lona.

Liyizwi lomusa Kwabasemhlabeni Nakub’ abafayo Lileth’ ukuphila.

Nkosi yethu siphe Ukulamukela Siliqondisise
Silithande njalo. Amen.

title: (Singanikelani kuwe)
lyrics:
Singanikelani kuwe Lokhu simpofu nje Singelutho sidumis’

Igama eliNgcwele.


Uthando lonke ngolwakho Singento yalutho
Vul’ imithombo yezulu Sandisel’ ukholo.

Masimemezel’ udumo Lobabalo lwakho Zize zikwazi izizwe Zifakaze ngawe.

Sivulel’ umbuso wakho Ongevalwe ‘muntu
Izwi lakho libe kithi Samukel’ umusa.

Yandisa imbewu yakho Sithelele wena
Ivangeli lakho lande Ezizweni zonke. Amen.

title: (UJesu Krist’ uyiNkosi)
lyrics:
UJesu Krist’ uyiNkosi Ungumalusi wami Ngingeswele engowami Nami sengingowakhe.

Ungiholel’ emanzini Agelezayo kahle Ungilalis’ edlelweni Lakhe eliluhlaza.

Ngangiduka futhi futhi Wabelokh’ engifuna Ehlombe wasengetshatha Wangiyisa ekhaya.

Uma ngelusiwe nguye Angikwesab’ ukufa Ngethemba isandla sakhe Esingihola kahle.

Ungiph’ ukudl’ okuNgcwele Etafuleni lakhe
Ngomzimba negazi lakhe Okuhlumelelayo.

Umusa wakh’ ongapheli Uyakubongwa njalo Mayibongw’ iNkosi yethu Phakade naphakade. Amen.

title: (Nin’ enihamba lapha)
lyrics:
Nin’ enihamba lapha Niqond’ eZulwini Niyahanjisw’ uJesu Emkhondweni wakhe.

Lapho nisebenzayo Nilingis’ uJesu Noma nifa yindlala Nilambis’ okwakhe.

Whathwal’ isiphambano Ngenxa yenu nonke Umqhel’ awuthweleyo Uludumo lwenu.

Ningambona ngokholo Nimbambe ngethemba Nimthande ngenhliziyo Noma nihlupheka.

Izinhlupheko zenu Nezinsizi zenu Nezilingw’ eziningi Zophel’ ekufeni.

Lokhu nehlelwa yikho Ukuze nilunge Kuyizikhwelo zenu Zokuy’ eZulwini.

Nin’ enihamba lapha ondan’ eZulwini Lapho novuzwa khona
Ngomvuzo omkhulu. Amen.

title: (Siyahamb’ ebumnyameni)
lyrics:
Siyahamb’ ebumnyameni Sihuba sisahamba

Sijabula siya khona Ezweni les’ thembiso.

Laphaya ngaphambi kwethu Kukhanya njengelanga Siyahamba sisizana Singesab’ ubumnyama.

Kunye okukhanyisayo Okuvel’ eNkosini Kuyaxosha ubumnyama Kukhanyisa indlela.

Munye esiqonde kuye Lunye ukholo lwethu Linye vo ithemba lethu Esiliphiw’ iNkosi.

Linye futh’ igama lethu Esilihuba sonke
Kuny’ ukulwa nobucayi Lunye nohambo lwethu.

Kunye ukwethaba kwethu

Ngaphesheya komfula Laph’ uBab’ onguSomandla Ebus’ ethanda bonke.

Phambili-ke bafowethu Nethemb’ isiphambano Thwalani ihlazo laso Nize ninqobe ngaso.

Luyeza usukukazi Lovuko lwabo bonke Kophela onk’ amathunzi
Nezinhlupheko zonke. Amen.

title: (Kumnyama Kimi)
lyrics:
Kumnyama kimi wen’ okhanyisayo Ngihole Nkosi
Ngikhanyisel’ indlela ngilandele Ngihole Nkosi
Likud’ ikhaya angicel’ ukuba Ungifikise ngilibone namhla.

Kuqala angishongo kuw’ ukuthi

Ngihole Nkosi
Ngazikhethel’ indlela manje ngithi Ngihole Nkosi
Bengikuthanda okomhlaba ngona Ngazidla Nkosi ngithethelele.

Chabo kwanele ukukulandela Ngihole Nkosi
Noma kusebusuku angesabi Ngihole Nkosi
Ngicel’ ukuthi mawungihambise Ngentando yakho ngiqhubeke njalo.

Kade ngisizwa nguwe nakalokhu Ngihole Nkosi
Indlela yami yimbi inamatshe Ngihole Nkosi
Angiyiboni kahl’ ebumnyameni Kephake akulutho nxa unami.

Buyakudlula ubumnyama lobo Ngihole Nkosi
Ngiyakubona wena sekusile Ngihole Nkosi

Ngibone nabo engibathandayo Bengishiyile sebe kuwe Nkosi. Amen.

title: Manethemb’ iNkosi, Niqond’ ezulwini INkos’ iyoniqinisa, Hambani ngethemba.
lyrics:
Nibozinikela, Niyikhonze kahle, Niligcine izwi layo Inkosi yezulu.

Kudlul’ izinsuku, Kanye neminyaka, Kepha ekwethembisile, Akunakwedlula.
Nom’ indlela yayo Isithw’ ubumnyama, Nibohlala niyethemba Inomusa njalo.
Niyohlala kahle, Ekhwapheni layo, Anisoze nachitheka, Nxa nethemb’ iNkosi.

Lindelan’ iNkosi, Iyophind’ ifike,
Kukhany’ ungunaphakade, Kuphel’ ubusuku. Amen.

title: Mabutho kaKristu, Hloman’ izikhali
lyrics:
UJesu woniph’ amandla, Ayoniqinisa.
EzeNkos’ enkulu Izikhali lezi Owethembela kuJesu, Oyonqoba njalo.

Hoshani inkemba, Eyizwi leNkosi,
Niliwe njalo ngesibindi, Nimel’ ukulunga.

Khulekani njalo, Nidel’ okomhlaba, Yikhona niyowachitha Amandl’ obumnyama.
Kothi kungaphela, Konk, ukulwa kwenu
Nethweswe nonk’ imiqhele, NguJesu iNkosi.

Somdumisa njalo, UJes’ uMsindisi, Okhon’ ebusa noYise,
NoMoya oNgcwele. Amen.

title: Manini isibindi
lyrics:
Mabutho kaKristu Nin’ enibuswa nguye Ningaze nahlehla Impi eholwa nguye Iya nqoba njalo
Size sichithw’ isitha Kubuse uKristu.

title: Manini isibindi Umkhos’ uhlatshiwe Phumani nihlomile Namhla niyokulwa Singaphakathi kwenu Nangaphandl’ isitha Lwelan’ uNkulunkulu Nisichith’ isitha.
Manini isibindi Sabelani nonke Yibambeni ishisa Ngalo lol’ usuku Madoda nanso impi Musan’ ukwesaba Noma sekulukhuni
lyrics: Ningabhek’ emuva.

title: Manini isibindi
lyrics: Nilwe ngamandl’ akhe Nxa nizethemba nina Niyakwehluleka Hlomani ngevangeli Nikhuleke njalo Njengamabutho akhe Ningesabi lutho.

title: Manini isibindi Kuzophel’ ukulwa Lapho sekuphelile Kobongwa iNkosi Kuthi onqobileyo Athole umqhele Abuse naphakade
lyrics: NeNkosi yodumo. Amen.

title: Baba yizwa lomkhuleko Asithi kube lula
lyrics:
Kodwa sicela ukuba Usiqung’ isibindi.

Kasicel’ ukub’ indlela Ibe ngegandayiwe Noma ingabi namatshe Sihambe ngentokozo.


Singephumule phakade Emanzin’ acwebile Masithole iziphethu Edwalen’ endleleni.
Siqinis’ ebuthakeni Usihol’ endleleni Ebuhleni ebubini Ubelokh’ useduze.
Thin’ abantu bakho Nkosi Singeze sazimela
Sicela usizo lwakho
Ngob’ uyithemba lethu. Amen.

title: Ngicela Nkosi ukholo Olugudluz’ izintaba
lyrics:
Ngiph’ uthando lobuntwana Olucela ngokwethemba Gcwalis’ inhliziyo yami Ngalolothand’ olunjalo.

Sengiyathanda ukuba Ngisebenz’ okwakho wedwa Ngibafune bonk’ abanye Abangakalizwa izwi
Uba baphenduke nabo Bathethelelwe izono.
Ingqondo nenhlakanipho Nokunye konk’ enginakho Makube ngokwakho Nkosi Ngize ngingazihambeli Ngihambe ngentando yakho Kwande njal’ umbuso wakho.

Khulis’ inhliziyo yami Kuvame kuyo okwakho Ize ithandis’ okwakho Othanda abantu bonke Ngiyisw’ esiphambanweni
Nasohlangothini lwakho. Amen.

title: Kuning’ okusivimbayo Nxa sithi siz’ eNkosini Abathand’ ukuthandaza Bafisa ukuya khona.
lyrics:
Kuyasa nxa uthandaza Kuvuk’ uthando nokholo Won’ uyafik’ eZulwini Wehlise izibusiso.

Ungelwe ungathandazi Ukholo luyafiphala Kuqhaqhazel’ uSathane Nxa umKristu ekhuleka.
Welul’ izandla uMosi Anqob’ amaIsrayeli Wakhathala wazehlisa Avuk’ amaAmeliki.
Maye siyizehluleki Nxa sikhala sigedeza
Sitshele bonk’ abakithi Konke okusihluphayo.

Uma ukulila kwethu Bekubhekisw’ eNkosini Besingadumisa sithi INkos’ ingenzele lokhu.
Nkosi sandisel’ ukholo Wandise nothando kithi Kuvame kith’ izithelo Zemithandazo yokholo. Amen.

title: Singabakho Somandla Sizwe useZulwini Senze sibengabakho Lapha naseZulwini.
lyrics:
Singabakho mSindisi Yibasihlangu sethu Wena ongukuphila Siholel’ eZulwini.
Singabakho Somandla Busis’ abeza kuwe
Wen’ ongumHlobo wethu Siza usivikele.

Singabakho Malusi Seluse thina zimvu Sitotobise kahle Size sifuze wena.
Singabakho Somandla Qed’ izinswelo zethu Thethela izono

title: (THWAL’ISIPHAMBANO SAKHO)
lyrics:
Thwal’isiphambano sakho Kwash’uJesu kubafundi Uzidel’ushiy’umhlaba Ulandele ngokwethaba

Thwal’isiphambano sakho

Ungesabi ubunzima Uyokuqinisa yena Zonke izinsuku zakho

 Thwal’isiphambano sakho Ngamandla akhe kuphela Yiso esokuqondisa Endleleni yokunqoba.

Thwal’isiphambano sakho Ungadinw’ihlazo laso Wasithwal’esakh’uJesu Wasithwala ngenxa yakho

Thwal’isiphambano sakho Wosishiya ekufeni Ngokuba osithwalayo Uyokwethweswa umqhele

Nkosi enqobo zintathu Sithwalis’isiphambano Siph’ukuba naw’ekhaya
Lapho kungafiwa khona.	Amen.

title: (Ngiyakholwa ngeqiniso)
lyrics:
Ngiyakholwa ngeqiniso ENkosini uBaba EnguNkulunkulu Munye Ozingqobo zintathu.

Ngiyakholwa ngokwempela Kuy’ iNdodana yakhe Eyazalwa emhlabeni Ukuzongisindisa.

Ngethembela emandleni ENkosi yam’ uJesu Nginqoba nezono zami Ngaye onginqobele.

Ngiyamthanda uMsindisi Owakunqob’ ukufa Ngenxa yokuthanda mina Waba nguMmeli wami.

Ngiyabambelela kulo

Ibandla eliNgcwele Eliphethe iqiniso Elisisindisayo.

Ngibonga uNkulunkulu Yen’ owangidalayo OnguYise neNdodana
Nay’ uMoya oNgcwele. Amen.

title: (Ukuthula ezweni lezono)
lyrics:
Ukuthula ezweni lezono? Igazi likaJesu lanqoba.

Ukuthula ngumsebenzi wethu? Ngoba senza intando kaJesu.

Ukuthula sihaqwe zinsizi? Sifuman’ ukuthula kuJesu.

Ukuthul’ izihlobo zikude? Sigcinwa nguJesu siyaphila.

Ukuthula ngomso ongaziwa? UJes’ usesihlalweni sakhe.

Ukuthula sembozwe ukufa? UJesu ukunqobil’ ukufa.

Sekwanele emzabalazweni? UJes’ usimisel’ ukuthula. Amen.

title: (Ukhathele udiniwe)
lyrics:
Ukhathele udiniwe Udumele na?
Woza kuy’ uJes’ uthole Ikhefu.

Unalo yini uphawu Aziwa ngalo?
Bhek’ izinyawo nezandla Zinalo.

Unomqhele wobukhosi Awuthwele na?
Yebo uthwele umqhele Wameva.

Nxa ngimthola ngimlandele Ngozuzani na?
Ubunzima nobuhlungu Njalonje.

Nxa ngibambelela kuye Ngotholani na?

Wothokoza uphumule Ekhaya.

Nxa ngicela ukwamkelwa Uyokwala na?
Qha nakanye kayikwala Sampela.

Nxa ngizama ukumkhonza Ngobusiswa na?
Isho njalo imikhosi YeZulu. Amen.

title: (Njengokuba nginje Jesu)
lyrics:
Njengokuba nginje Jesu Ngiswela nezw’ elilodwa Kuphel’ uba wangifela Ngiza kuwe Nkosi.

Njengokuba nginje Jesu Nginovalo ngenenkani Kukhon’ ukulw’ emoyeni

Ngiza kuwe Nkosi.


Njengokuba nginje Jesu Ngiyimpumputh’ elusizi Ngingasindiswa nguwena Ngiza kuwe Nkosi.

Njengokuba nginje Jesu Wethembisa nezwi lakho Wongamukel’ ungihlanze Ngiza kuwe Nkosi.

Njengokuba nginje Jesu Ngisizwa luthando lwakho Sengoba ngowakho wedwa Ngiza kuwe Nkosi.

Njengokuba nginje Jesu Ngingeluchaze uthando Engahlengwa mina ngalo Ngiza kuwe Nkosi. Amen.

title: (Ngisondeze kuwe)
lyrics:
Ngisondeze kuwe Nkosi yami
Noma sengilethwa Zinhlupheko Ngiyathand’ ukuza Ngisondele kuwe Ngisondele kuwe Nkosi yami.

Nxa ngisohambeni Sengihlwelwe Ngilel’ ehlozini Ebusuku Emaphushen’ ami Ngisondeze kuwe Ngisondeze kuwe Nkosi yami.

Ngikhombis’ indlela Eza kuwe
Konke enginakho Ungiphile Ngisizw’ ingelosi Ngisondeze kuwe

Ngisondeze kuwe Nkosi yami.

Khona nangovivi Ngokubonga Ngokwethemba wena Ebubini Ezinhluphekweni Ngisondele kuwe Ngisondele kuwe Nkosi yami. Amen.

title: (Ngihole wena Nkosi)
lyrics:
Ngihole wena Nkosi Noma kunomnyama Ngibambe ngas’ isandla Ngikhethel’ indlela.

Nom’ inhle noma imbi Yona nokho inhle Imsonge nom’ injani

Ngis’ ekuphumleni.


Min’ angizikhetheli Soze ngalokotha Ongikhethele Nkosi Ze ngihambe kahle.

Ngifun’ umbuso wakho Owakho kuphela Ngihambis’ endleleni Ngize ngingaduki.

Thatha isitsha sami Sigcwalise wena Noma ngalokh’ okuhle Noma kungokubi.

Kheth’ izihlobo zami Zifo nokuphila
Kheth’ inhlupheko zami Nswelo nokunotha.

Min’ angizikhetheli Noma kunganjani

Mawub’ umholi wami Namandla nokwazi. Amen.



              206(a) (Ngicela, Baba, ngisela) Ngicela, Baba, ngisela,
Emhlabeni ohluphayo, Ngenze ngithi: Makwenzeke Eyakho intando.

Ngicela, Baba, ngisela, Ngethabele inhlupheko, Ngiqiniswe, ngiduduzwe, Ngethembele kuwe.

Ngicela, Baba, ngisela, Nxa bengasekh’ abakithi, Nginesizungu, nosizi, Ngiduduzwe nguwe.

Ngicela, Baba, ngisela, Um’ usus’ igugu lami,
Mangithi: Nkosi, ngokwakho Konke enginakho.

Ngicela, Baba, ngisela, Ukuba uhlale kimi, UMoya wakh’ oyiNgcwele Ngigcwaliswe nguwe.

Ngicela, Baba, ngisela, Mangithobe yonk’ imihla, Ngingasoli ngiphe, Nkosi, Ngithokoze kuwe. Amen.

206(b) (Ngicela Baba ngisahamba)


Ngicela Baba ngisahamba Laph’ emhlabeni ohluphayo Ngisize ngithi mayenziwe
Intando yakho.


Mangingakhali ngenhlupheko Ngikhanyisele ngiduduzwe Ngibuye ngithi mayenziwe
Intando yakho.


Um’ abakithi bengasekho

Ngisele ngedwa ngilusizi Mangingajabhi mayenziwe
Intando yakho.


Um’ ulisus’ igugu lami Mangithi Nkosi kung’ okwakho Okwami konke mayenziwe
Intando yakho.


Sengathi angahlala kimi UMoya wakho oyiNgcwele Ikho kuphela mayenziwe
Intando yakho


Imihla yonke mangithobe Mangingasoli ngiphe Nkosi Ukuthokoza mayenziwe
Intando yakho. Amen.

title: Wena mthombo wokulunga Ngiyabheka kuwe
lyrics:
Osizini lwami lonke,

Ngizwe, ngikhumbule.

title: Nxa ukona kungikhwele, Ngikhulule wena, Unginike ukuthula, Ngizwe, ngikhumbule.
Nxa zivimba iziyengo Endleleni yami,
lyrics: Ngiph’ amandla ngalowomhla Ngizwe, ngikhumbule.

title: Nxa izifo zingihlupha, Emzimbeni wami Ngiphe ukubekezela Ngizwe, ngikhumbule.
Nxa ngibizwa ekufeni Mangibheke kuwe Yamukel’ umoya wami,
lyrics: Ngizwe, ngikhumbule.	Amen.

title: (Jesu nxa ngilingwa)
lyrics:
Jesu nxa ngilingwa, Mawungimelele, Ngoba uma wala, Ngiyakulahleka.

Uma ngingabaza, Uz’ ungiqinise Ngingoniswa lutho, Ngingamuki kuwe.

Nxa kuvuma wena, Ngibenenhlupheko, Noma ngokugula, Ngibe nobuhlungu.

Ngenze Ngingaphuthi, Ukubheka kuwe, Ngiphunyuzwe nguwe, Kulomthwalo wami.

Noma kungiyenga,

Okomhlaba lona, Noma ngingenakho, Okwemfuyo yawo.

Uz’ ungikhumbuze, Inhlupheko yakho, Nakh’ ukufa kwakho, Esiphambanweni.

Mangethembe njalo, Izwi lakho, Jesu, Lize lingiyise,
Kuwe ezulwini. Amen.

title: (Ishesh’ idlul’ imihla yam)
lyrics:
Ishesh’ idlul’ imihla yam Ishesh’ idlul’ imihla yam’ Ngamandla andizayo, Ngingeshokuyo,
Yima, qha,
Ngoba ngingodlulayo.


Refrain:
Bakithi simi eJordan Abanye beyawela Nenkazimulo laphaya Icishukuvela

Ekumukeni kway’ iNkos’, Yashiya izwi layo: Bophani izinkalo ngqi, Zikhanye izibani.

Refrain: Bakithi, simi eJordan,


Yebo ngoboph’ ukhalo lwam’, Ngiqonde-nje phezulu,

Limnandi, lihl’ ikhaya lami’ Phesheya kwalomfulo.

Refrain: Bakithi, simi eJordan,


Lapha siphel’ amandla nya, Phesheya sophumula, Nganeno kusemnyam-nje, Pheshey’ inkazimulo

Refrain: Bakithi, simi eJordan,

title: (MANGIBE NJENGOJESU)
lyrics:
Mangibe njengoJesu, Wayengothobile Kuhle ngibenjengaye, Wayengothambile.

Mangibe njengoJesu Ngamazwi am’onke, Ngibheke kahle kuye, Lithamb’izwi lami.

Mangibe njengoJesu, Ehlushw’edelelwa, Kaziphindiselanga, Wajul’ekhuleka

Mangibe njengoJesu, Kaning’ethandaza Eyedwa entabeni, uYise emuzwa.

Mangibe njengoJesu, Ngokwami ukwenza Ngimbheke, ngimlandele, Ngokuhamba kwami.

Mangibe njengoJesu Ngizozama ngawe, Ngimele,ungisize,
Ngize ngikufuze.	Amen.

title: (Kholwani eNkosini)
lyrics:
Kholwani eNkosini Niqond’ indlela yayo Ngamandla ayo nize Nihambe ngokwethemba.

Zinikeleni kuyo Ngezenzo zenu zonke Nihambe ngezwi layo Libus’ izulu nezwe.

Kudlula izinsuku Kudlula iminyaka Kuhleli akupheli Asithembisa khona.

Inxa indlela yayo Isithwe ubumnyama Hlalani ngokukholwa Ihlez’ inomsa njalo.

Phakathi kobumnyama Namanzi nesiphepho Nohamba kahle kuzo Ingozi zonk’ ezimbi.

Nobekezela kuze Kufik’ inkathi lapho Buphela ubusuku
Kuvele ukukhanya. Amen.

title: (Ohlangothini loMsindisi wami)
lyrics:
Ohlangothini loMsindisi wami Wawumpompoza umthombo wegazi Bonke aboni abacwile kuwo Bayagezeka baphume bemhlophe.

Yebo nomphangi owafel’ emthini Wajabuliswa emthonjeni lowo Nami ingani ngimubi kunaye Ngingagezeka egazini lelo.

Nami selokhu ngathemb’ egazini Ngipheth’ indaba emnandi uqobo Angisenalo elinye igama
Lona kuphela ngothando lweNkosi.


Nxa ngingasekho sengis’ elibeni Laph’ abafayo bedlulela khona Ngiyakuhuba ngolimi olusha
Ngimbong’ uJesu owangisindisa. Amen.

title: (Jesu Krist’ onguMhlengi)
lyrics:
Jesu Krist’ onguMhlengi

Mangiphelele kuwe Sikhona isiphepho Sikhon’ isikhukhula Ake ungivikele
Lapha ngilwa nalempi Namsukwan’ ungibiza Uze ungamukele.

Akekh’ ongangisiza Ngizinikela kuwe Ngamukele ngingafi Nginike induduzo Nguw’ ongelekelela
Ngakho ngithemba wena Ngifukamele Nkosi Ngengephuphu lenyoni.

Umsa wakh’ unganele Kanye neGazi lakho Ngigeze ngibemhlophe Ngilonde ngingangcoli Ungumthombo wempilo Mangiphuziswe kuwe Mpompozel’ inhliziyo

Igcwalise ngothando. Amen.

title: (Ngomdumis’ uMhlengi wami)
lyrics:
Ngomdumis’ uMhlengi wami, Ngob’ izono wazithwala, Wangifel’ esphambanweni, Walisul’ elam’ icala.

IKORUSI
Thokozani, thokozani! Sihlengiwe igazi lakhe, El’ ophel’ izonono zethu, Esiphambanweni sakhe, Esiphambanweni sakhe.

Ngomdumis’ uMhlengi wami Ngob’ engizuzel’ ikhaya, Wangilwela, wangimela, Ngenxa yami babemshaya.

Ngomdumis’ uMhlengi wami, Ngiyibong’ iNkosi yami, Ingisiza ngimahlule USathan’ isitha sami.

Ngomdumis’ uMhlengi wami, Walinyazwa ngenxa yami, Ungihlanza ezonweni, Sengimthand’ uMfeli wami. Amen.

title: (Webathandwa, yek’ inhlanhla)
lyrics:
Webathandwa, yek’ inhlanhla Yokukholwa uy’ uJesu, Nokuphathw’ ezakh’ izandla Asiyise ekhaya ngale.

IKORUSI
Kuzohlatshelelwa khona, Basho: Aleluya, Aleluya, Njengomfula kwohlokoma, Kudunyiswe iNkosi le.

Emhlabeni izinhlupheko Zithulis’ ihubo lethu, Kodwa lapho zingasekho, Lophelela ihubo ehe!

Lapha njalo sihlukana, Kuyavam’ izinyembezi, Kodwa lapho sohlangana, ‘Zinyembezi zosulwa iNkos’.

Mangabikho osalayo
Mhla bangcwele beyobizwa, Nxa inkosi ivalayo, Angabikho ojabhayo, qha!

title: (Luyisimanga uthando lo)
lyrics:
Luyisimanga uthando lo, Owangithanda ngalo bo! Nguye osisindisayo, Mdumiseni.

IKORUSI
Uyangimangalisa

UJesu owangisindisa Uyangithokozisa Mdumiseni.

Lona lwahlula ingqondo yami, Ngoba ngithandwa ngalo nam’, Ngakho utholile konk’ okwam’,
Mdumiseni!


Ngalo wathwal’ izono zam’, Nesiphambano ngenxa yam’, Ngalo waqed’ icala lam’,
Mdumiseni!


Ngalo ngondiswa njalo nam’ Luyavuthis’ uthando lwam’ Luyakhulis’ ithemba lam’
Mdumiseni!

title: (Hlengiwe limnandi lelizwi)
lyrics:
Hlengiwe limnandi lelizwi,

Hlengiwe ngegazi lemMvana Hlengiwe ngomusa nothando, Ngenziwe sengaba umntwana.

IKORUSI
Hlengiwe, Hlengiwe, Hlengiwe ngegazi leMvana Hlengiwe hlengiwe
Ngenziwe sengaba umntwana


Hlengiwe-o yek’ intokozo! Ulimi lungephimisele
Lokh’ engikuzway’ enhliz’ weni, Kumnandi, kumnandi, igcwele!

Ngiyazi ngombona masinya, Ishilo kanjalo iNkosi,
Nxa eselilanda iBandla, O, yeka bukhul’ ubukhosi!

Ngimkhumbul’ uJesu uMhlengi, Ngimkhumbul’ amalanga onke, Ngihuba ngihamb’ endleleni Ihubo lezinsuku zonke.

Ngiyazi ikhona nem’ qhele, Eyibabekele abayo, Izowaqhelis’ amaqhawe, Ngosuk’ olukhul’ oluzayo.

title: (Ngingenwe emoyeni wam’)
lyrics:
Ngingenwe emoyeni wam’ Ilizwi lakho, Nkosi yam, Sengilambele wena nje, Ungen’ ubuse kimi – ke.

IKORUSI
Ngihlanzwe emoyeni wam’, Mangibethelw’ uqobo lwam’ Senginikele konk’ okwam’ Kuwe, kuwe, kuwe.

‘Mabala onke, Nkosi yam’, Awungcolis’ umoya wam’, Ngihlanze kuwo namhlanje. Ungenze ngikufuze, he.

Akukh’ okuhle kimi, qha, Wongenza ngibe ngcwele, pha! Ngiyakwethemba wena nje, Sengiyancika kuwe-ke.

Ngingabi ngiziqhenya la. Angithi, sengifile nya.
Inkambo yam’ ikhombe-ke Kuyen’ owangifela, he.

Ngingawukhohlwa umhla lo Nxa satholana nawe? Wo!
Ungiqinise, Jesu wam’, Kube nguwen’ impilo yam’.

title: (Siqonda ekhaya, nithini na?)
lyrics:
Siqonda ekhaya, nithini na? Masingathiyeki ngalutho la! Nxa sikholwa lapha, sobona le, Sohlala noJesu, kukuhle hle.

IKORUSI
Yebo, bakithi, sombonga, he,

Loduma izulu likeneze, nke! UJes’ ufanel’ ubukhosi nje, Ehe! Wodunyiswa phezulu le.

Bodade nabafo, kunjani na? Inxa nikhathazwa, hubani la:
Khon’ im’thwalo le yobalula nje, Nabamba kalula indlela-ke.

Bhekani kuJes’ onguMholi-ke, Nophiwa amandla uyena he!
UJesu unathi ngoMoya la, Kepha-ke ngale sizombona, he!

title: (Ngazo zonk’ izinsuku)
lyrics:
Ngazo zonk’ izinsuku, Yebo zonk’ izinsuku, Ngizolibonga, Nkosi yam’ Elakho igama.

Qha ngingeze ngipheze, Ngolibonga ngifeze, Ngizolibonga, Nkosi yam’,

Elakho igama.


Awu! Limandi, lingcwele, Enhliz’ weni ligcwele, Ngizolibonga, Nkosi yam’, Elakho igama.

Uyinkosi yezulu, Uphakeme kakhulu, Ngizolibonga Nkosi yam’, Elakho igama.

Wazithobisa wena, Weza wabayiMvana,
Ngizolibonga, Nkosi yam’, Elakho igama.

Wazithwala izono, Weza, webani, shono;
Ngizolibonga, Nkosi yam’, Elakho igama.

title: (Sinikela kuwe)
lyrics:
Sinikela kuwe Baba lesisinkwa
Sibe umthombo wokuphila Ukristu.

Nangalesisitsha Esisindisayo
Sikhumbula ukufa kwakho Novuko.

Sibonga ngokuba Sithe siyizoni Wasivumelake nathi Sikukhonze.

NgoMoya oNgcwele Kwanga singamunye Sibambelele kuwena Jesu Njalo.

Nkos’ ibandla lonke Elisemhlabeni
Likhulise othandweni lwakho Njalo. Amen.

title: (Ngilambele Wena)
lyrics:
Ngilambele Wena Jesu mana yami Mpompozela kimina Manz’ aphilayo.

Sinkwa sePhasika Yondl’ impilo yami
Nxa wondl’ abanye ngiphe Nami ngingafi.

E! mvin’ oyiwona Kuwe ngiqhabule Hlumelelis’ impilo Yami ngingafi.

Indlel’ inameva Selokhu ngaqala Ngondle sinkwa siza Ndodana yomuntu.

Luselud’ ukhalo

Ngilangazelela Mpompozela kimin’ Amanz’ aphilayo. Amen.

title: (Igazi lemihlatshelo yonke yabaJuda)
lyrics:
Igazi lemihlatshelo yonke yabaJuda, Lalingeluqed’ uvalo,
Lingesus’ ukona.


Kodwa elikaKristu, wo! Elaphalazwa, ha!
Lisusa zonk’ izono, bo! Liqed’ icala nya!

Sengiyamethemba lowo Owanikelwa le
EGolgotha, ngezono zam’, Nezabantu bonke.

Ngokukholwa ngiyabeka Isandla sami-ke
Phezu kwekhanda leMvana,

Ngivum’ izono, he!


Ilona liyithemba lam’, Ngongena ngalo-ke, Ngohuba nesixuku nam’, Ngibonge lona nje.

title: (Sibheke Baba simukhumbula)
lyrics:
Sibheke Baba simukhumbula Owasithanda wazosifela
Oth’ ePhezulu abe ekithi UMmeli wethu neMvana futhi Yon’ eyahlatshw’ isihlawulela Wamukele lomhlatshelo wethu.

Babheke nab’ esibathandayo Sicela ngokhona phambi kwakho Ubasondeze kuw’ ubagone Ugcin’ imiphefumulo yabo Ubenze babemhloph’ enhlizweni Ubaph’ amandla ze bakhuthale.

Mbheke Baba yen’ osimelayo Sibheke nathi zitho zakhe Ungazibheki izono zethu Ungakhumbuli nxa sidukile Nanxa sifanele ukushaywa Simelw’ iNkos’ iNdodana yakho.

Siza kuwe Jesu samukele Ngokuba usibekezelela Usipha ukudla okungcwele Usihlangulisa ebubini Sikhonza wen’ uz’ usenamise
Singahlukani nawe phakade. Amen.

title: (Nkosi osuseZulwini)
lyrics:
Nkosi osuseZulwini Owavuk’ ekufeni Wena osivikelayo Osiphe nobukhosi Haleluya Haleluya Jesu sinkwa sempilo.

Ufihliwe enyameni

Njengamhla wokuzalwa Nokho zonk’ izingelosi Zikwazi zikubonga Haleluya Haleluya Nathi sikanye nazo.

Manje siyakudumisa Sithoba phambi kwakho Manje siyacel’ amandla Okuba sikubone Haleluya Haleluya Ukhon’ impela kithi.

Mvana owahlatshwa kanye Usesiphambanweni Lomhlatshelo owawenza Usebandleni lakho Haleluya Haleluya Uthethelel’ izono.

Sinkwa esiphila ngaso Gaz’ elisigezayo
Lonk’ iZulu wonk’ umhlaba Ubong’ umfeli wawo

Haleluya Haleluya
Khanya njalo nje Nkosi. Amen.

title: (Sinkwa sasezulwini)
lyrics:
Sinkwa sasezulwini Onyama ingukudla Kusuth’ imphefumulo Ngesinkwa seqiniso Zonk’ insuku siqine Ngay’ owasifelayo.

Mvana, esiph’ igazi Lomhlatshelo ngesitsha Siphila ngamanxeba Nangasisiphambano Jesu sifake thina
Kuwe, sikhule ngawe. Amen.

title: (Mvana ehlatshiwe)
lyrics:
Mvana ehlatshiwe Siyakudumisa

Sizithoba kuwe Wena Nkosi yethu.

Zonk’ izingelosi Ziyamboz’ ubuso Uma zikhuleka Kuwe Nkosi yazo.

Manje Sikhuleka Sihlangene nazo Ngob’ ukhona lapha Noma ungabonwa.

Siyawudumisa
Won’ umzimba wakho Silibong’ iGazi Elinqabileyo

Asikufanele Lokhukudla kwethu Kodwa sisondezwa Ngal’ uthando lwakho.

Nkosi siz’ usenze

Sibe ngabaNgcwele Size sifanele Ukukwamukela. Amen.

title: (Jesu uMsindisi)
lyrics:
Jesu uMsindisi Okithi manje Thabis’ inhliziyo Iz’ ichichime.

Siph’ amandla Nkosi Aqinisayo Sikuthande njajo Wesatshwe futhi.

Singabonga ngani Ngalesisipho Esithola ngaso Izibusiso

Au! sohlala nini Kuwena Nkosi

Masilinde uze
Usis’ ekhaya. Amen.

title: (Kunjalo Baba thin’ abantu bakho)
lyrics:
Kunjalo Baba thin’ abantu bakho Sibeka phambi kwakho iNdodana Engumhlatshelo wethu ophelele Ongenacala.

Bhek’ abantwana bakho bayakhala Kuwe uYise ngaye uMsindisi Owabahlenga ezonweni zabo NgeGazi lakhe.

Baphambi kwakho bayakhulekela Abantu bonke abakholwa kuwe Lab’ abakhona nabadlulileyo Bacel’ umusa. Amen.

title: (Siyadumisa wena Msindisi)
lyrics:
Siyadumisa wena Msindisi Okhona laph’ esidlweni sakho Singeze sem’ emehlweni akho Siza kuwe lapha ngentobeko.

Wena mthombo wokulunga Kristu Ngegazi lakho sihlanjululwa Yandis’ ukholo lwethu sithande Sithemb’ izipho zomusa wakho.

Isakramente lomzimba wakho Negazi lakho siphila ngalo Siphiwe nguwen’ onguMsindisi Hlala kithi manje naphakade.

Sikubonga nom’ usithekile Sikwemukel’ esikomeleyo Ukuze ube sobala kithi
Sibong’ uthando nomusa wakho
Amen.

title: (Ngilondolozwe kahle)
lyrics:
Ngilondolozwe kahle Ngikuwe Jesu Ngisengalweni yakho Ngiphethw’ uthando Uthand’ oluvimbayo Nxa ngilingw’ isitha Ngingaphumula khona Enhliziyweni yakho.

(Imigqa emine yevesi lokuqala iyi refrain) Ngilondolozwe kahle

Jesu uyabagcina Abantu bakho Lapho bekhathazeka Besengozini
Ngiyakhululwa nguwe Kukho ukwesaba Ngingebe nal’ uvalo Ngisekhwapheni lakho.

Ngilondolozwe kahle

Jesu oNqabankulu Sithandwa sami Nguwe owahlawula Izono zami Awungiqinisele Ekukwethembeni Ngize ngifinyelele Laph’ ubusa khona.

Ngilondolozwe kahle

title: (Wozan’ eNkosini niphumule)
lyrics:
Wozan’ eNkosini niphumule Nin’ enikhathazwa ngokomhlaba Nilakhe konk’ okungcolisayo Nizuz’ amandla avela kuwe.

Dedani kukho konk’ okomhlaba Hlalani kuNkulunkulu wethu Kungaba kuhl’ ukuhlala naye Woniduduza anivikele.

Kulandeni enikwenzileyo Okuhle neniphuthe kukhona Uyazi zonke izinhlupheko Ezinicindezel’ emhlabeni.

Wozani niphumul’ endleleni Funa nahlulwe niphel’ amandla Yidlani’ isinkw’ esiqinisayo Niphuz’ igaz’ elithabisayo

Bese nisuka seninamandla Nihambe nisebenzel’ iNkosi Nibekezele nim’ isibindi Ukuze nifike eZulwini. Amen.

title: (Wen’ owafa ngenxa yethu)
lyrics:
Wen’ owafa ngenxa yethu Wena owavul’ izulu Sihlushwa yizitha zethu Siza Nkosi, siph’ amandla

Msindis’ osisindisayo Obongekayo kakhulu Masingenisw’ ezulwini Sihlale kuwe nanini. Amen.



234(a) (Siyabonga lelolizwi)


Siyabonga lelolizwi Owalisho Nkosi Jesu Elokuthi Yenzanini, Lokhu okukhumbuzayo.

Lesisinkwa samkeleni Lokhu kung’ umzimba wami Owahlatshwa emuthini Wanikelwa ngenxa yenu.

Phuzanini, nina nonke, Lokhu kul’ igazi lami Engivumelana nani
Nabo bonk’ abantu ngalo.


Kuyabonakala lapha,

Nkosi, lokhukuhlupheka Okufakazela kithi Ukuthanda okungaka.

Lokhu siyakwenza, Nkosi, Ukhunjulwe, Ubatshazwe, Malukhul’ uthando lwethu,
Lapha sikhumbul’ olwakho. Amen.



234(b) (Sibonga lelolizwi)


Sibonga lelolizwi Owalishoyo Jesu Elithi yenzanini,
Lokh’ okukhumbuzayo.


Thathani lesisinkwa Lokhu ngumzimba wami Owahlatshwa emthini Uhlatshwa ngenxa yenu.

Phuzani nina nonke Lokhu ligazi lami

Ngalo ngivumelana Nani nabantu bonke.

Kubonakala lapha Ukuhlupheka kwakho Okufakaza kithi Uthando olukhulu.

Lokhu sikwenza Nkosi Ukhunjulw’ ubatshazwe Khalis’ uthando lwethu
Nxa sikhumbul’ olwakho. Amen.

title: (Jesu Nkosi okithina manje)
lyrics:
Jesu Nkosi okithina manje Sibambelela ngezinhliziyo

Benze bonke abakudla lapha Balwaz’ uthando nezipho zakho.

Izinhliziyo ohlezi kuzo Mazivanywe yizithel’ ezinhle.

Siphe sikudle njalo ngokholo Kuvame kith’ izenzo zokholo.

Vul’ amehlo ethu akubone
Wen’ oNgcwele kunezinto zonke.


Siqinise ohambeni lonke Kuqhamuk’ ukuth’ unathi njalo.

Masiphathwe ukuthula kwakho Baze bonke bakubone ngathi.

Sihambe ngokwesab’ okuNgcwele Singakhohlw’ ukuthi useduze.

Yiba kithi nathi sibe kuwe
Msindis’ ongumvuzi nomvikeli. Amen.

title: (Angifanele Nkosi eNgcwele)
lyrics:
Angifanele Nkosi eNgcwele Ubungen’ enhliziyweni yami

Khulum’ izwi lomsa libe linye Lona liyakhulula izoni.

Angifanel’ ukub’ uze kimi
Ub’ indlu yakh’ umphefumlo wami Ungas’ uvum’ ukungena kuwo Khuluma Nkosi nami ngiphile.

Angifanele Nkosi yezulu Ngokwala ‘njani’ uba wena uze Wen’ ongiphay’ iNyama neGazi Elisulay’ amacala ami.

Au! mana uze ngayo lemini Phanake nam’ ukudl’ okuNgcwele Ivam’ uthando ize iqine
Lenhliziyo yam’ eyonakele. Amen.

title: (Bayethe Jesu osisindisayo)
lyrics:
Bayethe Jesu osindisayo
Wena owahlatshwa ngenxa yethu Wena owangena eZulwini

Wasivulela isango lalo.


Sibheke Nkosi sicindezelwe Yizitha zethu zisihlomele Siphel’ amandla siyakucela Ukuba uzosihlangulisa.

Siyabonga Nkulunkulu Munye Sibonga wena oNgqobontathu Sengath’ ungahlala nathi njalo Ezweni lakithi laphezulu. Amen.

title: (Bayethe Nkos’ eyehl’ eZulwini)
lyrics:
Bayethe Nkos’ eyehl’ eZulwini
Wen’ onguLizw’ owathath’ uMzimba.


Bayethe Krist’ osisindisayo Kush’ umhlaba kwenanel’ iZulu.

Bayethe Nkosi kush’ ingelosi Bayethe Nkosi kusho iBandla.

Phansi phezul’ endaweni zonke Yizwa kudum’ amahubo njalo.

Sondela Nkos’ uhambele kithi Uzosipha ubabalo lwakho.

Sesihlangene ngokwezi lakho Sithol’ okuhl’ owakwethembisa.

Siza uthumel’ uMoya wakho Azogez’ izinhliziyo zethu.

Asenze sibeyindlu yakh’ enhle

Elungiselelw’ ukuhlala wena.


Ngokuza kwakho mhla wokugcina Koncibilika konk’ okukhona.

Sibonge wena thina abakho Sesikhululw’ engozini zonke. Amen.

title: Sondelani namukele Umzimba womSindisi Niliphuz’ iGazi lakhe Elophiselwa nina Haleluya Haleluya Siyakubonga Nkosi.
Yiwo lowoMzimba wakhe Owasisindisayo
lyrics: Sithokoza emoyeni Masibonge iNkosi Haleluya Haleluya Siyakubonga Nkosi.

title: Yen’ oyiNdodan’ eYodwa Esinik’ ukuphila
lyrics: Wafel’ esiphambanweni Wakunqoba ukufa Haleluya Haleluya Siyakubonga Nkosi.

title: Wanikelw’ uJesu Kristu Ngenxa yabantu bonke Nguye ongonikelayo Nguye ongumnikelo Haleluya Haleluya Siyakubonga Nkosi.
Kade kwakuhlatshw’ izimvu Ezingenakuhlenga Sekuhlatshwa oyimvana Yokususa izono
lyrics: Haleluya Haleluya Siyakubonga Nkosi.

title: Yena owahleng’ abantu Bahlez’ ekuthunjweni Uyasiph’ amandla akhe Laph’ esidlweni sakhe Haleluya Haleluya Siyakubonga Nkosi
Sondelani ngenhliziyo Ezihlambulukile Sondelani namukele UMthombo zensindiso Haleluya Haleluya Siyakubonga Nkosi.
Yen’ olondoloza bonke Abaphephela kuye Uyasipha ukuphila Okungunaphakade Haleluya Haleluya Siyakubonga Nkosi
Nxa silambil’ uyasipha Isinkwa sabangcwele Nxa somile uyasipha Amanzi okuphila Haleluya Haleluya Siyakubonga Nkosi
Jabulani Jabulani Usekuthina manje OyiNkosi yamakhosi Yen’ onguSimakade Haleluya Haleluya
lyrics: Siyakubonga Nkosi. Amen.

title: (Wena Msindisi Jes’ ongifele)
lyrics:
Wena Msindisi Jes’ ongifele Manginikele konk’ enginako
Ngenze ngikuthande ngidumise wena Mangihlale kuwe ngib’ owakho.

Ngibheka kuwena eZulwini Lapho wen’ ukhon’ unginxusela
Ngiph’ amandla akho ukuze ngithwale Isiphambano sam’ ngilandele.

Ngisondela kuwe esidlweni Ngimukele khona wen’ uqobo KunguMzimba wakho nal’ iGazi lakho Ngemukele khona wen’ uqobo.

Bonke abaNgcwele badumisa Emfihlakalweni kulenkonzo
Nami ngiyabonga lokh’ ukufa kwakho Okuthabisayo kusobala.

Mangifuze wena ngobuNgcwele Ngiphe inhliziyo ethembayo
Ngenze ngikukhonze ngamandl’ ami onke Ngisebenze kuwe Mhlengi wami. Amen.

title: (Asivez’ iGam’ elihle)
lyrics:
Asivez’ iGam’ elihle Lokubong’ uJesu Sihlangane namaBandla Lawo aphezulu
Ngisho nom’ izingelosi Ziyizinkulungwane Kepha injabulo yazo Injabulo yinye.

Ziyahub’ igam’ elithi Ifanel’ iMvana Ukunikw’ udumo lonke Nobukhosi njalo Siyavuma kanye nazo Ifanel’ impela
Ifanele ubukhosi Ngoba yasifela.

Ufanel’ uJesu Kristu Ubukhosi bonke

Ukubongw’ okungapheli Kub’ okwakhe njalo Uyasiph’ umzimba wakhe Ub’ ukudla kwethu Siyaphuz’ iGazi lakhe Elihlanza konke.

Wozanini zinto zonke Nizithobe phansi
Phambi kwesihlalo sakhe Laph’ ehlezi khona Nibabaz’ iGama lakhe Ngoba lihl’ impela
Nom’ ekhona eZulwini Useduze kwethu. Amen.

title: (Usibonisa uthando)
lyrics:
Usibonisa uthando ngokusipha lokhukudla Mabeze bonke abantu bezw’ ukuthi unomusa.

Ujes’ usinik’ uMzimba usinik’ iGazi lakhe Wobusiswa omukela lokh’ ukudla okuNgcwele.

Kuyize konke lokho na? Bakhon’ abanqab’ ukuza UJesu wafela nabo bayabizwa nabo badle.

Mabeze laph’ abaningi bamkeliswe bajabule Basinda abadla kahle njengalokhu bathenjiswa.

UNkulunkul’ onguYise neNdodana nay’ uMoya Kadunyiswe emhlabeni naphezulu njalo njalo.	Amen.

title: (Jesu osisindisayo)
lyrics:
Jesu osisindisayo Samkele sisondele Sesifike ekudleni Okwamiswayo nguwe.

Ngokuvalelisa kwakho Washo kub’ abafundi Ngokugcina izwi lami Niyakungikhumbula.

Yidlanini lesisinkwa Niphuze newayini

Lokhu kunguMzimba wami Lokhu liGazi lami.

Yebo Jesu lokhukudla Sikudla ngokukholwa Ngaso lesisikhumbuzo Siyakukhumbula. Amen.

title: (Baba bheka abantwana bakho)
lyrics:
Baba bheka abantwana bakho Bakhothama phambi kwesihlalo Benza khona umhlatshelo lowo Babonga ngaw’ ukufa kukaJesu.

Sibonisa lokho kufa kwakhe Akuncenga ngakho ezulwini Sibikela bonk’ abantu bakho Abaswel’ ukub’ ubathethelele.

Busisa abakh’ abakuthandayo Land’ izimvu ezidukileyo Gcina kahle imiphefumulo
Yabo abalele kuy’ uMsindisi. Amen

title: (Somandla siyabonga)
lyrics:
Somandla siyabonga Ngale Ndodana yakho Yamisa isakramente Yethembisa uthando.

Lowomzimba negazi Kube isikhumbuzo Esokuhlupheka kwayo Okungakhulumeki.

Lapho sikhulekayo Kuy’ ezintweni zonke Siyathola intokozo Leyo eyaphakade.

Sibonga wena Kristu Ngaso isidlo sakho

Esisihlumelelayo Nabazalwane bonke. Amen.

title: (Dumisan’ iNkosi yethu)
lyrics:
Dumisan’ iNkosi yenu Zingelosi phezulu
Nawe langa nawe nyanga Niyibong’ eZulwini Ibongeni inqumile Mawuzw’ umhlaba wonke Imisile imithetho Engenakuguqulwa.

Yibongeni nin’ abayo Eniphiw’ ubukhosi Nisindiswa yiyo nonke Anikwahlulw’ ukona Nimdumise uMsindisi Webantu bayo nonke Nikhulis’ iGama layo
INkosi yakho konke. Amen.

title: (Bonga mphefumulo wami)
lyrics:
Bonga mphefumulo wami Uhash’ iNkosi yakho Uhlengwa uthethelelwa Bonga iNkosi yakho Haleluya Haleluya
Bong’ iNkosi phakade.


Mbonge ngoba wabasiza Behluphek’ abendulo Mbonge usenjalo manje Akashesh’ ukushaya Haleluya Haleluya
INkos’ ethembekile.


NjengoYis’ elondoloza Bonk’ abantwana bakhe Abakhiphe engozini Abahaw’ kele njalo Haleluya Haleluya Unomus’ ongapheli.

Uyakhonzw’ izingelosi

Ezimbhek’ ebusweni NabaNgcwele bakhothama Ababuthw’ ezizweni Haleluya Haleluya Asimbong’ onomusa. Amen.

title: (Vumani igama lokuthokoza)
lyrics:
Vumani igama lokuthokoza: thathelani phezulu elokubonga
Haleluya, Haleluya


Abasindiswayo bayavuma: badumis’ iNkosi yabo ngokuthi Haleluya, Haleluya

Nezingelosi ezakhe phezulu: ziyakuzwa zivume ngokuthi Haleluya, Haleluya

Nabahleziyo epharadisi: bahlangana nabo behuba, ngokuthi
Haleluya, Haleluya


Izinkanyezi ezikhanya phezulu: ziyakuvumelana ngokuthi Haleluya, Haleluya

Nani mafu enihambayo, wena moya ovunguzayo: wena lodumo lwaphezulu, wena lunyazi olukhanyayo: vumani nonke ngokuthi
Haleluya


Nina zikhukhula, nina manzi, nina ziphepho, nawe liqhwa: nina mihla ekhanyayo, nina hlobo nobusika: nina mahlathi amakhulu, vumani nonke ngokuthi

Haleluya,


Izinyoni ezindizayo maziqale:	zimdumis’ uMenzi wazo ngokuthi
Haleluya, Haleluya


Anduba	izilwane	zihlangene:	kanye	nokunye	konke ngokuthi
Haleluya, Haleluya


Izintaba zimemeza ngokuthi:	Haleluya:	zivume kahle nezimfunda ngokuthi
Haleluya


Wena lulwandle olujulileyo, vuma ngokuthi: Haleluya, Nina mazwe amakhulu landelani ngokuthi:
Haleluya


UBaba owenza konke: kabongwe njalo ngegama lokuthi Haleluya, Haleluya

Ilel’ igama eliphakade uBaba alithandayo:	Haleluya lel’ igama lezulu uKristu alithandayo:
Haleluya


Masivume-ke kuvuke inhliziyo nezwe: Haleluya

Abantwana bathathwe ihlombe ngokuthi: Haleluya

Mabavume abantu bonke, bethi: Haleluya, Bedumisa uYise nenDodada noMoya oNgcwele
Haleluya


Makabongwe ubuThathu:
Haleluya, Haleluya, Haleluya. Amen.

title: (Nonke enisemhlabeni)
lyrics:
Nonke enisemhlabeni Bongan’ iNkosi yethu Izwi lenu malidume Nikhonz’ imihla yonke Nincom’ udumo lwayo Wozani nithokoze.

LeyoNkosi niyayazi NguNkulunkulu yona InguMdali wethu sonke Singumsebenzi wayo Sibuswa iyo njalo Ithand’ izimvu zayo.

Ngalokho-ke indlu yayo Ingenwa yibo bonke Bathokoze sebekuyo Bajabul’ eNkosini Ibongwe yibo bonke Ngob’ ifanele’ impela.

LeyoNkos’ enkulu yethu

Imi ngunaphakade Ilungile inokwazi Inomusa nothando Iqiniso likuyo
Kade lema phakade.


Kadunyisw’ uNkulunkulu UYise neNdodana
Kanye Naye onguMoya ONgcwele naphakade Kadunyisw’ ibo bonke Abalaph’ emhlabeni. Amen

title: (Wonk’ umhlaba mawuhube uthi)
lyrics:
Wonk’ umhlaba mawuhube uthi Nkosi Mbusi
Awedlulwa zulu Udume kakhulu Nomhlab’ ongelutho Mawukudumise
Wonk’ umhlaba mawuhube uthi Nkosi Mbusi.

Wonk’ umhlaba mawuhube uthi Nkosi Mbusi
Ibandl’ alihube Kungevaleleke Phezu kwakho konke Masikhuthazele
Wonk’ umhlaba mawuhube uthi Nkosi Mbusi. Amen.



251(Nin’ abalind’ abangcwele)


Nin’ abalind’ abangcwele Zingelosi nezikhulu Manibong’ uNkulunkulu Manimemez’ ezulwini Mabandl’ engelosi nithi Haleluya, Haleluya, Haleluya Haleluya, Haleluya.

Wen’ otusw’ abantu bonke Ongaphezu kwengelosi Bonga uthi! Haleluya

Wen’ owazala uLizwi Ogcwel’ umusa shon’ uthi Haleluya, Haleluya, Haleluya Haleluya, Haleluya.

Nin’ enisekuphumuleni Bokhokho nabaProphethi Nisho nithi Haleluya BaPostoli nabafeli BaNgcwele bonke hubani Haleluya, Haleluya, Haleluya Haleluya, Haleluya

Zihlobo masijabule Sihlabelele ingoma Yokubonga Haleluya UYise eneNdodana Kanye noMoya oNgcwele
Haleluya, Haleluya, Haleluya Haleluya, Haleluya.	Amen.

title: (Emhlabeni naphezulu)
lyrics:
Emhlabeni naphezulu Kakho nez’ ongangawe Wena onguSimakade Ungusomandla futhi Ulungile unomusa UyiNkosi yodumo

Thin’ abantu siyakhohlwa Ukubabaza wena
Thina nxa singakuboni Wena uyababona Bonke abakubongayo Nabangakubongiyo

Wena ngesikhath’ esimbe Uyasenza sikhale Sidatshukiswe yizono Sikhal’ izinyembezi Uyashaya ujezise
Kant’ uyasilungisa

Kuhle Bab’ okhona njalo Ubasibuswe nguwe Babheke njalo abakho Uzwe lapho bekhala Ubelekelele njalo
Baze banqobe ngawe.	Amen.


NB: Makuphindwe imigqa emibili yokugcina kulelo nalelo vesi, uma kusetshenziswe indlela yokuqala.
Emva kwevesi lokuqala nelesibili nelesithathu ikwaya nxa likhona liyakuhlabelela elinye lalamavesi alandelayo


Wabani okhona lapha Naphezul’ ezulwini Ongalinganiswa nawe Wawukhona phakade Wen’ onguyise wamandla Sokulunga somusa.

Kungobumpumputhe bethu Uba singakuboni Luyanteng’ ukholo lwethu Yikho singakuboni
Qinisa ukholo lwethu Sikubone sikwazi

Sithi singakwazi wena Sithole ukuphila Zembule
Kithi Msindisi Yikhona sizophila Sikubonge siselapha Nasezwen’ elizaya

title: (Zwakalisan’ igama lenkosi)
lyrics:
Zwakalisan’ igama lenkosi ElinguJes’ uMsindisi wethu Silibabaze silikhulise
Ab’ inkos’ ephezu kwakho
konke.


Nawe likhwez’ ohamba phezulu Nawe langa nani zinkanyezi Zwakalisan’ udumo lweNkosi Ab’ iNkos’ ephezu kwakho
konke.


Nani maKristu izindlalifa Nesimiso samaIsraeli Bongani low’ onisindisayo Ab’ inkos’ ephezu kwakho
konke.


Zonk’ izizwe nezilimi zonke Mazihlokome zibong’ uJesu

Zilethe kuye izindumiso
Ab’ iNkos’ ephez kwakho konke. Amen.

title: (Manijabule webantu)
lyrics:
Manijabule webantu Enisemazweni onke Manijabul’ eNkosini Wozani niyihubele.

Thokozani nimdumise UNkulunkulu iNkosi Ngokubabaza nihube Kufanel’ ukwenaz njalo.

Uyen’ owasenza thina Asizenzaga ngokwethu UnguMalus’ obonisa Izimvu zakhe edlelweni.

Ngenan’ emasangwen’ ayo Nikhululeke nimdumise

Igama layo eliNgcwele Ngoba lokho kufanele.

Ngokuba yen’ unomusa Kayek’ ukuhawukela Usiphatha ngeqiniso Elimiyo njalo njalo.

Ngakho kadunyisw’ uYise Wabobonke neNdodana NoMoya oNgcwele manje Nangezikhath’ ezizayo. Amen.

title: (Silima sihlwanyela)
lyrics:
Silima sihlwanyela Sihlakule futhi Kepha-ke kumiliswe Yiyo yodw’ iNkosi Usehlisel’ imvula Aphumis’ ilanga Aphephethis’ umoya
Konke kwenz’ wa nguye.
Konke esinakho Kuvel’ eZulwini
Bongan’ iNkos’ ephezulu Esipha konke.

UNkulunkulu yedwa Wenz’ izinto zonke Imithi nemifino Inyanga nekhwezi Ukhonzwa imimoya Wondla izinyoni
Akhohlw’ abantu bakhe

Usipha ukudla
Konke esinakho Kuvel’ eZulwini
Bongan’ iNkos’ ephezulu Esipha konke.

Siyakubonga baba Ngakho konk’ okuhle Ihlobo nobusika Nempilo nokudla Yamkel’ izipho zethu Esibonga ngazo Ngezinhliziyo zonke Ukuphan kwakho
Konke esinakho Kuvel’ eZulwini
Bongan’ iNkos’ ephezulu Esipha konke.Amen.

title: (Mayibongwe inkosi)
lyrics:
Mayibongwe inkosi Ngamahubo okubonga Inomusa ongapheli Ay’ guquki phakade.

Kabongw’ owenz’ ilanga Lokukhanyisa emini Unomus’ onga pheli Kaguquki phakade.

Ingumenzi wenyanga Ekhanyis’ ebusuku Inomus’ ongapheli Ay’ guquki phakade.

Ngob’ isipha imvula Emilisa imbewu Inomus’ ongapheli Ay’ guquki phakade.

Yenza umhlaba uvunde Ukuze uthele kahle

Inomus’ ongapheli Ay’ guquki phakade.

Kabongwe ngesivuno Esithuthelwe ekhaya Unomus’ onga pheli Kaguquki phakade.

Nangokudla okungcono Kwemiphefumulo yethu Unomus’ onga pheli Kaguquki phakade.

Udumo lube kuyo Inkosi ephanayo UYise neNdodana
Nay’ uMoya oNgcwele. Amen

title: (Sekwenzekile lomuntu)
lyrics:
Sekwenzekile lomuntu Naye oweNkosi yethu UJesu wafa ngenxa yakhe Usemamkele ngothando.

Bhekan’ ebusweni bakhe Nant’ uphawu lukaJesu Olukhombisa ukuthi Ukholwa kuye ungowakhe.

Mkhombiseni nina nonke Inkambo emfaneleyo Nimkhulekele nimyale Az’ ahambe ngokulunga.

Mfundiseni az’ alwazi Uthando lwakhe uYise Amkhonz’ uKristu njalo njalo Eholw’ uMoya oNgcwele.

Size sihlangane sonke

Sibone uJesu njalo Sithole lonke ifa lethu Ngalolosuk’ olukhulu.

Kabongw’ osibusisayo Kabongw’ izilimi zonke Kabongw’ izingelosi zonke UNkulukulu ophakade. Amen.

title: (Baba menzi othandayo)
lyrics:
Baba menzi othandayo Sizwe siyakucela Usibheke ngobubele Thina nomntwana wethu Simlethile esemncane Kuwe ab’ umntanakho.

Jesu wena owasifela Simlethile kuwe manje Abengumntanakho njalo Mamukele ngomusa Ubenaye engozini Njengomvikeli wakhe.

O! Nkosi Moya oNgcwele Sizwe sikhala kuwe
Woza namhla kulomntwana Ube ngumholi wakhe Kahlanzeke ngaphakathi Aze aphile ngawe.

Nkosi yethu ngezwi lakho

Simlethe namhla kuwe Yenze inhliziyo yakhe Ib’ ithempeli lakho Kagcineke ngobubele
Az’ afik’ ezulwini.	Amen

title: (Jesu uphawu lwakho)
lyrics:
Jesu uphawu lwakho Lubhekiw’ ebunzini Lufakazel’ ukuthi Singabantu bakho.

Sivuma wen’ impela Phambi kwabantu bonke Sith’ uyiNkosi yethu Singesabi lutho.

Thin’ amabutho akho Siqinisile ngamandla Sisekelwe yisandla Sakho sokunene.

Sibheke ngomsa wakho Singesab’ ukuhlekwa Ziyiz’ izinhlupheko
Nxa sibekezela.


Ngomhla wokwahlulelwa Kuphel’ izinto zonke

Kubo bonke abantu Yamukel’ abakho. Amen

title: (Baba ngomusa wakho)
lyrics:
Baba ngomusa wakho Thina sinezwi lakho Lelizwe lithi kithi Masizalwe kabusha.

Bonk’ abasemhlabeni Bazalw’ ekoneni Liyabatshela izwi Mabazalwe kabusha.

Lomntwana ngomsa wakho Usezelwe kabusha
Ugezwe waqiniswa
Ngay’ uMoya oNgcwele.	Amen.


261(Ngithembisile Nkosi)


Ngithembisile Nkosi

Ukukhonza wena Yiba seduze njalo Nkosi Mhlobo wami
Ngingekwesab’ ukulwa Nxa ulaph’ eduze Ngingephambuke futhi Nxa ngiholwa nguwe.

Ngicel’ ukuzwa Nkosi Ukuth’ useduze Ngokuba okomhlaba Kuphambi kwami la Isono nosathane Ngeke kungiyeke Sondela Nkosi Jesu Ungilonde njalo.

Ngithand’ ukuba ngizwe Izwi lakho njalo
Libe namandla kubo Ubub’ obukimi Khuluma ngingesabi Ngitshele ngiqonde Khuluma mlondi wami

Ngenze ngilandele.


Wethembisile Nkosi Bonk’ abeza kuwe Ukuthi laph’ ukhona Bayohlala nabo Mina ngethembisile Ngathi ngokukhonza
Ngicel’ amandla Nkosi Ngingahlehli nyova.

Ngazis’ indlela Nkosi Ngihambise kuyo Angizethembi mina Ngiyethemba wena Ngihol’ ungihambise Ungaz’ ungishiye Ngiyise ezulwini
Nkosi Mhlengi wami.	Amen

title: (Nkosi ngiyakunika)
lyrics:
Nkosi ngiyakunika Inhliziyo yami

Ngiph’ amandla okuhamba Ngingaduki futhi.

Sengiwa ngikhuleka Phambi kwakho Nkosi Ngiph’ amandl’ okuyeka Zonke izinto ezimbi.

Ngigcobe ngobabalo Olwasezulwini Ngibheke kungasuki OkoMoya wakho.

Hlalis’ okwakho kimi Ngize ngize kuwe Ngikukhonze njalo nje Ngiseduze nawe.

Ngiphe ukukwethemba Lapha emhlabeni
‘Ze ngibe nenjabulo Nxa ngibizwa nguwe

Lapha ngenz’ into Nkosi

Mayib’ enhle kuwe Kub’ injabulo yami Ukuthandwa nguwe.

Mangihambe njalo nje Ngisekelwa nguwe Ngib’ ufakazi wakho Lapha emhlabeni

Khona nxa sekuphela Konke okwamanje Nkos’ uyakungithatha
Ngibe nawe njalo. Amen.

title: (Nkosi simi phambi kwakho)
lyrics:
Nkosi simi phambi kwakho Nom’ ubusa ezulwini Udunyiswa izingelosi Khumbula lesosikhathi Owahlala emhlabeni
Wena Nkulunkul’ uqobo.


Sikubheka sinethemba

Lokusizw’ igama lakho Uma sikwethemba Jesu Sikuthol’ uthembekile Wen’ olondoloza thina Qinis’ osenzela khona.

Wasipha ngombhabhathizo Imbewu yempilo entsha Sibephambi kukaBaba Sesizinikela kuye
Sicela usiqinise
Namhla ngobabalo lwakho.


Siswel’ amandla ngokwethu Okulwa nezitha zethu Baning’ abantwana bakho Abehlulwa iziyengo Sinxusa umusa wakho
Size senz’ intando yakho.


Gcwalisa ngezipho zakho Namhla nxa sibekw’ izandla Samukel’ iziph’ ezinhle ZoMoya wakho oNgcwele

Siza kuwena Kristu
Siph’ uMoya wakho manje.	Amen.

title: (Yankulu injabulo)
lyrics:
Yankulu injabulo Kwomyeni nomakoti Abahanjelw’ uJesu Emzini wase Kana!

Wa menywa emshadweni Wavum’ ukuya khona Kwaqina ukwethaba Ababenakho bonke.

Zana kithina Nkosi Ubabusise laba Abez’ endlini yakho
Bahlanganiswe nguwe.


Xosha ububi kubo Ngesibusiso sakho. Ulungise indlela Abangenayo kuyo.

Mawube nabo, Nkosi, Zonk’ izinsuku zabo:
Ubaph’ inhlalo enhle Ukuba bathndane.
Mabaqiniswe manje Ngokudla okungcwele Bazinikele kuwe
Ukuba bakukhonze.	Amen

title: (Sifikile phambi kwakho, Kristu)
lyrics:
Sifikile phambi kwakho, Kristu Ngalo lolusuku lwenjabulo SIyacela kuwe,babusise
Laba, lomakoti nalomyeni.


Walithath’ iBandla lakho Nkosi Libe umakoti wakho njalo Wena ungumyeni weBandla Lona liyanamathela kuwe.

Kalingis’ iBandla loMakoti Kathandis’ okwakho naloMyeni

Khona bayojabuliswa uwe Benenjabulo noma benosizi.

Siyabonga lenjabul’ enkulu Loluthando lwabo naloshado Siyakudumisa, Baba wethu
NeNdodana yakho nay’ uMoya.	Amen.

title: (Nkosi Menzi wakho konke)
lyrics:
Nkosi Menzi wakho konke Mawudunyiswe ubongwe Singabonga ngani kuwe Opha konke.

Ilang’ elihle nomoya Nokumila emhlabeni Kuveza uthando lwakho Upha konke.

Ngamakhay’ anokuthula Nangokuhle konke kwezwe Ngasibonga sidumise Opha konke.

Awumgodlanga umntanakho Wamnikel’ abant’ ababi Ngomsa wakho kanye naye Upha konke .

Wasabel’ uMoya wakho Ophilisa aqinise Ngezipho eziyinkotha Opha zona.

Ngokuhlenga nenkululo Nomsa nethemba leZulu Baba yin’ ongayiphiwa Upha konke.

Wena osiphayo konke Okukithi nesinakho Masibenawe phakade Opha konke.	Amen.

title: (Nkosi Baba usibheke)
lyrics:
Nkosi Baba usibheke

Siyacela kuwe
Bheka ukuntula kwazo I’ ntandane zakho Bheka izwe lakho Ngoba selomile Abantwana balambile Izwe selifile.

Yebo Nkosi sonakele Asinakuphila
Kuze lokhukuhlupheka Ngokuduka kwethu Kodwa siyacela kuwe Thethelel’ abakho Susa lokhukufa kith
Ngay’ owasifela.	Amen.

title: (Nkosi yethu sibonga)
lyrics:
Nkosi yethu sibonga Ngoba ususizwile Lokh’ esikucelayo Ususiphile khona.

Wezw’ ukukhala kwethu Sibhekisa ngakuwe Namhla siyajabula Sibong’ iGama lakho.

Lizohlob’ izwe lonke Kuthokoz’ izidalwa Kuphele ukulamba Kuphele nokwenqena.

Thian sibonga wena Owenza konke lokhu Somandla onothando Ophethe ngomsa njalo.

Baba sikubabaza Nay’ indodana futhi
Nay’ uMoya oNgcwele
Nkos’ iNye njalonjalo.	Amen

title: (Nkosi siyacela kuwe)
lyrics:
Nkosi siyacela kuwe

Onamandla onke Ulithumel’ izwi lakho Ezizweni zonke Vuselela manje Izinhliziyo zonke
Bizel’ embusweni wakho Bonk’ abasemhlabeni.

Thuma izithunywa zakho Zifundise bonke Zimemezel’ indab’ enhle Emhlabeni wonke Namhla liyacela kuwe IBandla lakho lonke Uthele umoya wakho Kubantu bakho bonke.

Baze baphenduke bonke Ezonweni zabo NgoMsindisi onguKristu Osindisa bonke
Sizwe Baba wethu sonke Siyothokoza zonke Sikubonge njalo njalo

Ngomusa wakh’ omkhulu.


Abomhlaba bayojabula Bathokoze bonke
Nxa sebelamkele izwi Endaweni zonke Siyakubabaza wena Thina abantu sonke Sikubonge wena wedwa Onamandla onke. Amen.

title: (UJesu wabatshel’ abafundi bakhe)
lyrics:
UJesu wabatshel’ abafundi bakhe Engakasuki lapha eya eZulwini Hambani nifundise egameni lami Izizwe nizazise izindaba zami.

Hambani nifundise egameni lami Nifundis’ abantu imithetho yami Kuthiwe makasindiswe yena okholwayo Kuthiwe makalahlwe yena ongakholwa.

Niyakuphiw’ amandla niwaphiwa yimi

Bhekani ngoba nani ngezikhathi zonke Kwath’ ubasho lokho waya eZulwini
Bahamba bengesabi bafundis’ abantu.	Amen


271(Nkosi ngal’ igazi lakho)


Nkosi ngal’ iGazi lakho Fafazel’ izizwe zonke Ngaz’ izinhlupheko zakho Uzidonse zize kuwe Mabatshelwe leyondaba Yas’ isiphambano sakho Baboniswe umsa wakho Nobukhosi bakho futhi.

Nokho bengakwazi wena Bayamswela uMsindisi Bakhona abakukhalela Baphunyuzwe nguwe Nkosi Bayafun’ uNkulunkulu Ezinhliziyweni zabo Bakufuna wena Jesu Owahlushwa ngenxa yabo.

Bayalinda wena Kristu Bayalind’ uMoya wakho Bakhanyiswe bafundiswe Babe ngabantwana bakho Thumel’ izwi lakho kubo Ngabo abashumayeli Ukub’ ezizweni zonke
Lidunyisw’ iGama lakho.	Amen.

title: (Wen’ okhanyis’ inhliziyo)
lyrics:
Wen’ okhanyis’ inhliziyo Ukhanya njal’ eZulwini Othela ngamazol’ akho Kwabafun’ uthando lwakho.

Siza ubusise bonke Abafundis’ izwi lakho Nalab’ abafunda lona Liz’ ibandla libe Ngcwele

Banike abaFundisi Inhliziyo ezimhlophe

Bazilungisel’ izulu Bakuzuzele abanye.

Zivul’ indlebe zabo Abafundi balalele Bazithobe phambi kwakho Bangaliphik’ iqiniso.

Busis’ uMalusi Nkosi Busisa nezimvu zakhe Baphe ukuvumelana Bepheth’ umsebenzi munye.

Kothi Nkosi ngomsa wakho Siphilele wena wedwa Singakadlul’ emhlabeni Sithol’ impil’ ephakade. Amen

title: (Khuluma ngikuzwe Nkosi)
lyrics:
Khuluma ngikuzwe Jesu Ukhulume kimi njalo Mangifun’ abantu bakho Abedukelene nawe.

Siza Nkosi ungihole
Nxa nginqand’ abadukayo Kube nguwe ongondlayo Ngize ngondl’ abalambile

Ngenze Nkosi ngiqinele Ukunamathela kuwe Ngize ngidonsele kuwe
Abangaphandle komhlambi.


Siz’ ungiduduze Nkosi Ungenze ngename njalo Ngize ngiduduze labo Abaphethwe yizinsizi.

Siz’ ungigcwalise Nkosi Ngazo zonk’ iziph’ ezinhle

Ize inhliziyo yami Income wena obala.

Mangib’ inceku eqotho Ethobel’ intando yakho Ukuze ngibuse nawe
Lapha Nkosi naphakade.   Amen.

title: (God be with you till we meet again!)
lyrics:
God be with you till we meet again! By His counsels guide uphold you With His sheep securely fold you God be with you till we meet again!

Chorus	Till we meet; till we meet
Till we meet at Jesus’ feet	X2
God be with you will we meet again!


God be with you till we meet again! Neath His wings securely hide you Daily manna still provide you;
God be with you till we meet again!


God be with you till we meet again! When life’s perils thick confound you Put His loving arms around you;
God be with you till we meet again!


God be with you till we meet again Keeps love’s banner floating o’er you
Smite death’s threatening wave before you;

God be with you till we meet again.	Amen

title: (Nkosi konke okomhlaba)
lyrics:
Nkosi konke okomhlaba Kuyalizwa izwi lakho Sizwe siyacela kuwe Thina abantwana bakho.

Zibusise izihambi Uzigcine zisahamba Uzikhiphe engozini Ukuze zifik’ ekhaya.

Babusise abakithi Abehlukeneyo nathi Mabalondolozwe nguwe Besesendleleni yabo.

Mabaholwe nguwe Nkosi Bangaduki baphambuke Bangangeni ebubini Bangalahl’ umusa wakho.

Mawuhambe njalo nabo Ube yisihlangu sabo Ubabuyisele kithi Sebeqed’ uhambo lwabo.

Nkosi osithandanisa Nabakithi balomhlaba Senze sithandane futhi
Nabangcwele baphezulu.	Amen.

title: (Siyacela Baba wethu)
lyrics:
Siyacela Baba wethu Wena onamandla onke Othulisa lonk’ ulwandle Ukhluma ngezwi lakho Sibakhulekela kuwe
Bonke abahamb’ olwandle.


Jesu owashumayela Wathulis amadlambi
Was’ uhamba phezu kwawo Awzange uz’ ushone Sibakhulekela kuwe
Bonke abahamb olwandle.


Nkulunkulu onguBaba Wen’ olondoloz’ abantu ‘Engozini,zalomhlaba Secela uqed’ uvalo
Uze udunyiswe,Yise
Nendondana nawe Moya.	Amen.

title: (Nkosi Mbus’ ophilisayo)
lyrics:
Nkosi Mbus’ ophilisayo Ovum’ ukub’ ingane Isingathwe nguy’ uNina Iphakanyiswe nguwe Usiphathise zona nje Uyosibuza ngazo.

Kusukela ngalomuhla UMariya oNgcwele Ab’uNina woMsindisi Saqheliswa ngodumo Olungazange lwaziwe Komame emandulo.

Siyadinga masiphiwe Usizo lwakho Nkosi Sandisel’ amandla akho Size sithwal’ udumo Masivume ukuthwala Sikhuthazele njalo.

Masiphiw’ izinhliziyo

Ezihlambulukile Ukuze bafunde kithi Abantwan’ ukulunga Balandele bangaduki Endleleni eqotho.

Mazikhangwe yizo nazo Insizwa nezintombi Vuz’ izinhliziyo zethu Zizinikela kuwe
Siphe ithemba nokholo Sibahole ngothando.

Masiphaphamele njalo Lomsebenzi omkhulu Kuthi um’ usuphelile Sekwethulw’ imithwalo Bab’ imiqhele yodumo
Lababantwana bethu.	Amen.

title: (Mame owambeletha)
lyrics:
Mame owambeletha OnguNkulunkulu Uyakuthanda yena Nathi sikuthanda.

Singadumisa yena Simbonge ngani na? Sibonge lezo zipho Owaphiwa zona.

Sasiboshiwe thina Sasilahlekile
Weza wamzala wena OnguMhlengi wethu.

Waba umunt’ uqobo Wathabath’ inyama Wasihluphekel’ isintu Wasifela sonke.

Siyakibonga Mame Ngentobeko yakho

Wathi makube kimi Ngokuthanda kwakho. Wen’ onenhlahl’ enkulu Nans’ injabuliso Ukubeleth’ ongaka
Ab’ umntwana wakho.


Nansi injabuliso Enkulu kunale Uzinikela kuye Ub’ owakho njalo.

Wena owathandwa guye Uthandwa nayithi
Sithi siyababaza Ngentobeko yakhe.

Mawudunyiswe njalo Mtwana kaMariya Ukanye nay’ uYise
NoMoya oNngcwele.	Amen.

title: (Bayethe Maria)
lyrics:
Bayethe Maria Odunyisw’ abantu Wena owazala Ongunkulunkulu.

Kwathi kuzwakele Ukubingelela KukaGabriela Wesab’ usathane.

Kade siboshiwe Singenakulunga Nokho siyasizwa Ngokunxusa kwakho.

Mame onomusa Mawusinxusele Kuy’ owakukhetha Ube ngomzalayo.

Ukubani Virgo
Wen’ ogcwel’ umusa Indodana yakho Isihawukele.

Sisahamba lapha Wasisiza njalo Size sithokoze Siyibon’ iNkosi.

Siyabong’ uYise Nendodana yakhe Naye OnguMoya
Olingene nabo.	Amen

title: (Namhla siyahlabelela)
lyrics:
Namhla siyahlabelela Ngay’ uNina ongcwele Owazala uMsindisi UNkulunkulu uqobo Owayetha ekhulelwe Waya kumzala wakhe.

Kwathi esambingelela Wancom’ uLizabetha Wathi unenhlanhla wena Kuso isifazane
Ubusiswa ngomntanakho Yen’ oyiNkosi yami.

Esezwile izwi lakhe Wabonga uMaria Emdumis’ uNkulunkulu Encoma esho ethi Izizukulwane zonke
Z’ othi ngibusisiwe


Siyabonga wena Nkosi

Mthombo wezinto zonke Nawe Jes’ osihlengile Wathath’ isintu sethu Nawe Moya Oyingcwele Ohlala kithi njalo.	Amen.

title: (Abasendulo bakubingelela)
lyrics:
Abasendulo bakubingelela Bahol’ umoya ovela kuYise Amazwi abo asefezekile Haleluya

Wen’ ongunina woMsindisi wethu Esifubeni sakho uyamgona Usumlethile kulon’ iThempeli Haleluya

Bhek’ uSimeon eseThempelini Empethe Ujesu ngezandla zakhe Ejabulela uMsindisi wakhe Haleluya

Siyamdumisa uNkulunkulu

Benendodana kanye nay’ uMoya Siyabonga sikanye nabaNgcwele Haleluya. Amen

title: (Jesu mqhele mamaVirgo)
lyrics:
Jesu mqhele mamaVirgo Sibheke nxa sikhuleka Owazalwa uMariya Intombi ebusisiwe
.
Usuhlezi ezulwini Uyakhonzwa yizintombi Ezigqoke okumhlophe Zibon’ ubukhosi bakho.

Namhla siyakudumisa Ngentom’ ebusisiweyo Yalibandla elingcwele
Limi njalo phambi kwakho.


Sicela Nkosi’ enomusa Uze usihlambule Zisuswe izono

Size Sihlangane naye.


Kadunyisw’ uNkulunkulu Ngawo onke amaVirgo Onguyise neNdodana BenoMoya oyiNgcwele. Amen.

title: Abangcwele bahlobe
lyrics:
Abangcwele bahlobe Ngezingub’ ezimhlophe Namagatsha esundu Nemiqhel’ engabuni.

Bawaletha KuKristu Amagatsha bahuba Beth’ onk’ amandla ethu Siwathola kuwena.

Sifunda ngab’ ukuthi Unqotshiw’ usathane Sibona ngezingubo Zenkonzo yobupristi.

Bayamkhonza begqoke Izingub; ezimhlophe Ezahlanzwa ngeGazi Elophiselwa bona.

Siqonda futh’ ukuthi Babusa ngemiqhele Bazithoba kuyena
Beth’ imbuso ngowakhe.


Imiqhele yombuso Bayethula kuKristu Bemkhothamela bethi Nguwe wedwa Nkosi.

Nabo babenjengathi Nathi masibusiswe Sikhanyiswe sinqobe Sibuse nabo njalo. Amen.

title: (Wonke’ umhlab’ ukhanyiswe)
lyrics:
Wonke’ umhlab’ ukhanyiswe

Zikhulu zabaNgcwele EseziseNkosini Ziydumisa njalo.

Nxa zisemhlabeni Zaziqhub’ ivangeli Zitshel’ abant’ ukuthi Sewafika uKristu.

Zazingalwi ngamkhonto Zingecike muntu Zazibashumayeza Bakholwe abaningi.

Lab’ ababeboshiwe Bakhonze usathane Baphendukil manje Sebekhonza uKristu.

Liyazazis’ ibandla Lezozikhulu zalo Mabazazise bonke Nemisebenzi yazo.

Sibong’ uNkulunkulu Yen’ owasibizayo Wasikhip’ emnyameni
Sangen’ ekukhanyeni.	Amen.



285(Nkosi yabangcwele bonke)


Nkosi yabangcwele bonke Abangenakubalwa Abaning’ abaziwayo Bekuzungeza wena Bazimbaq’ ezafiphazwa Inkungu zalomhlaba Bayabusa eZulwini Baziwa namabizo.

Ohlwini labaphostoli Ulotshiwe’ okaTholmay Yen’ esidumisa ngaye Wena yonk’ iminyaka Wasebenza ehlupheka Uban’ ongakulanda Ukuhamba kwakh’ okuhle

KuseNkosini yakhe.


Nguye ongenankohliso Wabizwa uFiliphu Wayengacabangi neze Ukhuth’ eNazaretha Kungavela umSindisi Esembona wadela Laph’ eskhuluma naye Kwaphel’ ukungabaza.

Konk’ okwakhe kulotshiwe ‘Ncwadini yokuphila
Lonk’ ukholo nenhlupheko Nokukhandleka kwakhe Kulotshiwe amagugu Nkosi sibale nathi
Nxa ubuth’ amatsh’ amahle Angumqhel’ ongabantu.	Amen.

title: (Nant’ usuku lwakhe Nkosi)
lyrics:
Nant’ usuku lwakhe Nkosi

Owashiya ophansi konke Ubuhwebi nezimali
Laph’ ebizwa nguwe Jesu.


Yabany’ inhliziyo yakhe Ukub’ angazilazili
Nxa uJesu embiz’ ethi Shiya konk’ ingilandele.

Phakathi kwemnako yezwe Umcebo nezindumazo Simemeze Nkosi uthi
Shiy’ umhlaba nezinton zawo.


Masiphakanyiswe Nkosi Uma sesikulandela
Sashiy’ umcebo womhlaba Usibiz’ ekugcineni.

Woza kim’ ushiy’ umhlaba Indabenhle yensindiso Imemeza ithi kithi
Woza kim’ ushiy’ umhlaba.	Amen.

title: (Sibong’ umsebenzi wakhe)
lyrics:
Sibong’ umsebenzi wakhe Uluka ongcwele Owayengowamakhambi Wemukel’ uJesu.

Lapho uJesu embisa Wezwa wasabela
Wayeka konk’ okomhlaba Walandela yena.

Wahamba nabaPhostoli Wabaqhaphelisa Wayeselob’ iVangeli Elichaz’ uJesu.

Udumo lwakhe lukhona Encwadini yakhe
Esiza ibandla lonke Eliyibangay.

Moya kaKristu khanyisa Inhliziyo zethu

Zikholwe yilendlela
Elotshwa nguLuka.	Amen.

title: (a) (Baphostoli abangcwele)
lyrics:
Baphostoli abangcwele Wena juda noSimoni Siyanikhumbula Nidunyiswa ngabaningi Emazweni asezansi Ngomsebenzi wenu.

Nadiliza izintaba Nadiliza izinqaba Zaba ngamathafa Nagawula amahlathi Naqhekeza amadwala Kwavel’ izindlela.

Amasango obumyama Akhumuka awa phansi Ohambi kweVangeli Nisehlane nadangala Ngokulamba nangokoma

Ngexa yoMsindisi.


Kepha nalwa ngesibindi Naze nafa emhlabeni Nafa ningesabi
Ngob’ ukufa kulisango Lokungena ezulwini KuMsindisi wenu. Amen.

title: (b) (Baphostoli Abangcwele)
lyrics:
Baphostoli Abangcwele Nina juda noSimon Niyakhunjulw’ emhlabeni Nihlonishwa abaningi.

Emazweni asezansi Nasebenza nazikhandla Nadiliza izintaba Zaphenduka amathafa.

Nadiliza izinqaba Nathumb’ ababephingiwe

Nagawula amahlathi Naqhekeza amadwala.

Amasango obumnyama Akhumuk’ awela phansi Nxa nigadla ngeVangeli Waqhaqhazel’ usathane.

Ehlane nadangaliswa Nawukoma, nayindlala Nabethana nokuningi Enakunqoba ngoJesu.

Kepha nalwa ngesibindi Emhlabeni naze nafa Ukufa nakwenz’ isango
Lokungen’ ekuphileni. Amen.

title: (Wen’ obona konke)
lyrics:
Wen’ obona konke Obon’ inhliziyo Wakhetha uMathiyase Abe uMphostoli.

Wayekhona naye Kub’ abaphostoli
Ebon’ ukwenyuka Kwakho Uya eZulwini.

Kulenkonz’ eNgcwele UJuda washiya Ngobuthakathaka bakhe Walushiy’ ubizo.

Ngokukhethwa Kwakhe Yen’ uMathayase Wathabatha lolubizo Loku phath’ iBandla.

Mayibongw’ inkosi Ehlal’ ibabiza Abantu ebathandayo
Bayisebenzele.	Amen.

title: (a) (UJesu uyasibiza)
lyrics:
UJesu uyasibiza

Ophithini lomhlaba Umemeza njalo, uthi WemKristu, ngilandele.

UAndriy’ oNgcwele weza EkwelaseGalile Wasefulathel’ ikhaya Nokunye esabela.

Lapho sikhonza okwezwe UJes’ uyasibiza
Ethi, wemKristu, ngithande Kakhulu kunalokhu.

Noma izimo zinjani Noma ngabe senzani Yena selokhun ebiza Ethi, ngithande wena.

UJesu uyasibiza Msindisi, sense sizwe Sikunike inhliziyo
Sikukhonze ngothando.	Amen.

title: (b) (Siyabizw’ uJesu Kristu)
lyrics:
Siyabizw’ uJesu Kristu Zonk’ izinsuku zethu Lizwakele izwi lithi Wozani nilandele
Nibe abafundi bami Nib’ izithandwa zami.

Lalimbiza uAndriya Esebenz’ emkhunjini Walalela wakuluhla Konk’ okusemhlabeni Walandel’ inkosi yakhe Kwaze kwasekufeni.

Siyabizw’ uJesu Kristu Sisuke kokomhlaba Sibizelwe ukumkhonza Ngaw’ onk’ amandla ethu Sihambis’ okwabaNgcwele Sibabalwe ngothando.

Ekuhluphekeni kwethu Ngenkathi yenjabulo Lizwakele izwi lakhe Bandla silamukele Libe isibani sethu Likhanyise indlela.

Kadunyisw’ iNkulunkulu UYise neNdodana
Naye uMoya oNgcwele OButhath’ eBunyeni Mababongwe bonk’ abantu USomandla uyinNkosi. Amen.

title: (Siyamkhumbula namhlanje oNgcwele)
lyrics:
Siyamkhumbula namhlanje oNgcwele Owayemkhulu kubo abafundi Wakhethwa ab’ induna yabo bonke
Nkosi yakhe.


Uye onazo izihluthulelo Zombuso lowo obuswa uJesu

ABandla elamiswa phezu kwawo Amazwi akhe.

.Esikhathini sokulingwa kwakhe Wahluleka waphik’ iNkosi yakhe Wathuka wathi angimazi lowo
Enimushoyo.


Kwathi masinnya eseshilo lokhu Wazisol’ ekhala izinyembezi
Waza wathethelelwa ngothandayo Izoni zonke.

Ebuyiselw’ esikhundleni sakhe Wayiqinis’ abazalwane bakhe Emisibindi waza walufela
Ukholo lwakhe.


Masimdumise siyibong’ iNkosi Yona ethethelel’ izono zethu Sibuyiselwe othandweni lwayo
Olungapheli. Amen.

title: (Nkosi Kristu mhlengi wethu)
lyrics:
Nkosi Kristu mhlengi wethu Sibong’ igama lakho Owambiza uThomase
Ab’ umphostoli wakho Ngomusa wamqinisa Esangabaza ngawe.

Nkosi sesizwile izwi Owalishoyo kuwe Lithi sebebusisiwe Abakholwayo kuwe Bengakuboni wena Nazizimangaliso.

Nkosi siyakholwa kuwe Ukuth’ uNguMsindisi Owanqoba wonk’ umhlaba Wasinik’ ikuphila Wasibusisa abakho Wabasindisa futhi.

Nkosi ukukholwa kwethu Kupheleliswa nguwe

Size Sikukhonze kahle Siselaph’ emhlabeni Sikubon’ eZulwini Sikanye nabaNgcwele.

Kadunyis’ uNkulunkulu UYise NeNdodana
Nay’ uMoya oYiNgcwele BuThathu eBunyeni Bonk’ abantu bambonge
USomandla iNkosi.	Amen.



293(Yena oyingqalabutho)


Yena oyingqalabutho Yabafela uJesu
Yen’ owayegcwel’ uMoya Uliqhawe leNkosi Sincoma ukufa kwakhe Sinejabulo ngaye.

Wazehlul’ izitha zakhe Ngokuzikhulekela

Khona zimbulala kabi Empompoloza ethi Ungabeki iNkosi Jesu Les’ isono kubona.

Njengalokh’esengumqobi Unomqhel’ okhanyayo Okulotshwe kuw’ igama LoyiNkosi yomhlaba Yena osihlanganisa
Nabo bonk’ abangcwele.


Indumiso nezibongo Makulethwe njalo-nje Kuy’ ongumvikeli wethu Ezingozini zonke Osigcin’ asiqinise
Lapha naseZulwini.	Amen.

title: (Namhla sikhumbula umPhostoli)
lyrics:
Namhla sikhumbula umPhostoli WeNkosi yeth’ omhle uJohane
