Wathandwa kakhulu nguy’ uKtistu Wayeduze kwakh’ ekufeni.

Waloba phansi leloqiniso Akholwa yilo ngoJes’ iNkosi Kuze nabanye bakholwe ylo.

Abanye bamdumisa ngokufa Ngezinhlupheko nangobuhlungu NjengoJohan owafakaza Ngokumphilela nokudumisa.

Waphendulwa uthando lweNkosi Uthando lwakhe lwaze lwajula Nasebudalen’ uthando lwema Wayengumngan’ impela kaJesu. Amen.

title: (Sihuba ngokunqotshwa)
lyrics:
Sihuba ngokunqotshwa Komchithi weBandla Oway’ eDamaseku Ngenzondo enkulu

Wagxumis’ okwempisi Esukel’ impango Kantike uMalusi Uzombamba namhla.

Lunyaz’ olusimanga Olwamwisa phansi Kukhany’ okwamxhophayo Osishisekeli
Lizwi elamsolayo Ngaphakathi kwakhe Luthand’ olwambambayo Lwamenz’ isigqila.

Wena ohle konke Nhlakaniph’ eNgcwele Iyiph’ impangw’ engcono Kuneyakho Mnqobi Muphi umakh’ ongcono Owake wamthola Kunomchithi weBandla Owamguqulayo.

Fundis’ iBandla lakho

Ukwencika kuwe Lapho lisadukuza Kulobumnyama Ngobabalo uthibe Ulaka lwabantu Uthath’ izitha zakho
Uzenz’ izingcwele. Amen.s

title: (Uyabongwa njalo, Nkosi)
lyrics:
Uyabongwa njalo, Nkosi Ngokubaqinisa Nokubabekezelela Abanobugwala.

Lona okhunjulwa namhla Wabubalekela
Ubunzima bomsebenzi Wendabehle yakho.

Kawaze wamlahla nokho Wamqung’ isibindi Ngokumnik’ amandl’ amasha Waqala kabusha.

Manje, ngenxa yomsa wakho Usekwabangcwele
Abaloba kanye naye Indabenhle yakho.

Jesu, Ngesihawu sakho

Kwabangabazayo Siphe ukubambelela
Siqinise kuwe.	Amen.



297(Kukhon’ indlela inye zwi)


Kukhon’ indlela inye zwi Eya eZulwini
Lapho kukhanyisa khona UYis’ okhanyayo.

Kikhon’ iqiniso linye LikaNkulunkulu Eleza noJesu Kristu Livel’ eZulwini.

Kuny’ ukuphil’ okukhona Sibizelwe kukho
Jesu walophis’ iGazi Size sibenakho.

Wayengalaz’ uFiliphu Leli iqiniso

UKristu wasembulela Sasindiswa ngalo.

Ukholo lusemazwini Akhe UJakobe
Athi okhuthazelayo Owakhe umbuso.

Jesu ndlela nokuphila Yiba yikho kithi Sihambise ngeqiniso Elinguwe wedwa.	Amen.

title: (Sizenyusela kuwe)
lyrics:
Sizenyusela kuwe Inhlliziyo zethu
O! Nkosi yabangcwele Sikubonga ngazo.

Jesu lwehla kuye Ababalo lwakho Obizwa ngeNdodana

Yayo induduzo.


Ngamazwi akh’ amnandi Nezenzo ezinhle Kwabonakal’ uthando Olwehl’ eZulwini.

Sicela Nkosi Jesu Uba wehlisele
UMoya wakh’ oNgcwele Kithina abakho.

Ukuba kukho konke Sifuz’ uBhanabha Ngokukhuthaz’ abanye Ngamazw’ okuphila.

Kabongw’ uJesu Owasifelayo Obusa enoYise
NoMoya oNgcwele.	Amen.

title: (Usezelw’ umanduleli)
lyrics:
Usezelw’ umanduleli Odumileyo wokusa Bayohlala bedumisa Bebong’ abakholekayo.

UGabriyela owathi NguJohan’ igama lakhe Wakukhomba nazokwenza Okuningi nokukhulu.

UJohan’ Inhlabamkhosi Wafakazel’ ukukhanya Okwenza ngoJesu Kristu Ujesu wakwananela.

Kwabezelwa ngokwenyama Kakho onkhulu kunaye Odume ngemisebenzi Kunabaphrofethi bonke.

Makadunyiswe uYise Nawe Ndodan’ oPhakade
Okhonzwa noMoy’ oNgcwele Omiyo njalo phakade.	Amen.

title: (Namhla Sikhumbul’ induna)
lyrics:
Namuhla sikhumbula induna yabaPhostoli beNkosi
Yamiswa yabayinhloko YiNkosi yethu uqobo.

Wanikw’ izihluthulelo Zombuso weNkosi yethu Olibandla labo bonke AbaseNkosini uJesu.

Wayiphika iNkosi yethu Walandula wageqeza Wathi yena akayazi Ngenkathi ebuzwa ngayo.

Yathi ukub’imhlabe ngeso Ngomzuzwana wahlabeka Wakhala izinyembezi Zempenduko waxolelwa.

Lapha esethethelelwe

Waqinis’abazalwane Walulw’ukholo lwethu Kwazze kwabasekufeni.

Mayibongw’iNkosi yethu Ethethelela abantu Namanje nxa bephenduka Iyodunyiswa nanini. Amen.



               301 (Sibonga Igama Lakho) Sibonga igama lakho
Nkosi yabangwele Osibizel’othandweni Lokufela wena.

Ngaye owashiya uyis’ uyise Akaz’anqikaza
Lapha ebizwa yiZwi lakho Eledlul’ulwandle.

Wamkhetha wabangomunye Wabethenjwa bakho Owawunab’ensimini

Nasekukhanyeni.


Wasiphuz’isitsha sakho Ngokuba ngumfeli Wathol’ukubhabhadiswa Okufuz’okwakho.

Nkosi, Jesu siyacela Siph’amandla akho Okuphuz’isitsha sakho Sime nawe njalo.

Kadunyisw’uNkulunkulu Omthathu emunye Onguyise neNdodana NoMoya oNgcwele. Amen.

title: (Bangobani lab’abahle)
lyrics:
Bangobani lab’abahle Abaphambi kwenkosi Abathwele imiqhele Bayiliphi-ke bona Bacul’uAleluya

Bebong’uNkulunkulu.


Laba ngabalwayo lapha Belwela uMsindisi Bashikeka baze bafa Bengalandel’izoni Bayibamba kwanjeya Bayichitha ngeMvana.

Bayakhazimulabonke Sebefuze iNkosi Lab’abangubo zimhlophe Ezihlala zikhanya Ezingasagugiyo Ngobani, bavelaphi?

Lapha sebephela amandla Ngenxa yobulukhuni Bakhuleka eNkosini Ababeyiphilela
Manje sebenqobile Abasahlushwa lutho.

Babemi phambi kweNkosi

Beyikhonz’ emhlabeni Ngemizimba nemimoya Belindel’ukuthunywa Sebesebungcweleni Kwelombus’ophakade. Amen.

title: (Nxa ekhona ongabala)
lyrics:
Nxa ekhona ongabala Ibandla labangcwele Angiyizwa injabulo Yakho ukuphumula Abanye sebedlulile Sebephumule kuwe.

Sebekhululiwe manje Enhluphekweni yonke Kade belwa ngokwethemba Belapha emhlabeni Bayabona isu lonke Ngokusindiswa kwabo.

Thina esisemhlabeni Siyabona ingxenye

EZulwini siyokwazi Njengokupheleleyo Sibhekene njalo naye Unkulunkulu wethu.

Ubuthathu bezinqobo Sobubona obala Buqhamuka nabubunye Obunguy’uSomandla Siyobonga sithokoze kuNkulunkulu wethu.

Ngalokho-ke wena muntu Qinisel’ume njalo Lokh’ungathola umvuzo Oyovela Phezulu Ubenay’uNkulunkulu Ubon’ubuso bakhe. Amen.

304(a) (IGama likaJesu lidunyiswa)


IGama likaJesu lidunyiswa Ilabo abasePharadisi Ababemvuma laph’ emhlabeni

Haleluya Haleluya


Nxa impi ishisa ingasapheli Amandla siwathola kuwena Izinhliziyo ziqiniswa nguwe Haleluya Haleluya

Wayengamandla abo netshe labo Umkhonto wab’ isihlangu sabo Ebumnyamen’ ukukhanya kwabo Haleluya Haleluya

Sesisondele isikhathi leso Siyophumula thina mabutho Sinabo kwelasepharadisi Haleluya Haleluya

Sengathi amabutho anamuhla Angalwis’ okwabaNgcwele bakho Aze athwal’ imiqhele nawo Haleluya Haleluya

Usuku lololuhle luyofika Bayakuvuka bonk’abangcwele

Ifik’ iNkosi uqobo lwayo Haleluya Haleluya.

Sinobudlelwano nabaphezulu Thin’ esisatotob’ emhlabeni Bakhanya bona ePharadisi Haleluya Haleluya

Ibandla lonke liyakubuthana Livela ngalapha nangalapha Livela phesheya nanganeno Haleluya Haleluya

Liyakubonga wena Nkulunkulu Wen’ onguYise noyiNdodana NoMoya oNgcwele naphakade Haleluya Haleluya. Amen.

304(b) (Bonke abasekuphumuleni)


Bonke abasekuphumuleni Bahubel’ igama likaJesu Ababemvuma laph’ emhlabeni Haleluya Haleluya

Nxa impi ishisa ingapheli Ziyaqinisek’ izinhliziyo
Nxa zizwa ihubo lokunqoba Haleluya Haleluya

Wayenganamandl’ abo netshe labo Umkhonto wab’ isihlangu sabo Ebumnyamen’ ukukhanya kwabo Haleluya Haleluya

 Sesiyasondela isikhathi Ayophumula ngasw’ amabutho Ekuthuleni kwePharadisi Haleluya Haleluya

Sengath’ amabutho anamuhla Angalwis’ okwabaNgcwele bakho Aze athwal’ imiqhele nawo Haleluya Haleluya

Besekufika usuk’ oluhle Lokufika kweNkosi yodumo Nokuvuka kwabaNgcwele bonke

Haleluya Haleluya


Siwubudlelwano baphezulu Kanye nabasenkazimulweni Simunye nabo kuwe phezulu Haleluya Haleluya

Libonga njalo uNkulunkulu Yena onguYise neNdodana NoMoya oNgwele naPhakade Haleluya Haleluya

Bayovela kude naseduze Bangene ngamasangw’ egolide Behubela ongoMthathweMunye Haleluya Haleluya. Amen.



              305 (Yizwa amazwi angcwele) Yizwa amazwi angcwele
Ehubel’ iNkos’ ethi Alleluya, Alleluya Mawudunyiswe Nkosi Ngawe viyw’ elingebalwe

Kuhle kwezinkanyezi Ezinkazimulewni Lembethe okumhlophe.

Okhokho nabaPhrofethi Abendulel’ uJesu Nabaphostoli beNkosi Kanye nabavangeli Nabangcwele nabafeli Nabavuma ukholo Isilisa nesimame Bahuba bendawonye.

Baphuma ezinsizini Bageza izingubo Egazini likaJesu Behlula izilingo
Ukubhuqwa nokuboshwa Nokusahwa ngenkemba Ngamandla kaKrist’ iNkosi Bakunqoba nokufa.

Njengawe Msindisi wabo Ongumholi neNkosi

Banqoba ngesiphambano Abasilandelayo Bahlupheka ngenjabulo Unabo noma befa
Nxa befa bathol’ impilo Emiyo enodomo.

Sebebusa ezulwini Ekukhanyen’ okuhle Sebephuz’izibusiso Njengamanzi omfula Bezw’ uthando nokuthula Bakhanyelw’ iqiniso Enkazimulweni yakhe OnguMthathu eMunye.

Nkulunkul’ ongukukhanya Wena owenz’ umuntu Abemzimba munye kuwe Abengcwele phakade Sebezw’ ubungcwele bakho Khona sokudumisa
Yise, Ndodana, noMoya Phakade naphakade. Amen!

title: (Isikhundla esingcwele)
lyrics:
Isikhundla esingcwele Asiviki isono Nomíngaphandle lilihle Siyangena isitha.

Edlanzini elincane Elihloniphekayo Kwavela ongumkhapheli Oqalekisiweyo.

Kepha inhloso yeNkosi Ingechithwe isono Kwasekuvel’ufakazi Omusha weqiniso.

Owonayo uyokufa Wena awuguquki Kuzwakal’izwi lomusa Kuchume iqiniso.

Mihl’imikhondo yeNkosi Umhlaba usekhona IBandla liyomelana
Nazo zonke izitha. Amen.

title: (Nin’eningamubutho)
lyrics:
Nin’eningamubutho Yilwanini ngokholo Uyesabeka umvuzo Wabalwela iNkosi.

Umqhel’ongabuniyo Nentokozo nodumo Nokukhany’okumiyo Ngokwabanqoba lalpha.

Leliyakhay’elihle Lingelabanqobayo abaNgwele beNkosi bohlala kulo njalo.

Okulaph’akulutho Kuyadlula kuphele

Kuhl’okuseZulwini Kukhon’uNkulunkulu.

Usamkelis’okuhle Wena owasifela Uvus’izinhliziyo
Sibing’iGama lakho. Amen.

title: (Abantu benkosi)
lyrics:
Abantu benkosi Bayophakanyiswa Masingasoli nanini Uma sihlupheka.

Kuph’ukuhlupheka Okungasehlula abaFeli bebulawa ngenxa yoMsindisi.

Basekhaya manje ENkosini yabo Abamthandayo belapha Usebamukele.

Nathi singasoli
Nxa siphathwa kabi UBaba osiphetheyo Uyosipha okuhle.

Siyofika kuye Ngokukhuthazela Ezinhluphekweni zonke Ezisehlelayo.

Laphaya phezulu Siyakubusiswa Sihlale nezingelosi Kanye nabaNgcwele.

Mayibongw’iNkosi Lapha, naphezulu UNkulunkul’onamandla Oyedw’ophakade. Amen.

title: (Izinsuku zabaNgcwele)
lyrics:
Izinsuku zabaNgcwele

Abafelukholo Ziyalandelana njalo Zisijabulisa.

Benza ngokumamngalisa Bekhon’emhlabeni Siyabonga sizincome Lezozenzo zabo.

Bab’enokukholwa kahle Kuye uMsindisi
Bemi isibindi njalo Noma bebulawa.

Babechith’igazi labo Bayifel’iNkosi Babehlishwa badatshulwe Bengabadeliwe.

Babaliwa ngabomhlaba Bezingelwa yibo
Kodwa nokho bemukelwa nguMsindisi wabo.

Ngokudela okwomhlaba Nesibindi sabo Sebeng’ababusiwe Benenhlanhl’enkulu Nathi masibalandele Sibafuze bonke.

Size sihlangane nabo Sidlul’emhlabeni
Sibe abambonga njalo Yena onguBaba. Amen.

              310 (Wena, Kristu okhanyayo) Wena, Kristu okhanyayo
Osiphe ukulunga Simi nengelosi zonke Sifole kanye nazo Sibonga iGama lakho Sihuba ngenjabulo.

Namhla siyalikhumbula Leloviyo lezulu Elihlelekile kahle Lanomsebenzi walo

Ikakhulu siyambomga Lon’ ongumholi walo.

Yen’ owalwa noSathane Elwela wena, Nkosi Wamehlula, wamkhiphela Ngaphandl’ ebumnyameni
Akasahlangani nawe Useyisitha sakho.


Thina sivikelwa nguye Nezingelosi zakhe Zisifuna zehluleke Zonke izitha zethu Sokulwela emhlabeni
Njengokubuthwa kwethu.



Kadunyisw’ uNkulunkulu UYise neNdodana
Nay’ uMoya oyiNgcwele Ongubuthath’ eMunye Mabambonge bonk’ abantu Usomandla iNkosi. Amen.

title: (Ziyez ’ingelosi)
lyrics:
Ziyez ’ingelosi Zehla ezulwini
Ziza kithi zithunyelwe Ukuzosisiza.

Zithunywa yiNkosi Ukuzosilonda Zibaduduze abantu Zibaph’isibindi.

Jesu owehlayo Wenziwa umuntu Wahlupheka waze wafa Ngenxa yrthu sonke.

Nkosi zakusiza Ingelosi zakho EGetseman’ensimini Uhlushelw’izoni.

Siyacela kuwe

Ukub’uthumele Ingelosi
Zakho kithi
Nxa sihluphekile.


Nxa sesizakufa Yala zisisize
Uze ubekhona nawe Wen’onguSomandla.

Sidumisa wena Nkulunkulu munye Uyise beneNdodana
noMoya ONgcwele. Amen.

title: (Ziyeza kith’izithunywa)
lyrics:
Ziyeza kith’izithunywa Ziphuma kuNkulunkulu Zivel’ezulwini lakhe Zinothando nokukhanya.

Zizokusilinda njalo Zisivikel’engozini

Zisiduduz’osizini Zisiqunge isibindi.

Nxa abantu bezakufa Ziyasondel’ingelosi Zinyenyeza zithi kubo Hambani niyophumula.

Jesu wasihluphekela Uselapha emhlabeni Zakukhonz’izingelosi Wavuma nxa zikusiza.

Siphe isineke sakho Sikukhonze sikuthande Kuthi ekufeni kwethu Siphelezelwe yizona.

Manje sihlangane nazo Sibong’iGam’eliNgcwele likaYise neNdodana
Naye uMoya oNgcwele. Amen.

title: (Wazalelw’eBethlehema)
lyrics:
Wazalelw’eBethlehema UKristu iNkosi Sidumisa njengeNkosi Yabantwana namhla.

Leloviyo Labantweana Elabulawayo
NguHerodi ngesikhwele Siyalikhumbuli.

Bafel’umfeli wesintu Ngentando kaYise Banobuhle baphezulu Asebebuphiwe.

Nibusisiwe bantwana baseBethlehema imiqhel’eniyithwele ngeyawofakazi.

Nom’iNkosi ningayazi Nisekulelizwe

Nijabula kuyo manje Niyibina njalo.

Jesu abafela wena Abangenacal
Bahole bonk’abantwana Babenawe njalo. Amen.

title: (Wozani nijabule)
lyrics:
Wozani nijabule Nithi Haleluya Manimdumis’uKristu Oyinkosi yenu Hubani kanyekanye Bafana nicule Hubani nani nonke Mantombazanyana.

Kabongwe ngabantwana onguMhlengi wabo ngabemdumis’uJesu oyiNkosi yabo unguMsindisi wabo

abaphila ngaye umlondolozi wabo abasemhlabeni.

Bafana bakaJesu Manimsebenzele Owasiz’uJosefa Owayengumbazi Nani mantombazane Anibomlingisa Owazalwa yiNtombi Ehlanzekileyo.

Emzini ophezulu Bazoy’abantwana Badlale ngentokozo Emagceken’awo
O! Kristu balungise Abantwana bakho Baze bangene ngawe Kuleliyakhaya. Amen.

title: (Ningakwenz’okubi)
lyrics:
Ningakwenz’okubi Ningakhulumi NingabakaJesu INkosi yenu.

Uthambil’uJesu Uthembeke njalo Nabantwana bakhe Ngabe bemfuza.

Ningayengwa impi Eng’umoya omubi Unilinga njalo Enikhohlisa.

Maningamlaleli Noma kulikhuni Kwaleni okubi Nenze okuhle.

Nina nethembisa Niseyizingane Ukumali impela Nimphike njalo.

NingabakaKristu Manifund’ukulwa Nobub óbukini Nenze okuhle.

ningabakaJesu ulungile njalo nabantwana bakhe mababengcwele. Amen.

title: (Nkulunkulu baba wethu)
lyrics:
Nkulunkulu baba wethu Onamandla onke
Thina bancane sibheke Sikhuleke kuwe.

Makuthandek’ukumisa Umbus’emhlabeni Abantu bonke bangene Kuwo bawuphile.

Siphe ukukwazi Wena

Sikubinge njalo Makwenziw’intando yakho Lapha emhlabeni.

Bonakalis’ezizweni Insindiso yakho Zithokoze zazi Wena Owazifelayo. Amen.

title: (Sisize Jesu Nkosi Nkulunkulu)
lyrics:
Sisize Jesu Nkosi Nkulunkulu Wen’onamandla wen oseZulwini Thina bancane nje sibheke kuwe Siyakhuleka.

Makuthandeke kuwe ukudumisa Umbuso wakho manje emhlabeni Abantu bonke mabangene kuwo Bakulalele.

Banakalisa ezizweni zonke Ukusindisa ezizweni zonke Ukusindisa kwakho abantwini

Bazi ukuthi wena wabafela Wabasindisa.

Thin’esilapha nabo labobantu Masihlangangane nazo sikubonge Sikudumis’owahlatshelwa thina Wasikhulula.

Kukhulu lokhu esikucelayo
Sam kele Nkosi nama sibancane Ungadeleli izwi lezingane Ezicelayo.

Siphe ukwazi wena sikuthande Sibonge wena makwenziwe njalo Lokh’okuthandwa nguwe emhlabeni naseZulwini.

Ziyakudumisa wen’izingelosi Owazithoba wehla eZulwini Wahlala nabo abakuzondayo Bakubethela.

Sheshe ubuse ezinhliziyweni

Zabantu bonke bakuthande Nkosi Ngokub’umbuso ungowakho njalo Kube phakade. Amen.

title: (Baba weth’ophezulu)
lyrics:
Baba weth’ophezulu Vumela abntwana Bezw’ukub’useduze Siyacela sizwe.

Bab’isithanda sonke Size kuw’usibiza Sikukhothamele kuwe Siyacele sizwe.

Jes’umalusi wethu Biz’abantwana bakho

Bathande bahloniphe Siyacela sizwe.

Wen’osithembisayo Wen’osibisisayo

Laba balethwa kuwe Siyacela sizwe.

Thina asinamandla Sithemb’umusa wakho Sivumele sicele Siyacela sizwe.

Nkosi Moya oNgcwele Woz’usikhanyisele Ungashiy’abantwana Siyacela sizwe.

Sihlale njalo njalo Siphansi kwamaphiko Uz’usilethe kuwe Siyacela sizwe. Amen.

title: (Kuhl’ukuba lapha Nkosi)
lyrics:
Kuhl’ukuba lapha Nkosi Ngakulenkazimulo Nakh’usuweqa ilanga Ngakh’ukukhanya kwakho.

Kuhl’ukuba lapha Nkosi Sibubuke ubuhle oboMosi No Elija lesisithunywa Nkosi.

Unamandl’okugcwalisa Kanti ungumthembisi Mawubongw’enkazim’lweni Ulethe insindiso.

Thina siselapha, Nkosi Usenze sikubone Enkazimulweni yakho Sibe kuyona njalo.

Kuhl’ukuba lapha, Nkosi Kodwa-ke singehlale Ngoba uthi asehlike
Siye naw’etafuleni. Amen.

title: (Sithand’indlu, Nkosi)
lyrics:
Sithand’indlu, Nkosi

Enodumo lwakho Ubumnandi bayo Bukwedlula konke.

Yindlu yomkhuleko Esikuyo manje Nawe usukuyo Uzosibusisa.

Sithand’itshe lelo Okuvela kulo Ukuphila okusha NgoMoya oNgcwele.

Sithanda ne Oltha Owehlela kulo Nxa usihanbele Esodlweni sakho.

Suthand’iZwi lakho Eliphilisayo Nelisiqinisa Lisithokozise.

Sithand’ukucula Ngokwephana kwakho Sifisa ukwazi
Ihubo lezulu. Amen.

title: (Wen’obana konke)
lyrics:
Wen’obana konke Onathi la manje
Bheka lendlu yakho nathi Usithokozise.

Abathand’uJesu Bethembeka kuye Bayabhabhathizwa lapha Bathol’insindiso.

Uyabapha lapha Ukudl’okuNgcwele Okubapha lawomandla Esiwasweleyo.

Ziyashunyayezwa Laph’izoni zonke

Ngempenduko nay’imvumo Nay’intethelelo.

NgekaNkulunkulu Obabusisayo Bonke’abamkhonz’emhlabeni Abas’ezulwini.

Laph’iyehluleka Impi kaSathane Zaza laph’isingelosi Sisokusilwela.

Ngakho masimbonge Yen’uNkulunkulu Obekhona, osekhona Okhona phakade.

Mawubongwe Yise Ubongwe Ndodana Bongwa Moya Nkulunkulu Munye naphakade. Amen.

title: (Nkosi, bheka lendlu yakho)
lyrics:
Nkosi, bheka lendlu yakho Esiyakhele wena
Uvum’ ukuyemukela Ihlane ingeyakho Wena onguNkulunkulu noBaba futhi kithi
thatha lomnikelo wethu esikubonga ngawo.

Jesu Krist’ onguMsindisi neNdodana yezulu lamulel’ abantu bakho abakunxusa lapha
wena Nkosi Moya oNgcwele Nkulunkulu woqobo Kanyisel’ abantu bakho Abaku khonza lapha.

Nkulunkulu omakade Onengqob’ ezintathu Busisa abantu bakho Ababuthana lapha

Sidumisa wena nkosi uYise neNdodana wena Moya oyiNgcwele
uNkulunkulu munye. Amen

title: (Nkosi samukelise)
lyrics:
Nkosi samukelise Ngaz’ izibusiso zakho
Siyabonga umusa wakho Osphethe ngawo sonke.

Masigcine ngomsa wakho Konke esizokufunda Konk’ okuhle sikubambe Sikikhohlwe konk’ okubi.

Sibusise endleleni Songakwenzi konke okubu Uze usijabulise
Sikubonge njalo njalo


Baba siyakudumisa Ngabazali bethu bonke

Babusise besasele Sobonana ngenjabulo.

Siyakudumisa baba NeNdondana benoMoya OngoNgcwele naphakade Nkulunkulu Munye njalo. Amen.

title: (Siyabonga Nkosi)
lyrics:
Siyabonga Nkosi Ngenhliziyo zethu Lokh’ ukuphumula Ngomsa wakho.

Sibong’ umsebenzi Esiwenzileyo Nokuphumelela Ngomsa wakho.

Siyabonga Nkosi Ngemindeni yethu Ngabazali bethu Nezihlobo zethu.

Siyakudumisa Ngabaholi bethu Ubahile kahle Ngesikhathi zonke.

Sibabaza wena neNdodana yakho noMoya Ongcwele osikhanyisayo. Amen.

title: (Fez’ isethembiso sakho)
lyrics:
Fez’ isethembiso sakho Nkulunkulu weqiniso Zonk’ izizwe zalomhlaba Mazithole insindiso.

Amadol’ abasezweni Mawaguqe phambi kwakho Zize zonke izi limi Ziluncom’ udumo lwakho.

Busa busa Nkosi Jesu Koza ngawe ukwethaba

Ngeziphithiphithi zethu Umhlaba sewonakele.

Libheke izwe lakithi Wesule izono zalo Ungehlis’ ulaka lwakho Kuze kuf’ abantu balo.

Baba siphe ukukhanya Sihambise kukho njalo Ungavum’ uba sibhubhe Ngokudela iqiniso.

Nkosi siza ubusise Imfundiso zezwe lethu Uhlal’ usivuselela
Size sithol’ ukulunga. Amen.

title: (Ngubani ongasindisa)
lyrics:
Ngubani ongasindisa iAfrika elihle sesimdelele kakhul Nkulunkulu wethu

nkosi noMsindisi wezwe sisindis’ ebubini usiqondise ekhaya kufik’ imbuso wakho.

Lihlanze lonk’ iAfrika Libemsulwa kuwena Senze sibon’ okukude Macaleni ethu onke Masifane nezintaba Ezimi zingesuswe Sizwe sikhuleka sithi Busisa iAfrika.

uKristu wanele bonke abantu balelizwe uyobelapha ngebandla eliyisandla sakhe malibakhonze ngothando abaphatheke kabi lifakaze ngazwi linye
lith’ uKristu wanele.


Wanele ukukuqeda

Konk’ ukucwasana Wanele ukwakha isizwe Wanel’ ekuphileni Wanele nasekufeni Wanele bonke abasha UKristu wanele bonke
Ngisho nabagugule. Amen.

title: (Nkosi busis’ iAfrika)
lyrics:
Nkosi busis’ iAfrika
Isize uyibonise okulungile Nokufaneleyo, ize yenze Intando yakho.

Abantwana balomhlaba Ekuhluphekweni kwabo
Baphe icebo wena themba labo Yizwa imikhuleko yabo. Amen.

title: (Nkosi sikelela iAfrika)
lyrics:
Nkosi sikelela iAfika Maliphakanyiswe udumo lwayo

Yizwa imithandazo yethu Nkosi Sikelela thina Nabantwana bayo.

Woza woza woza Moya Woza Moya woza Moya Woza woza! Woza moya Oyingcwele. Nkosi sikelela Thina bantwana bayo.

title: (Nkosi baba oyingcwele)
lyrics:
Nkosi baba oyingcwele Sesilapha phambi kwakho Sizibika ngokukhala Ngoba sikujabhisile Sesiqala ukubona
Ubuvila beth’ obubi.


Ngoba ngokutholwa kwethu Sasithemba sathembisa Sathi sokukhonza njalo Ngeqiniso singaphuthi Sathi siyakwenza okuhle

Kube ukubong kwethu.


Sasho futhi siyakulwa Nacho okuyimpi kuwe Singavumi nakuvuma Uma sesiyengwa yikho
Kepha namhla sinamahloni Ngoba singenzanga khona.

Kade ubekezela Baba Ungathand’ ukuba sife Yeb’ ubekezele njalo Uthi soze siphenduke Naye yena ongummeli
Kayekangang’ ukusimela.


Ngakho sicela umusa Otholwayo ngay’ uJesu Othelwayo kubo bonke Abaphendukele kuwe Siphe, Baba siyancenga
Size sikukhonze njalo. Amen

title: (Siyathatha amageja)
lyrics:
Siyathatha amageja Siyalima amasimu Siyathemba umusa wakho Ongenaw’ umkhawulo Siphe Nkos’ siphe Nkos’ Isivuno esihle.

Nxa izulu lomisile Sithole ngomus awakho Nxa inhlavana ibhubhisa Sithole ngomsa wakhe Siphe Nkosi Siphe Nkos’ Umkhiqizo omuhle.

Lapha lina ligcugcisa Sithole ngomsa wakho Nxa kushazwa kuluhlaza Sithole ngomsa wakho Siphe nkos’ siphe Nkos’ Isivuni esihle.

Nxa kufika ukuvuna

Sithole ngomsa wakho Nxa sithel’ ezulwini Sithola ngomsa wakho Sobonge sobonge Sibong’ umusa wakho.

Sibabaza onguYise noNdodana noMoya Ongcwele naphakade obuThathu eBunyeni somandla Somandla
nkosi yethu njalonje. Amen.

title: (Ibandla likakristu)
lyrics:
Ibandla likaKristu Elaqalwa nguye Walenza laba linye Ngezwi nangamanzi Wehlele ukulifuna Wenza labangcwele Walithenga ngegazi Wafa ngenxa yalo.

Libuthwe kulo lonke Nokho linye njalo Yiny’ iNkosi nokholo Muny’ umbhabhathizo Litus’ igama linye Lidla kudla kunye Libamb’ ithemba linye Ligcwel’ ubabalo.

Ababi balibona Bahleka usulu Bethi selahlukeni Kufundisw’ amanga iNkosi izakuza ilindw’ abangcwele kophela ukukhala kujatshulwe njalo.

Liyalwa lelibandla Lihlaselwa njalo Liqonda eZulwini Ekuphumeleni Liyobona iNkosi Lideliswe yiyo

Ibandl’ elinqobayo Liyakuphumula.

iNkosi isekulo Nalapha’ emhlabeni Kabahlukene nalo Asebephumule Bayadel’ abaNgcwele Siza Nkosi Jesu Sihlanganiswe nabo Ekuphumuleni. Amen.

title: (Hubanini bantu beNkosi uKristu)
lyrics:
Hubanini bantu beNkosi uKristu Nibonge yen’ owafela emthini wehlazo.

Maxhegu nabasha manimbonge nonke Kuhube isifazane kanye nesilisa.

Hubani nihamba niy’ endlini yakhe’ Nilituse khon’ igama lakhe eliNgcwele. Kanye nabaNgcwele nengelosi zonke Thathan’ ihubo nibonge nidumis’ uJesu.

Masivume sithi hosan’ haleluya
Kudum’ emhlabeni wonke ukuth’ uyiNkosi.


Makube sengathi kuduma ulwandle Benzenjal’ abasendule bethi Haleluya.

Hubani nje njalo uma niselapha Ebusuku nasemini noma kwenzenjani.

Nyathelani kanye kuhle kwamabutho Ningaphumuli kuze kuphume lon’ ilanga.

Uhambo lophela niyofik’ ekaya
Lapho nophumula khona eJerusalema.


Ngakhoke hambani mabutho enkosi Nibonga yen’ owafela emthini wehlazo.

Mawubongwe njalo Yise neNdodana
Nawe Moya oyiNgcwele okhuthaz’ abantu. Amen.

title: (Impi yakho Nkosi)
lyrics:
Impi yakho Nkosi Mayihambe kahle Ngaphambili kwayo Wena uyahamba Wena uyinkosi Usilonda Njalo Thina asesabi.
Ngesikhathi sempi.


Refrain:		Impi yakho Nkosi Mayihambe kahle Wena uyahamba Ngaphambili kwayo.

Iyakubaleka Eyesitha impi Thina siyahamba Sinethemb’ elihle AbaseGehenna Bayathuthumela Thina asihube Ngezwi elikhulu.

Refrain:	Impi yakho Nkosi
Mayihambe kahle Wena uyahamba Ngaphambili kwayo.

Sesikuyo thina Impi enamandla Singabafowabo
BabaNgcwele bonke Siyabambelelana Singumzimba munye Sithandana sonke Siyethemba njalo.

Refrain:	Impi yakho Nkosi
Mayihambe kahle Wena uyahamba Ngaphambili kwayo.

Amakhosi onke Angawiswa phansi Lingewe iBandla likaJesu Kristu impi eyengayo

khona isilinga siyethemba lona izwi lika Jesu.

Refrain:	Impi yakho Nkosi
Mayihambe kahle Wena uyahamba Ngaphambili kwayo.

Ngakho nin’ abantu Hlanganani nathi Ngezwi lokunqoba Hubelani kahle Kadunyiswe uKristu Oy’ iNkosi yethu Bonke bamdumise Abenziwa nguye.

Refrain:	Impi yakho Nkosi
Mayihambe kahle Wena uyahamba Ngaphambili kwayo.

title: (E! Bayede Nkosi yethu)
lyrics:
E! Bayede Nkosi yethu Wen’ okhona lapha Sesenza umkhosi manje Sikubonga ngawo.

Sibonga umusa wakho Osilonde ngawo
Ngayo yonke leminyaka Eyedlulileyo.

Sazalwa sisengozini Mgoba sonakele Kepha nokho wasibiza Sez’ ensindisweni

Wasizala futhi Baba EmBhabhathizweni Siyabonga ukwenziwa Abantwana bakho

Sangeniswa eBandleni Lelodlelo lakho

Osalusela kulona Singadliwa lutho.

Sathola eMqinisweni Amandl’ akho Nkosi Asiqinisel’ ukulwa Nempi yobumnyama.

Ngesinkwa somphefumulo Esakramenteni
Osipha ngothando Nkosi Siyabonga kuwe

O Nkosi akubusise Labantu bakho
Bonke abenza lomkhosi Bedumisa wena.

Siyacela kuwe Nkosi Uba wamukele
Yonk’ imikhuleko yethu Esiyenyusayo.

Busisa lendlu yakithi

Esisonta kuyo
Yenze ibeyindlu yakho Obusela kuyo.

Makufunyaniswe kuyo UMoya oNgcwele Ukuze badonseleke Kuw’ abantu bonke.

Bonke abaNgcwele bakho Mabasibambise
Nxa sizikhalele kuwe Ngezinswelo zethu.

Dumisanini-ke nonke Nina abaNgcwele Nibonge iNkosi yethu Nibongele nathi.

Sidumisa wena Baba Kanye neNdodana NoMoya wakho oNgcwele Nkulunkulu Munye.

title: (Jes’ unguMsindisi)
lyrics:
Jes’ unguMsindisi Sizwe sihuba Ngenhliziyo zethu Ngegama lakho Konke esinakho Kulethwa nguwe Singabakho Nkosi Samkele manje.

Sisondela manje Ngalelehubo Wena owazalwa Laph’emhlabeni Weza wahlupheka Wafa wavuka Waya eZulwini Usunqobile.

Usiphethe manje Ngomsa nothando

Sesiyathokoza Sikuhubela
Zonk’ izinhlupheko Seziphelile Sihlangana nazo Izingelosi.



Kade kwakumnyama Nasendleleni
Manje sekukhanya Ngethemb’ elihle Kuyabonakala Uthando lwakho Osithanda ngalo Selujulile.

Sekusile kithi Nasenhliz’ yweni Lizwakele izwi Lentethelelo Asesabi lutho Singabantwana Wena okhanyayo

Sikhanyisele.


Yamukel’ inkonzo Yenzelwa wena Vuma Nkosi yethu Nxa sibabaza
Nxa sesizakufa Usamukele Sibekhona kuwe Ophumuzayo

Siqondise Nkosi Indlela yakho Solandela ngayo Bonk’abangcwele Siyalangazela Ubuhle bakho Asiyikuyeka
Size sizuze.


Koba kuhl’ impela Kwedlule konke Uma sesifika Kuwo lomgomo

Lozwakala khona Lelo cilongo Nelezingelosi Lobonga njalo. Amen.

title: UJesu usabiza Bonk’ abakhatheleyo Uthi, mabeze kuye Ukuz’ abaphumuze Bonke abasindwayo Uzobethula yena Uma beletha kuye
lyrics:
Yonk’ imithwalo yabo.
Wozani nin’ enikhathele Wozani nin’ enisindwayo.

Wozani kimi nonke Enintumazelayo Ningayazi indlela Ukuthi ingakuphi Yimi engiyindlela
Hambani ngami ngedwa.
Wozani nin’ enikhathele

Wozani nin’ enisindwayo.


Wozani ekudleni Nonke enilambile Unesinkwa sezulu Asidlayo umuntu Athole ukuphila Wozani nizophuza Nina enomileyo Emthonjeni wegazi.
Wozani nin’ enikhathele Wozani nin’ enisindwayo.

Wozani nisondele Nonke enivumayo Akwenqatshwa noyedwa Ongifuna ngempela Woza wena namuhla Kusho uJesu, woza Musuzindela neze Sabela, woza manje.
Wozani nin’ enikhathele
Wozani nin’ enisindwayo. Amen.

title: Inxa ubusis’ abanye Musa ukungidlula Inhliziyo seyomile Nethisa umsa wakho.
lyrics:
Baba ungadluli kimi Geza umphefumulo Hawukele Nkulunkulu Khanyisa ubumnyama

Jesu ungadluli kimi Nginamathele kuwe Muhla ubabiz’ abanye Ungangikhohlwa nami.

Nawe, Moya oyiNgcwele Unamandla nesihle Ngiyaphuphutheka, siza Uvul’ amehlo ami.

Kade ngozelisw’ izono Ngaphambuka kaningi Inhliziyo yonakele

Nkosi ungilungise.


Thobis’ inhliziyo yami Ithobe njalo njalo Inxa ubusis’ abanye
Busis’ umoya wami. Amen.

title: Baba ngikunikela Nans’ inhliziyo yami Ngoba uyayifuna Leyonhliziyo yami.
lyrics:
Uthi ngiphe mntanami Leyo nhliziyo yakho Ungelingen’ izulu Uma wenqaba nayo.

Nansi Baba ithathe Ungaze wayenqaba Nom’ ingakufanele Siz’ ungathukutheli.

Yejwayel’ ukushinga

Nokuthanda okubi Iwundlwembe woqobo Ayinak’ ukulunga.

Yenza ikuthobele Ikuthambele njalo Ngize ngikuphilele Uhlale ungowami.

Icwilis’ egazini LikaJes’ uMsindisi Lelochib’eligeza
Bonk’ abaphendukayo. Amen.

title: Namhla niyabizwa nonke NgumSindisi onguKristu Oselokhu enibiza Usabiza nanamuhla.
lyrics:
Uthi wozanini nonke Nizokuzwa izwi lakhe Wozanini ningaphuthi

Niyabizwa ngumSindisi.


Akakhethi muntu yena Uthi wozanini nonke Nina zoni niphenduke Nibuyiswe nisindiswe.

Phangisani nize kuye Usanilindele nonke Nizozikhalela kuye Ukuba anikhulule.

Isikhathi siyadlula Kuza olokwehlulelwa
Phaphamani nina nonke Namukele umSindisi.

Khulekani eNkosini Ubaba uSimakade NoJesu oyiNdodana
Nay’ uMoya oyiNgcwele. Amen.

title: Isikhathi sifushane Zoni manilalele Iminyaka iyedlula Uzobhujisw’ melba.
lyrics:
Isikhathi sifushane Zoni maniphangise
Namhla niyabizwa nguye UmSindis’ onomusa.

Isikhathi sifushane Zoni manikhothame Niwe phansi immunise Ujesu umSindisi.

Isikhathi sifushane Ngabe nesabelani Manivume umSindisi Obemukela bonke. Amen.

title: Sengiphi lapha manje Sengize ngaba nje Sengimanikiniki Ngiphethwe indlala Ngixoshwa ibo bonke Engajabula ngabo.
lyrics:
Ngachitha ifa lami ElaseZulwini Ngamlahl’ uBaba wami Owab’ engithanda Ngidela lon’ ikhaya Ikhaya lokuthula.

Ngizophindela kuye Kusho inhliziyo Ngingebe yiNdodana Ngokuba ngonile Ngicela ukutholwa Ngoba yen’ unesihle.

Ekhaya likaBaba Indlal’ ayaziwa

Izisebenzi zakhe Nakhu ngiyabhubha Kudala engibiza Ngenqaba njalo mina.

Au Baba ngiyesaba Nokukubheka nje Ngonile phambi kwakho Phambi kwengelosi
Sal’ uman’ ungithola Ngibe isisebenzi.

Ngizosebenza Baba Ngithwel’ is’ phambano Sal’ ungithethelela Ngonile kuwena Ngithand’ ukukukhonza Nay’ umkhululi wami.

Nxa ‘sefiphal’ amehlo Ngibona lufifi
Ne’ nyawo zimakhaza Sengikhefuzela Ungamukele Baba

Ngas’ isihawu sakho. Amen.

title: Nkosi yami osithela Ngamazolo ezulu Abahlumelela bonke Abakomele Nkosi Minalo minalo Ngithele ngobabalo.
lyrics:
Kade ngakushiya Nkosi Ngokuhahel’ izono Ngahahela okuyize Shwele Nkosi ngetshathe Minalo minalo
Ngithwal’ ungisindise.


Jesu mawungangedluli Ngibheke kuwe wedwa Lapho usubiz’ abanye Ngibize nami futhi Minalo minalo
Ngibize ngomsa wakho.

Jesu uzungangishiyi Mini’ engiyisigqila
Kakh’ omunye umkhululi Obasizayo bonke
Minalo minalo
Ngisize ngomsa wakho.



Woza manje Moy’ oNgcwele Kim’ uqob’ serene Ngiyaphuphutheka Nkosi Ngivul’ amehl’ oMoya Minalo minalo
Ngivul’ amehlo Nkosi.


Baba ngiph’ uthando lwakho Ungigez’ emthonjeni Ophuma emanxebeni Ohlamb’ izoni zonke
Minalo minalo
Ngohlambe emthonjeni. Amen.

title: Bab’ owathum’ uJesu Ubazokuselusa Sibanxusela ngaye Sibanxusela ngaye Bonke abadukile
lyrics:
Babizwa nguwe Baba Bezwa-ke besabela Bafunda bemukelwa Bafunda bemukelwa Emhlambin’ oyiBandla.

Wabatholake Baba Ngoba bekuMsindisi Kwajatshulwa kwanjeya Kwajatshulwa kwanjeya Badlu’ ukudla kweZulu.

Bedukile bathunjwa Baphindel’ esonweni Manje bayizigqili Manje bayizigqili

Ibandla liyakhala.


Nkosi Bab’ onomusa Siyabakhulekela Bahawukele bonke Bahawukele bonke Ubaph’ ithemb’ elisha.

Siyakucela Baba Bavuse baphaphame Bavuleke amehlo Bavuleke amehlo Kuthamb’ izinhliziyo.

Baphenduke bagezwe Ngethethelelo yakho Babe yizimvu zakhe Babe yizimvu zakhe Umalusi uJesu.

Yikhona sokubonga Njalo Baba ngomusa Ophethe ngawo bonke Ophethe ngawo bonke

Lab’ obatholileyo. Amen.

title: (Ngifuna wena Jesu)
lyrics:
Ngifuna wena Jesu Ngigcwele izono Ingcolil’ inhliziyo Nguw’ ongangisiza Ngize ngihlabuluke Yigazi loMsindis Elihlanza izoni Ukuze sisinde.
Ngifuna wena Jesu Ngigcwele izono
Ingcolil’ inhliziyo Nguw’ ongangisiza.

Ngifuna wwena Jesu Wen’ uqobo lakho Onesihawu sonke Onomnak’ omkhulu Wen’ onozwelo lonke Noma ngidabukile

Ngingo khathazekile Ngibuuthakatha.
Ngifuna wena Jesu Ngigcwele izono
Ingcolil’ inhliziyo Nguw’ ongangisiza.

Ngifuna wena Jesu Ngeswele ngimpofu Ngihlong’onganozwelo Angelekelele
Ngifun uthando lwakho Llon’ olungembesa Lube wumholi wami Lungitotobise.
Ngifuna wena Jesu Ngigcwele izono
Ingcolil’ inhliziyo Nguw’ ongangisiza.

Ngifuna wena Jesu Ngiphe ngikubone Uhlezi ukhazimula Phezul’ ezulwini

Yikhona ngothokoza Nginab’ abakho bonke Sibheke wena njalo Nkosi, Nkosi yethu.
Ngifuna wena Jesu Ngigcwele izono
Ingcolil’ inhliziyo
Nguw’ ongangisiza. Amen.

title: (Nginezono eziningi)
lyrics:
Nginezono eziningi Ezihlupha umoya wami Ngiyadinga umkhululi Akhulul’ umoya wami Wena Jesu
Wena ongumsizi wami.


Wangithanda mina soni Wafa ngazi izono zami Uwe ongihlawulela Kusindisw’ umoya wami Wena Jesu
Wena ongumsizi wami.

Ukulunga anginakho Unobub’ umoya wami Thuma umlungisi wakho Alungisi umoya wami Wena Jesu
Wena ongumsizi wami.


Ngiyaduka endleleni Ngingaholw’ iNkosi yami Izwi lakho ngilibambe Liwuvus’ umoya wami Wena Jesu
Wena ongumsizi wami.


Ngoshonake masinyane Uyesab’ umoya wami Yiba nami ngibe nawe Khona ekufeni kwami Wena Jesu
Wena ongumsizi wami.

title: (Ngibuthiwe ngomsa wakho)
lyrics:
Ngibuthiwe ngomsa wakho Ngabanguye njalo njalo Ufakazi wakho, Jesu Ngith’ uKristu uyiNkosi

Ngoze ngife ngifakaza Ngawe wedwa, Kristu wami Sikhuleka kuwe wedwa Sithi uKristu uyiNkosi

Thath’ okwami kub’ okwakho Kubusiswe, kukhanyiswe Kuqiniswe kuqondiswe Kuth’ uKristu uyiNkosi.

Naw’ umzimba, nomphefumlo Nay’ ingqondo nenhliziyo Kufakaze ngize ngife
Kuth’ uKristu uyiNkosi.


Thatha nank’ umlomo wami Nal’ ulimi nezindebe
Konke okuphuma kimi

Kuth’ uKristu uyinkosi.


Lezizandla zangcweliswa Zize zikusebenzele Zikhuthale zishiseke Zith’ uKristu uyiNkosi.

Nokuzimisela kwami Kuqondiswe nguwe njalo Ngokukheth’intando yakho Kuth’ uKristu uyiNkosi.

Nay’ impahla ithabathe Wenz’ intando yakho ngayo Kufakaze konk’ okwami Kuth’ uKristu uyiNkosi.

Ngidumisa wena, Jesu Nay’ uYise, ebunyeni Buka Moya oyiNgcwele
Ngithi Kristu uyinkosi. Amen.

title: (Ngithembela kuwe Jesu)
lyrics:
Ngithembela kuwe Jesu Kuwena Nkosi
Nguwe ongisindisayo Ezonweni.

Ngithemb’ ukuthethelelwa Nguwena nkosi Ngiyethemb’ umassa wakho Ongapheli.

Ngithemb’ ukuhlanjululwa Ngegazi lakho
Elingenza ngibeNgcwele Ngib’ owakho.

Ngithemb’ ukuholwa nguwe Wen’ ungumholi
Zonke izinsuku zami Ngingaduki.

Ngithembela emandleni Angehluleki
Uma ngiqiniswa nguwe

Angesabi.


Ngithembela kuwe Nkosi Ungangilahli Ngithembela kuwe manje Naphakade. Amen.

title: Wena ozwela iziguli Zikhala ngobuhlungu Ziza kuwe zikwethemba Wen’ oyiNkosi yethu Siziletha phambi kwakho Uze uziphilise.
lyrics:
Zisahlushwa izinhlungu Zidinga ukwelashwa Zithemba amandla akho Nazi ziyakhuleka
Sizwe siziletha kuwe Wena ongumphilisi.

Vuma Nkos’ ukuba sonke Sikhuleke ngethemba

Ukuze ngokholo lwethu Sibaduduze bonke Abadinga induduzo Evele kuwe wedwa.

Ngakho makuxhoshw’ ukufa Ngawo amndla akho Kuphele zonk’ izinhungu Lapha emhlabeni Nkosi
Size sihlangane sonke Sibong’ amandla akho. Amen.

title: Wen’ olizwi lakho Lazosh’ ubumnyama Babaleka
lyrics:
Sizwe siyacela Ukub’ iVabgeli Liqede umhlaba Ngokukhanya.

Wena owalehta Ngamaphiko akho Ukuphila

Kwabagul’ umqondo Nabazimpumputhe Letha esintwini Ukukhanya.

Moya weqiniso Wen’ ongumphilisi Woza kithi Sebenz’ ebandleni Ngobabalo lwakho
Lakumnyama khona Ukhanyise.
Wen’ oNgcwelengcwele oziNgqobo ntathu oluthando awnamkhawulo ukwemboze konke ngobukhulu bakho makukhanye. Amen.

title: (Sinikela kuwe, Nkosi)
lyrics:
Sinikela kuwe, Nkosi Lon’ osithandwa sethu

Engowakho sebolekwa Manj’ ubuyele kuwe.

Yini lapho emi njalo Nabantu bayedlula Bay’ ezweni lokuphila Bayobona onguBaba.

Mfake kuleliyaviyo Elilandel’ imvana Licula icul’ Elisha Elabahlengiweyo.

Abamhlophe ngenhliziyo Bangababusisiwe, Ungowabo lowombuso Esiwethenjisiwe.
Akungeni ukungcola Ekhaya labangcwele Masigcinwe kokomhlaba Size sihlale naye.
Kadunyisw’ uNkulunkulu Osiphay’ asaphuce Ngokubona kwakhe njalo

Okusifaneleyo. Amen.


Refrain
Dumisani, dumisani Umnini-musa nimdumise Aleluya, aleluya Makubongwe uMsindisi!

351(Wen’ ongaphucile Nkosi)


Wen’ ongaphucile Nkosi Lon’ ebengmthanda Anginakh’ ukukusola Ngimnikela kuwe.

Inhliziyo ilusizi Ikhal’ isililo Inenxab’ elijulili Elimeminjunju.

Nalona osumthathile Akasiy’ owami Wawungetsheleke yena Manj’ usumthathile.

Zonk’ izinto zalomhlaba Akusis’ ezethu
Konke esithi ngokwethu Sikhuphathisiwe.

Ukhona ongumninizo Ozaziyo zonke Ngisho owazidalayo Nezikhona ngaye.

Nkosi ngiphe inhliziyo Engakhononiyo
Uma uthatha nantoni Oyisuse kimi. Amen .

title: (Aliphumi alishoni)
lyrics:
Aliphumi alishoni Ilanga kuKristu; Ubudlelwane bunye-zwi Obugcwel’ umhlaba.

Bonke abasemhlabeni

Bohlangana kuye Ngegoda lenkonzoi yakhe Eliboph’ isintu.

Bambanani, bazalwane Bezizwe ngezizwe; Lowo okhona uBaba.
Uzalana name.


Ayahlangana kkukristu, Amagumb’ amane; Abasemhlabeni wonke Bahlangana kuye. Amen.

title: (Jesu Mariya)
lyrics:
Jesu Mariya Mthombo wempilo Osukhona lapha eOltha lakho siyakudumisa mandl’ angapheli nom’ ufihlakele emehlweni ethu.

Bheka ngomsa Nkosi Imiphefumulo Yabafa bekholwa Asebekuwe
Balwa njalo lapha Baze badlula Manje’ imp’ iphelile Baph’ ukuthula.
Kade belimala Ngenkathi belwa Balaphe Nyangenhle Amanxeb’ abo Behlanze ubesule Bonke ububi Obungcolisayo Msindis’ omuhle.

Baphumuze Nkosi Emva kwalempi Ukhanyise imisebe Yezulu kubo Baholele kuwe Nkazimulweni

Laph’ ubukwa khona Ngabaphelele. Amen.

title: (O! Hamba kahle, sihlobo sethu)
lyrics:
Nakhu	sikhala	izinyembezi	sesibuhlungwini,	ngoba sesikwamukiwe;
Kepha	intando	kababa	wethu	mayidunyiswe	ngenkathi yonke.


O!	Hamba	kahle,	sihlobo	sethu;	usuphindela	lapho owathatshathwa khona.
Sal’ usulala la elibeni, uzee uvuke ngolokugcina.


Sesicelela	wena	sihlobo	kuNkulunkulu	onguMninimusa wonke;
Kakuhawukele akungenise ekekhanyeni kwasezulwini.


           355 (Ngathi ngisahamba emhlabeni) Ngathi ngisahamba emhlabeni,
Ngahlalelwa ithuna lami la Njengembali eqhakaza namhla, Ngakusasa isibune nya.

Ngokunjalo kwangizuma ukufa

Ngisemusha, ngiyingane nje; Kanti qhabo, ngiyaphila futhi, Ngishiyile umzimba wodwa la.

Sengiphiwe ukuhlala’ okuhle, La ukufa kwahluliwe nya; Sengibona iNkosi yaphezulu Kanye nengelos’ ekhaya le.

Ningakhali bazalwane bami, Sahlukene umzuzwane nje, Ezulwini sobonana futhi Zonke insizi seziphele nya.

title: (Wo ngobuhlungu benhlupheko)
lyrics:
Wo ngobuhlungu benhlupheko eMsindisi wami.
Mhla uzi dela nokuphila Ngosindiso lwami.
Wawukhathazwa ulinywazwa Ngobonganagni eNkosini Nginenalutho.

Zonke izon’engazenzayo, wangithwalela; onke amacal’ Enganginawo wangihlawulela. Wanyamazela uthulil, Ngobonga angani eNkosini ngingenalutho.

Wo ngobuhlungu bemivimbo owayithola; wo ngokusinda Komqamlezo owaluthwala; wangikhokhela inhlawulo, Ngobonga ngani eNkosini nginenalutho.

Wo ngobuhlungu benhliziyo usuyalela;
Woz’ ungesule inyembezi mhla ngiyalela. Inhlungu zami wozithalwa.
Ngobonga ngani eNkosini ngingenalutho.


Nkosi, icala lami linzima wongihawu’kela; woz’ ungibheke
Ngobubele	mhla	kwahlulelwa.	Wongamukela	ngomsa wakho.
Ngobonga ngani eNkosi ngingenalutho.

title: (Mawufik’ umbuso)
lyrics:
Mawufik’ umbuso Umbuso weZulu Washiy’ ubukhosi bakho Ub’ usikhulise Wazithoba wafa

Wanqoba isono Wavuka wakha umbuso oyiBandla lakho.

Mawufik’ umbuso Wande njalo, Nkosi Ikhuph’ impi yakho ilwe Nabayimpi kuwe Thumba zonke izizwe Ezingakukholwa Zingen’ eBandleni lakho Kwand umbuso wakho.

Mawufik’ umbuso Uwenz’ uphelele Um’ usunqobe izitha Ezalana nawe Ubabuthe bonke Abakhethiweyo
Uyenze yonk’ imibuso
Ib’ umbuso wakho. Amen.

title: (Siyakudla lapha)
lyrics:
Siyakudla lapha Kophel inhlupheko Siyeke ukukhaka Siye eZulwini.

Nxa singeniswa khona Ngodumo olukhulu Sokhululwa ekoneni Sibe nabangcwele.

Ngasilwa emhlabeni Nom imp’ ingahlehli Ngabelwa abeNkosi Nesitha sobuhle.

Ngasilwa singayeki Singabhek’ udumo Sophakanyiswa khona Siphile phakade.

Uyakuboanakala Esikholwa kuye

Bambone bonke abakhe Bajabule njalo.

iZulu liyakusa kuphela ubumnyama labo abamthandayo benziwe bakhanye.

Unkulunkulu wethu Onoms’ ongapheli Siyakumbona njalo Sinay’ embusweni

O! Lihle lelikhaya Labakhethiweyo O! lihle lelokhaya Esilifunayo.

Siyise kulo Jesu Uyosiphumuza
Wen’ odunyiswa lapha NasemaZulwini. Amen.

title: (Umuzi okhanyayo)
lyrics:
Umuzi okhanyayo Phezul’ ezulwini Ngingeze ngakubala Okuhle okukuwo Akukabonakali Okudlula wona Igama lalomuzi liJerusalema.

Kuyezwakala khona Indumis’ enkulu Zikhona izingelosi Bakhona ofakazi Bamfakazel’ uKristu Ngegazi nokufa Bakhona kuye manje Bakhanyiswe nguye.

Bayaphumula khona Abahluphekile iNkosi enomusa ibenzele idili

abanye ababelwa noSathane neyakhe bahuba manje bona bembesw’ okumhlophe.

Elabakhethiweyo Izwe laphezulu Bonk’ abalunguleyo Balethemba bethi Siyise khona Jesu Siyohlala nawe NoBaba othandayo
noMoya oNgcwele. Amen.

title: (Umuz’ ophezulu)
lyrics:
Umuz’ ophezulu Ngiyacula ngawo Ngilangazelela Wona mangifayo
Refrain:	Ngiyofika nini Nkosi Ngibon’ ubuso bakho na?

uJes’ usekhona

kulendawo enhle Ubongw’ ingelosi Wafa ngenxa yethu
Refrain:	Ngiyofika nini Nkosi Ngibon’ ubuso bakho na?

Bakhona abendulo Abathembe kuye Bayothokoziswa Basindisw’ ukholo
Refrain:	Ngiyofika nini Nkosi Ngibon’ ubuso bakho na?

Nab’ abaphostoli Baphakeme khona Bephakanyisw’ uye Kade bemlandela
Refrain:	Ngiyofika nini Nkosi Ngibon’ ubuso bakho na?

Bath’ abaPhrofethi ngempel’ uyokuza badlul’ engakezi sebembona manje

Refrain:	Ngiyofika nini Nkosi Ngibon’ ubuso bakho na?

Abafel’ ukholo Ngabafela kuye Manjena bakuye Bembethe okumhlophe
Refrain:	Ngiyofika nini Nkosi Ngibon’ ubuso bakho na?

Kade ngangihlezi Kuzo izinsizi
Ngiph’ amandla Nkosi Okuza kuwena
Refrain:	Ngiyofika nini Nkosi Ngibon’ ubuso bakho na?

title: (Zulu, khaya lami)
lyrics:
Zulu, khaya lami Uthandeka kimi Zulu khaya lami Ukhunjulwa yimi.

Zulu khaya lami Unemfuyo yami unoBaba wami uneNkosi yami.

Zulu Khaya lami Uyangithembisa Injabulo zakho Zinxanelwe yimi.

Ngizoshiya phansi Yonk’ imfuy yami Ngamukele kuwe Engenakuphela.

Lapha em hlabeni
Sithol’ ukudinwa Ngenxa yen hlupheko Kanye nezinsizi

Ngifis’ukubona Wena khaya lami Ngijabule njalo

Kumsindisi wami. Amen.

title: (Jerusalema khaya lam’ elihle)
lyrics:
Jerusalema khaya lam’ elihle Limnandi kimi ibizo lakho Kophela nin ukuhlupheka kwami Ngizothola kuwe intokozo.

Ngobona nin izindlu zaphezulu Namasango acwazimulayo Lezozinqaba eziqinileyo
Kanye nemigwaqo yegolide.


Bemi abaPostoli nabaFeli nabaProfethi bekak’ inkosi nabanye ababekuKristu lapha bayoba kanye nabo phezulu.

Jerusalema, khaya lam’ elihle Ngiyofika nini kodwa kuwe Kophela nin’ ukuhlupheka kwami Ngizothola intokozo kuwe.

Kristu, siza ungilungiselele Ikhaya lothando, nokukhanya Ukuze ngikubone ngikukhonze
Kanye nabo bonke abangcwele. Amen.

title: (Ngomuzi ophezulu)
lyrics:
Ngomuzi ophezulu Ngiyohlabelela Ngiyikuya khona Ekhaya nxa ngifa
Refrain:	ngiyofika nini Nkosi Ngibone ubuso bakho na?

Ujesu usekhona Kulendawo enhle Zimbong’ ingelosi Ofe ngenxa yethu
Refrain:	ngiyofika nini Nkosi Ngibone ubuso bakho na?

Bakhon’ abendulo Abathemba kuye Bathokoza manje

Sebesindisiwe
Refrain:	ngiyofika nini Nkosi Ngibone ubuso bakho na?

Nab’ abaPhstoli Baphakeme khona Ubakhanyisile Ngoba bamlandela
Refrain:	ngiyofika nini Nkosi Ngibone ubuso bakho na?

Bash’ abaphrofethi Impel uyakuza Bafa engakezi Manje sebembona
Refrain:	ngiyofika nini Nkosi Ngibone ubuso bakho na?

Babebambele Abafel’ ukholo Sebekkhona manje
Bembethe ezimhlophe Refrain:	ngiyofika nini Nkosi
Ngibone ubuso bakho na?

Ngisaphila lapha Ngihaqwe zinsizi Ngipha amandla Nkosi Ngisondele kuwe
Refrain:	ngiyofika nini Nkosi Ngibone ubuso bakho na? Amen.

title: (Likhona ikhaya)
lyrics:
Likhona ikhaya Elihle impela Alinanhlupheko Azikho nengozi.

Ukholo lufezwe Sibona ngamehlo Ukukhanya okuhle Kwakhon’ ezulwini.

Yek’ ukujabula Okungapheliyo Ukubiona invama

Eyafela thina.


Lindani bangcwele Nilande uJesu Uyena uqobo Oyonamukela.

Likhona ilizwi Elinokuthula Amahub amahle Ayahutshwa khona.

Kubalw’ amanxeba Asesemzimbeni Nok’ ukubabaza Ukunqoba kwayo.

Bhekani bangcwele Maningakwesabi Hambani ngendlela Eyahanjw’ uJesu.

Baning’ abangcwele Babonga uYise

Babong’ indodana noMoya oNgcwele.

Lindani bangcwele Nilindel’ uJesu Uyena uqobo
Onqobile konke. Amen.

title: (Ngothando lwakho Jesu)
lyrics:
Ngothando lwakho Jesu Ngamukele ngibhubha Amadlamb’ ayathanda Ukub’ angishonise Ngiza kuwe ngifihle Kuwo lomzumzu Nkosi Mangisondezwe kuwe Ngoba ngiqonde kuwe.

Anginakh’ ukusinda
Nxa ngingaphethwe nguwe Nakhu ngishona phanssi Yeluk’ asandla sakho

Ngithemba wena wedwa Ongumsindisi wami Ngivikele ungembese Ngamaphiko othando.

Umusa unandla Okungihlumbulula Ngigezwe emthonjeni Ukuze ngibe mhlophe Nkosi wen’ ongumthombo Ngalo igazi lakho
Ngihlale ngihlanziwe Ngiphile nawe njalo. Amen

title: (Kuyadlula isikhathi)
lyrics:
Kuyadlula isikhathi Bayadlul’ abakithi Name nawe siyolala Ngabny’ engcwabeni.

Siyolala thina sonke Masinyan’ elibeni Kuseduze ukushona

Kwethu thina sonke


Sibhekisa imphefumulo Kuwe owayidala Sisekhona isikhathi Sokufuna nawe.

Emsindisi wethu Jesu Owasifela sonke Usikhanyisele manje Into esiyiyo.

Guqula imvelo yethu Ngokulihlaziya kwakho Usilungisele indawo Ngoba wa thembisa.

Ngamandla akho sigcine Ungisishiyi Nkosi
Sense abantwana bakho Manje naphakade. Amen

title: (Phezulu ezulwini)
lyrics:
Phezulu ezulwini

Bayathokoza khona Bengasahlushwa lutho Awusiyise Jesu.

Ngoba abkhululiwe Ekethunjweni kwabo Sebephumule kahle Awusiyise Jesu.

Bonke sebenamile Ngenjabulo ekhona Enkazimulweni ykho Awusiyise Jesu

Nathi sobona khona Uthando lwakh’ oluhle Nakh’ ukulunga kwakho Awuyise Jesu.

Siyohlangana nabo Abasandulelayo Siyoba kanye nabo Awusiyise Jesu. Amen.

title: (NXA EBIZWA AMAGAMA)
lyrics:
Nxa ebizwa amagama elizweni laphaya, Ekuseni okungayikuhlwa, qha; Baphelele abeNkosi khona lapho ekhaya. Ngothi: Yebo Nkosi, nangu mina la.

Nxa ebizwa amagama, Nxa ebizwa amagama, Nxa ebizwa amagama,
Elizwen’elikhanyayo laphaya.


Ngalo lona lolusuku bevukile abeNkosi, Behlotshiswe ubukhosi bayo le;
Sebebuthwa abakhethwa bengeniswa ekhaya. Ngothi: Yebo, Nkosi nangu mina la.

E, mawushe umsebenzi yonk’imihla ngise la, Mangishumayele zona ezeNkos’!
Khona kothi nxa ngiqede, sengilizw’igama lam’ Ngothi: Yebo, Nkosi, nangu mina la.

title: (Nkosi moya Ongcwele)
lyrics:
Nkosi moya Ongcwele Vulaphakwathi kwethu Ukhany’ isinhliziyo Moya ongcwele.
Singcolile sigeze Siyagula silaphe Ngoba usithilole Sithokozise.

Thel’ ukuthula kwakho Njewawo amazolo Nqoba intando yethu Sithokozise.

Thath’ okwenkosi iKristu Sichasisele khona Sithandazele njalo Sithokozise.
Yebo sithandazele Usephakathi kwethu Usifundis’ impela Sothozise.

Sihambis’ endleleni Eyakhona ekhaya Khon’ eZulwini lakho Sithokozise. Amen.

             370 (Igama leNkosi liyiyo inqaba) Igama leNkosi liyiyo inqaba,
Ophephela khona uyakusindiswa Ohlezi kuyona akana kwesaba.
Nokuba umhlaba uzanyazanyiswa.


Abayokhulek’ egameni leNkosi Bayakusindiswa, uyasho umbhalo, Libongwe abantu, libongwe ingelosi! Alikho igama elihle njengalo.

Igama leNkosi linika amandla Liyawaqinisa amadolo ethu, Lisusa uvalo, linika inhlanhla, Liyasikhanyisa endleleni yethu.

Mhla ngiyakumuka, ngishiye lomhlaba, Igama leNkosi lithikithi lami;

Khona ngoyohamba , nginenakwesaba, Ngocasha kuJesu, enguMhlengi wami. Amen.

title: (Jesu sikhala kuwe)
lyrics:
Jesu sikhala kuwe Obusel’ eZulwini Sibekele indlebe Sizwe Sizwe Jesu.

Jesu owahlupheka Wezw’ obuhlungu ngathi Yizw’ umkhuleko wethu Sizwe Sizwe Jesu.

Ngesikhathi sosizi Belel’ eGetsemane AbaPhostoli bakho Sizwe Sizwe Jesu.

Ngalomkhuleko wakho Baba uma uthanda Dlulis’ isitsha kimi Sizwe Sizwe Jesu.

Ngokwanga komkhapheli Nokubhuqwa yizoni Ngolunya nokuboshwa Sizwe Sizwe Jesu.

Ngokuhlutshulwa kwakho Nokwabiwa kwengubo Nangonkatho lweyembe Sizwe Sizwe Jesu.
Ngokushayw’ imivimbo Nokubhinqwa ngengubo Nangomqhele wameva Sizwe Sizwe Jesu.

Ngolaka lwabaJuda Bakhetha uBharabha Badela wena Nkosi Sizwe Sizwe Jesu.

Ngenhlokom’ ebuhlungu Susa susa mbethele Nokuqond’ ekufeni Sizwe Sizwe Jesu.

Ngesiphambano sakho Nesitsha sokuphuza Iwayin’ elimuncu Sizwe Sizwe Jesu.

Ngokubethelwa kwahkho Nombhalo ophezulu Nobumnyam’ eGolgotha Sizwe Sizwe Jesu.

Njalo uma silingwa Nalapha sehluliwe Wen’ osisindisayo Sizwe Sizwe Jesu.

Ngamazw’ asikhombisa Nokugebis’ ikhanda Nangakh’ ukufa kwakho Sizwe Sizwe Jesu.

Sisashayw’ amadlambi Senze sibheke kuwe Usesiphambanweni

Sizwe Sizwe Jesu.


Gxilis’ ithemba lethu Size ekupheleni Sibin’ ubuso bakho Sizwe Sizwe Jesu.

title: Nkulunkul’ onguyise Nendodana eyodwa Nomoya oyingcwele Sizwe sikhulule
lyrics:
Jesu ongumsindisi Wen’ osimelelayo Wena ongumkhululi Sizwe nkosi Jesu

Owafa ngenxa yethu Wasinqobel’ ukufa Usisindisa manje Sizwe nkosi Jesu

Wen’ obonayo konke

Esikwenzayo manje Hlala usinxusela Sizwe nkosi Jesu

Wena osezulwini Uyasilungisela Ukuze sibe nawe
Sizwe nkosi Jesu. Amen.

title: Jesu sizwe sikude
lyrics:
Leth’ ukukhanya kwakho Kumnyama sidukile Sizwe ngomsa wakho.

Siphelelwe ngamandla Akakh’ ongangisiza Sibheke usisize
Sizwe ngomsa wakho.


Sicel’ amandla kuwe Okuyinqoba lempi Sizwe okuphilile Sizwe ngomsa wakho.

Sinike intobeko Efan nay’ eyakho Owanqoba isitha
Sizwe ngomsa wakho.


Khanyis’ izinhliziyo Ziphendukele kuwe Zigeze zibemhlophe Sizwe ngomsa wakho.

Sifundis’ usihole Siphe nentethelelo Siphumule sikuwe Sizwe ngomsa wakho. Masithandaze njalo Ngokukhuthala njalo Senze lokh’ okushoyo Sizwe ngomsa wakho.

Yenyus’ izinhliziyo Sifune okwezulu Sisa kuzo okubi
Sizwe ngomsa wakho.

Siza umoya wethu Ungedus’ okomhlaba Soqindis’ eZulwini Sizwe ngomsa wakho.

Sizokubona wena Nxa sesikhululiwe Siyothokoza njalo
Sizwe ngomsa wakho.

title: Baba wethu sikhanyise Uwavul’amehlo ethu Singampumputheki njalo
lyrics:
Siyancenga sizwe.


Bheka ngobunen’ izizwe Ezihlubukile kuwe Zifundise zilungise
Siyancenga sizwe.


Tshal’ imbewu yezwi lakho

Ensimini yalomhlaba Nxa isimilil’ ithele
Siyancenga sizwe.


Jesu wen’ owahlupheka Usikhiphe ebubini Usileth’ ePharadisi
Jesu Nkosi sizwe.


Akumenyezelwe kude Lokh’ osenzela kona Bonke bakuthande njalo
Jesu Nkosi sizwe.


Funa bonk’ abandingayo Ubaleth’ ekhaya kuwe Mawifik’ umbuso wakho
Jesu Nkosi sizwe.


Nkosi Moya oyiNgcwele Izwi malishunyayelwe Nguwe baphenduke bonke
Jesu Moya sizwe.

Philis’ inhliziyo zethu Sikhulule ekufeni Qinisa singakhathali
Nkosi Moya sizwe.


Nkulunkul’ ongubuThathu Yise Ndodana noMoya Vusa bonk’ ubaphilise
Siyancenga sizwe. Amen.

title: Nkosi yam’, ubungithanda Ekulahleni kwam’,
lyrics:
Nkosi yami, walandela Futhi emkhondweni wam’ , Ngafunyanw’ iNkosi yam’ Ngafunyanw’ iNkosi yam’

Nkosi yam’, ilizwi lakho Lona inkanyiso yam’, Nkosi yam’, umusa wakho Uyinjabuliso yam’, Ngibusiswa, Nkosi yam’.

Nkosi yam’, umoya wakho Uyangigcwalisa nam’, Nkosi yam’, izulu lakho Lona lilikhaya lam’,
Mangingene, Nkosi yam’. Amen.

title: Muz’ omuhle waphezulu (4) La’ kuvela ukuthula
lyrics:
Muhle ngokunqabileyo Muzi oweNkosi yethu Zinhle indumiso khona Kudumis’ abaprofethi.

Koze kube nini Khona Kuhutshwa u Haleluya Ngoba khona akupheli Ukubongwa kuka Kristu Konke kuhle kuyingcwele Okungaphakathi kwawo.

Khona akuveli ifu

Elisithe okukhona Kusemininjalo khona Kukhanyisa okwelanga Khon’ akuhlwi akulalwa Ngoba khon’ akuhlushekwa.

Yek’ ubuhle nobukhosi Lomzinjan’ oyokuthola Usuvathisiwe kanje Sewuphila uqinile Unamandla ujabula Kuze kube naphakade.



Yenamake ungesabi Uwuthwal’ umuthwalo wakho Kuze uWethule wena Ungathol’ umvuzo wakho Ezulwini laphakade Wembesiwe ubukhosi.

Bonga ubabaz’ uBaba Nayo futhi iNdodana Nay’ uMoya Oyingcwele

Be uNkulunkulu Munye Ozinqobo ezintathu
Kuze kube naphakade. Amen.

title: Izipho zika Krist’ ezimakade Ezibabaz’ abapostoli Masizibonge silihlabelele Igama lethu elethabisayo.
lyrics:
Ngoba yiwo amakhos’ aBandla Beyizinduna zempi yalo Bengamaqhawe asezulwini Beyisimbaqa zikhanyis’ umhlaba.

Okwabo ukukholwa kwabangcwele Nethemb’ elihle elithi nqo Lugcwel’ uthando luka Kristu kubo Lona lusahlul’ isitha sethu.

Kukhanya Kub’ udumo Luka Yise Bayenz’ intando yendodana Bayethabis’ uMoya oyiNgcwele NeBandla lonke elisezulwini.

Sicela Nkosi Wena ongumhlengi Ukuba Usihlanganise
Naba Postoli abakukhonzayo Sihlezi nabo kuwe njalo. Amen.

title: Isiboniso sakho Mbhabhadisi Masikukhuze Thin’ esibongayo Ukuthi sifanele ukulahla
lyrics:
Izimo zethu.


Bheka iyeza ingelos’ enkulu Iza kuyihlo imaziz’ igama
Lelo elakho ngobukhulu bakho Ishumayela.

Nxa anabas ngezwi alizwile Wasehlelwa isijeziso Esamthulisa akangakhuluma
Uze uzalwe.


Yek’ injabulo eyayizwakala Konina abangcwele ababili

Lapho uxhuma uyibingelela Inkosi yakho.

Usengumfana wawukhulakahle Wawunamandla emoyeni wakho Waze wabonakala KubaJuda
Uhlez’ ehlane.


AbaProfethi lab’ abasendulo Bamemezel’ uKuza Komahluli Uwena owashumayel’ ukuthi
UngumSindisi.


Akukh’ omkhulu Kunom bhabhadisi Oke wazalwa lapha emhlabeni Wayefanele ukumbhabhadisa
Ongenacala.


Izingelosi ‘zonke ziyabonga Wen’ oButhathu obuseBunyeni
Nathi sicela Nkosi ngomsa wakho Usisindise. Amen.

title: O, Mbusi onamandla O, Nkosi yeqiniso Ukuphenduka konke Kuvela kuwe Nkosi.
lyrics:
Uwen’ owenz’ ukuba Kukhanye ekuseni Kushise nasemini Kwenziwa nguWe konke.

Bhubhisa konk’ okubi Okuphakathi kwethu Noma kukhon’ inkani Nezinkanuk’ ezimbi.

Sindisa imizimba Thulis’ izinhliziyo Usiphe lokh’ okuhle Esingephiwe muntu.

Makube njalo Nkosi Okhona njalonjalo Uyise neNdodana
NoMoya oyiNngcwele. Amen.

title: Siyakudumisa Baba wethu
lyrics:
Ngakho konk’ okuhle kwanamuhla Ebusuku, Nkosi, usibheke,
Sibe phansi kwamaphiko akho.


NgeNdodana yakho thethelela Konk’ okubi esikwenzileyo Masilale namhla sithokoza Thina nabo bonk’ abantu bakho.

Masihambe singakwenz’ okubi Ukuze sife singesabi lutho Noma sifa masivike ngaWe Sijabule ngomhla wokuphela.

Siyacela kuwe Baba wethu Sehlisele ubuthong’ obuhle Size siwathol’ amandl’ amasha Okukhonza Wena sivukile.

Siyabonga Wena, Nkosi Baba Nay’ uJesu iNdodana yakho

Nay’ uMoya wakho oyiNgcwele Nkosi inye njalo naphakade. Amen.

title: Bhek’ ibuhlungu inhliziyo Izwa iminjunju eshisayo
lyrics:
Amehl’ ampomoz’ inyembezi Awu Nkosi yam’.

Umoya wam’ udungekile Umphefumulo uyazula Usiz’ lungicindezela
Awu Nkosi Siza.


Ngiswele ongangiduduza Athob’ umoya wami lo Sondela Kimi Nkosi yami
Ungidududze.


Uyahlulek’ umoya wami ‘Kuthwala lokh’ okusindayo Kuminziwe ukwazi kwami
Nkos’ uphi na?

Angithweswanga nguwe na? Lesisiphamban’ esibuhlungu Sondela wena Ungisize
Awu Nkosi yam’.


Ngiyeza kuwe Nkosi yami Ungishayile kubuhlungu Thumel’ umoya wakho kimi
Ungiphilise.


Nomake Nkosi senginjenje Ngingasento yalutho nje Ngisa khasela kuwe Nkosi
Awu Kristu Jesu.


Ngicela kuy’ uBaba wami NoJesu umsindisi wami NoMoya onguMthokozisi
Onkosi inye. Amen.

title: Simakade! OnguMenzi! Senzwa nguwe sonke
lyrics:
Uyasiza Unamandla Usigcina sonke.

Ebusuku nasemini Siyabhekwa nguwe Siyamba siyalala Siyagcinwa nguwe.

Zonk’ izinto esinazo Sizamkele kuwe Sinokudla nezivatho Siyagcinwa nguwe.

Nezincwadi zokufunda Siziphiwa nguwe
Nab’ abasifundisayo Bayothunywa nguwe.

Nkosi! Siyamangaliswa Ububele bakho
Nkosi! Siyakudumisa Ngokugcina kwakho. Amen.

title: Masingabe sisakhala Liyingcwele leli liba
lyrics:
Alleluya.


Ofileyo uzovuka Limlindil’ iKhaya lakhe
Alleluya.


Siphe Kristu, nxa sifayo Sihlangane nalomntwana
Alleluya.


Usiphakamise nathi Sikubonge njalo njalo
Alleluya. Amen.

title: Jesu ngokuthanda kwakho Ngamukele ngingabhubhi Amadlambi ayathanda
lyrics:
Ukungishonisa ngife Vuma ngizifihle kuwe Ngisahamba lapha Nkosi Ngize ngingeniswe nguwe Lapho sengiqonda khona.

Anginakho ukusinda
Inxa ngingaphethwe nguwe Ungayeki funa ngife Kodwa ngiluleke njalo Ngiyethemba wena njalo Anginakusizw’ omunye Ngivikele ungembese Ngamaphiko njengenyoni.

Unomusa unamandla Okuhlambulul’ abakho Mangigezwe emthonjeny Ngibe mhlophe ngaphakathi Ungumthombo wena Nkosi Ngiyakugezeka kuwe Hlanza inhliziyo yami
Ube khona kimi njalo. Amen.

title: Umkhululi wethu Ufikile kithi Inhliziyo zethu Mazethabe namhla Umkhululi ufikile Izwi lakhe lizwakele.
lyrics:
Masethabe sonke Ebusweni bakhe Sibuyele kuye Ngokubiza kwakhe Umkhululi ufikile Izwilakhe lifikile.

Siyafunwa nguye Wasihlawulela Ngakho asethabe Nge’ nhliziyo zethu Umkhululi ufikile Izwilakhe lizwakele.

Uyasitshengisa Wonk’ umusawakhe

Uyasibizela Ezulwini lakhe Umkhululi ufikile
Izwi lakhe lizwakele. Amen.

title: Asi sekhaya lapho Idlula iminyaka
lyrics:
Siyakulala nabo abalele elibeni Ngilungisele Nkosi usuku olukhulu NeGazi lakho ungigeze ungithethelele.

Ashona amalanga Kubuye kube mnyama
Siyakukhanyiselwa njalo lingashon’ ilanga Ngilungisele Nkosi usuku olukhulu NgeGazi lakho ungigeze ungithethelele.

Makhulu amadlambi Iwon’ a’ zinhlupheko
Siyakuhlala kahle kuthulile ezulwini Ngilungisele Nkosi usuku olukhulu NgeGazi lakho ungigeze ungithethelele.

Sahlukaniswa lapha Nabafo nezihlobo
Siyakuhlanganiswa nabo lapho eNkosini Ngilungisele Nkosi usuku olikhulu NgeGazi lakho ungigeze ungithethelele.

Se ezakuza yena Owafa osekhona
Oyakusamukela sibusisiwe nguye njalo Ngilungisele Nkosi usuku olukhulu
NgeGazi lakho ungigeze ungithethelele. Amen.

title: Sisize Jesu Nkosi Nkulunkulu Wen’ ongamandla wen’ osezulwini Thin’ abancane nje sibheke kuwe
lyrics:
Siyakhuleka.


Kukhulu lokhu esikucelayo Samkele nkosi noma sibancane Ungadeleli izmi lezingane
Ezicelayo.

MaKuthandeke Kuwe ukumisa UmBuso wakho manje emhlabeni Abantu bonke mabangene kuwo
Bakulalele.


Siphe ukwazi wena sikuthande Sibonge Wena njalo makwenziwe Okuthandwa nguwe emhlabeni
Njeng’ ezulwini.


Bonakalisa ezizweni zonke Ukusindisa kwakhobathokoze Bazi ukuthi wena wabafela
Wabasindisa.


Ziyadumisa wen’ izingelosi Owazithoba wehla ezulwini Wahlala kubo abakuzondayo
Bakubethela.


Thin’ esilapha nabo bonk’ abantu Masihlangane nazo sikubonge Sikudumis’ owahlatshelwa thina
Owasivusa.

Shesha uBuse ezinhliziyweni Zabantu bonke bakuthande Nkosi Ngokub’ umbuso ungowakhonjalo
Kube phakade. Amen.

title: (Indaba Yesiphambano)
lyrics:
UMBUZO
Yen’ odlulayo lapha nguban’ na? Bheka ingubo zakhe zinegazi.

Uthwesw’ isiphambano esiMsindayo Nangu ewile esaphum’ emzini?

Nampaya sebehamba beya phambili Se ephunyuzwe ngomthwalo wakhe.

O, baya ngaphi na nomuthi lowo? Yen’ obethwala won’ Ubani na?

IMPENDULO
Hamb’ umlandele Yena laph’ eyakhona OyiNdodana kaNkulunkulu.

Wen’ oMthandayo, yima uMbhekisise Yen owahluphekayo ngenxa yakho.

Nxa sikhumbul’ indaba yosizi lwakhe Mawufundisw’ isiphambano sakhe.

Ungebubone na ubuhle bakhe? Yen’ obethelwe ngokuthanda thina.



INDABA YESIPHAMBANO
Ngibheka kuwe Jesu ofel’ emthini Uhluphekela mina Nkosi yami.

Ameva akuhlaba nezipikili Sophelw’ igazi lakho thin’ abantu.

Ayicameli ndawo inhloko yakho Icansi lakho lingumuthi lowo.

Izandla nezinyawo zinamanxeba Ohlangothini lwakho ugwaziwe.

Wehlelw’ o ubumnyama kusesemini Zonk’ izihlobo zakho zimi kude.

Ukhala kabuhlungu ukhathazeke Uthwel’ umthwalo wezono zami.

Uhlekw’ umphangi lowo ofayo nawe Balake ukwenzela mina lokhu.

Bakhala labo abathiw’ abakho Bengasondeli kuwe bebuka kude.

Ngibon’ igama lilotshiwe emthini “uJesu wase Nazareth” oy’ Nkosi.

Wo uboneni Nkosi kimina na? Lokhu uhlupheka ufela mina. Amen.

IZWI LIKAJESU
Wen’ engikuthengele ngosizi lwami Ngiz’ ukukubiza uze ezulwini.

Ngakubona ulahleke ukude nami Ngiyakufuna wen’ uhlale nami.

Lakophel’ iGazi lami ngisho wen’ uqobo Ngeza kukuthenga ngalo ube ngowami.

Ungakhaleli mina O’ Mntwana wami Zama ukufika kimi ezulwini.

UKUVUMA KWETHU
Ngokulandela wena Msindisi wami Ngingeze ngakushiya nasosizini.

Emangithwale nam’ isiphambano sami Ak’ int’ enkulu, inxa ngihlala nawe.

Nxa ungivuma Nkosi ngibe ngowakho Kakho engiyokumthanda kunawe.

Ngiphe ngisekhona lapha ngihlale nawe Ngize ngithokoze nawe naphakade.

INDABA YESIPHAMBANO
Izindaba ezingcwele eziyi 13 ezakhethwa Ngu Dominiki oNgcwele, zakhethwa abesikolo sakubo ukuba bacabange ngazo futhi futhi bakhuleke kuNkulunkulu.

title: UGabriele washo ku Maria Wath’ EMaria wenobusisiwe “Inkosi iyeza kuwe uzothiwa”
lyrics:
“Ngunina wakhe ongu Nkulunkulu.


Chorus: Sibonga Nkos’ ukuzithoba kwakho Ukuba wab’ umntwana ngenxa yethu Sibonga Wena ngokomBuso wakho Ezimi kuwo njal’ izingelosi.

title: uVisitation
lyrics:
Wath u Elizabetha ku Maria Ngehlelwa ngan’ lokhu ukuba eze Kimi uNina wakhe oyiNkosi Nomntwana wami uyambingelela.

Chorus:

title: Christmas
lyrics:
Bayethe Wen’ olele emkhombeni Bayethe Wena waseBethelehema E Ngane kaMaria: Simakade Sibonga Wena Mninimandla onke.

Chorus:

title: Purification
lyrics:
Bayeth oyisw’ eThempelini lakho Bayeth’ obingelelw’ uSimione
U Ana uyamazi uMesia
Watshel’ abanye ngobukhosi bakho.


Chorus:

title: Ukufundiswa kuka Jesu eThempelini
lyrics:
Bayethe Kristu sikubona wena Okwazi konke ngobu Nkulunkulu Ufana nath’ ufunda izincwadi Ukhula nangomzimba nangenqondo

Chorus:

title: Ukuhlupheka kuka jesu eGitshemane
lyrics:
Bayethe! Jesu wen’ osensimini Wathwala amacala onke ethu Sibong’ igazi ojuluka lona
Siyezw’ amazwi othandaza ngawo.


Chorus:

title: Ukushaywa kuka Jesu
lyrics:
Lithini’ igazi lelo elophayo? Ithini nimivimb’ ashaywe ngayo?
Waboshelwani? Waboshelwa thina Washaywa ngani na? Ngezono zethu.

Chorus:

title: Ukuthukwa kuka Jesu
lyrics:
Sibon’ ameva angumqhele wakho Nohlanga lol’ oluthi’ “uyiNkosi”, Siyezw’ abantu abahleka bethu ‘Bayethe Nkosi, Nkosi yabaJuda.

Chorus:

title: Ukuhamba kuka Jesu Pambano
lyrics:
Uthwel’ isiPhambano kabuhlungu; Siyakubon’ Uhamba endleleni Siyezw’ amazwi abaKuzondayo; Sibon’ izinyembezi zabafazi.

Chorus:

title: Ukufa kuka Jesu esiPhambanweni
Ukuvuka kuka Jesu kwabafileyo
lyrics:
Bayethe! Uvukile kwabafayo, Sibon’ ituna, itshe lisusiwe; Siyezw’ amazwi engelosi ithi “NiMfunelan’ iJesu elibeni?”

Chorus:





                391 (Ngingowakho, Jesu) Ngingowakho, Jesu wami ngingowakho njalo Ngingehlukaniswe nawe noma ngisa hamba.

Anginakumnik’ omunye inhliziyo yami Ngeka Jesu yena yedwa /kuze kube nini.

Jesu Nkulunkulu wami Hlala nami njalo Ngibe yisithandwa sakho/ manje naphakade.

               392 (E Jesu Mhlengi wethu) E Jesu Mhlengi wethu igama lakho lihle Lavela ezulwini limnandi kithi sonke
Alikh’ elinye futhi elihle njengelakho Yilona nje kuphela esinga sinda ngalo.

Ngegama lakho Jesu kuguqa phansi konke Kutusa ubukhosi nobungqongqoshe bakho Liyisihlangu sethu esingavika ngaso
La sihlaselwa impi ka sathan’ elwa nathi.


Limnandi igama lakho lihlab’iNkosi umxhwele Ingasinika konke nxa siyincenga ngalo Nasekufeni kwethu solulanyiswa yilo
Igama lakho Jesu Msindisi wethu sonke.





         393 (Nkosi Baphe Umphumulela Wafuthi) Nkosi baphe umphumulela wafuthi x2
Nkosi mabaphumule ngobuhle.


Bakhanyisel’ ukukhanya okunaphakade

Mabaphumule ngobuhle x2.Amen.

lyrics:

         Ikhorusi 16 (Jabulani Sesingabantwana) Jabulani sesingabantwana
Abenkosi sesingofakazi Silubonga loluthando baba Umsindisi wethu sesimazi.

Bazalwane masiyephambili Sizohlangabez’ umyeni wethu Siyoholwa umoya oyiNgcwele

Sizonqoba ngay’ iNkosi yethu.


Uy’ uKristu owanqoba ukufa Nay’ umnini kufa wakwahlula Wavuka ethuneni alleluia Imivalo yonke wayaphula.

Nant’ ithemba labo abendulo Balibheka selaphuma obala Njengelanga lona liphezulu Ngob’ uJesu ulibo lokuqala.

Jesu Kristu ulithemba lethu Nokuthula uyasipha khona Nefa lethu ligciniw ezulwini
Lingethintwe amaselakhona. Amen.






Chorus 17 (Kanye nawe Nkosi)


Namhla ngiyaqhutshw umoya Kuthandaza Nkosi yami

Ngiyacela mangihambe Kanye nawe nkosi yami.

kanye nawe Nkosi yami X2 mangihamb’ imhla yonke Kanye nawe Nkosi yami.

Angifisi yona imfuyo Mayiphel’ intando Mangihambe mina kodwa Kanye nawe Nkosi yami.

kanye nawe Nkosi yami X2 mangihamb’ imhla yonke Kanye nawe Nkosi yami.

Angifisi yon’ imfuyo Ize kimi Nkosi yami Ngicebile ke kakhulu Nxa ukimi Nkosi yami.

kanye nawe Nkosi yami X2 mangihamb’ imhla yonke Kanye nawe Nkosi yami.

Noma indlela inohlupho Noma inde Nkosi yami Noma iya eGolgotha Ngiye nawe nkosi yami.

kanye nawe Nkosi yami X2 mangihamb’ imhla yonke Kanye nawe Nkosi yami.

Lilungile ijoka lakho Awuhluphi umthwalo wami Ngiyabonga ngisahamba Kanye nawe Nkosi yami.

kanye nawe Nkosi yami X2 mangihamb’ imhla yonke Kanye nawe Nkosi yami.
Amen.

PHEZULU E NKOSINI


Phezulu eNkosini Bangabangcwele bodwa Phezulu ezulwini
Kuhlal’ imhlophe yodwa.


Ofun’ ukuya khona Makazikhulekele Alungiselwe lona UMoya oyingcwele.

UJesu wasifela Kuphel’ icala lethu Iz’ ithi ibengcwele Imiphefumlo yethu.

Sithi, manxa sidliwa Ukufa emhlabeni Singabi – nakwaliwa Ukuya ezulwini.

BANOKUTHULA ABANGCWELE
Banokuthula abangcwele Nxa bemuka lapha Akukho okubethusayo Enhliz’ yweni yabo.

Banefa bona lapho ezulwini Beqond’ ekhaya lapho eNkosini.

INkos’ iyabalungisela Khon’ ekhaya labo Ingukukhanya kwalo yona Izohlala nabo.

Bazakumbona uMkhululi Owabafelayo
Bazomdumisa, bazomkhonza Yen’ obathandayo.

Baphiwa bona ukunqoba Akungen’ uvalo Bajabula njalo Basekubusisweni bona.

KHAY’ELIHLE, KHAYA LAMI


Khay’ elihle, khaya lami, Mangingene esangweni; Mangiziphumuze kuwe, Khay’ elihle, Khaya lam’.

Kade ngangizulazula, Ngingabon’ ubuhle bakho; Sengifuna ngokufisa Ngikubone, khaya lam’.

Kunenhlanhla kuwe, khaya! Alusekho ulusizi; I’nyembezi ziyasulwa, Khay’ elihle, khaya lam’.

Abalambi abakithi, Abasomi, abasweli; Bayaluswa oyiMvana, Sebekuwe, khaya lam’.

Sengiyezwa ubumnandi

Obuvela kuwe, khaya; Ngizongena masinyane, Khay’ elihle, khaya lam’.

WE, NHLIZIYO YAMI


We, nhliziyo yami, Mawuhlakaniphe; Zikuhaq’ izitha zakho, Zivukela wena.

Linda uthandaze, Ungayek’ ukulwa;
Cela ngezinsuku zonke, ENkosin’ amandla.

Ungalahli wena, Izikhali zakho; Ekufeni uzoqeda Umsebenzi wakho.

NGIYAMUZWA U MSINDISI
Ngiyamuzwa uMsindisi Engibiza ngimlandele, Ethi, unqamlezo lwami
Ngiluphathe, ngimlandele la.


La engiholela khona,
Ngomusa wakhe ngomlandela la.


Ngomlandel’ eGetsemane, Nasekuhlephekeni, Nasekudelelweni,
Ngomsa wakhe ngomlandela la.


Ngomlandel’ ekunqunyweni, Ngomlandel’ ekubhinqweni, Nasekubethelweni,
Ngomusa wakhe ngomlandela la.


Wonginika umusa wakhe, Ngoqinisw’ amandla ache, Wonginika nobukhosi, Angishiye? Phinde, khona la!

LAPH’ I ZIVUNGUVUNGU
Laph’ izivunguvungu Zifus’ impilo yami, Nobubi budlangile, Umlingi esenqoba.

     Ungikhumbule, Nkosi yam’, Ungikhumbule, Nkosi yam’.

Lapho ngiwel’ ulwandle, Lukhuz’ ulaka lwalo, Laph’ izingozi zalo Zisong’ ukungigwinya.

Lapho izono zami, Zinzim’ emphefumlweni, Zisuse, wena Baba; Ngothual ngomsa wakho.

Lapho imihla yami Incipha emhlabeni, Mangikubone, Nkosi, Ngikhuphukele kuwe.


BAMBA ISANDLA, BABA
Bamba isandla, baba, nxa ngingedwa, Inzima, ifiphel’ indlela yam’,
Bamba isandla; khona ngingesabe, Noma kumnyama lapha Nkosi yam’.

Bamba isandla, ngingumntwan’ omncane, Ngingazi ukukheth’ indlela yam’;
Bamba isandla uma ngikhathele, Funa ngiwele phansi, Nkosi yam’.

Bamba isandla, Baba, ngithokoza Ngisizwe son’ isandla sakho, Nkos’; Bamba isandla, ngiyathol’ amandla Uma ngikwazi useduze, Nkos’.

Bamba isandla lapho ngisondela, Ngishone emfuleni, Msizi wam’; Bamba isandla, ngifika ekhaya, Ngibon’ ubuso bakho, Jesu wam’.

NGIYAKUDUMISA


Ngiyakumdumisa UMkhululi wam’; Uyangisindisa Ezonweni zam’; Uyangethabisa’ Enhliz’yweni yam’; Ngakho ngomdumisa UMkhululi wam’.

Ngangibambekile Ecaleni lam’; Ngangilahlekile Ebubini bam’; Wawusewufile Umphefumlo wam’; Uwuphilisile
Wena, Nkosi yam’!


Sengihlezi ngaye Umkhululi wam’; Sengihamba naye Endleleni yam’;

Usesezulwini, Ngiya khona nam’; Ngoba – sebomini NoMkhululi wam’.

LOWO MUNT’ UYABUSISWA


Lowomunt’ uyabusiswa, Ongahambi nabonayo, Ongahlal’ esihlalweni Sabo abanengekayo.

Uyathanda imithetho KaJehova onguMenzi; Ungumuthi othelayo Izinhlamvu eziningi.

Abonayo bayafana Namakhoba emoyeni; Kepha abasoze bema Nama Kristu ekwabeni.

UJehova uyathanda Izindlela zokulunga; Amashinga ayahamba Endleleni ebhubhayo.



JESU, NGIYAKUTHANDA

Jesu, ngiyathanda, ngiyaz’ ungowami, Sengishiy’ izono nokwenama kwezwe; Muhleng’ onomusa, O Msindisi wami, Inxa ngakuthanda kukhulu manjena.

Ngikuthanda ngokuba usungithandile; Wangihlwawulela ezonweni zami; Ngothando wathwala umqhele wameva, Inxa ngakuthanda, kukhulu manjena.

Ngokuthanda ngikhona, nokuba sengifa, Ngobonga selokhu ngihamb’ emhlabeni; Ngiyoth’ ekufeni komzimba lo wami, Inxa ngakuthanda, kukhulu manjena.

Khona ezigodlweni zeNkosi yezulu, Ngomtusa ekhaya elimi phakade; Ngohuba nomqhele ekhanda kimina, Inxa ngakuthanda, kukhulu manjena.
MAWUNGANGIDLULI, JESU


Mawungangidluli, Jesu, Yizw’ amazwi am’;

Lapho ubabiz’ abanye, Mawungizwe nam’.

Jesu, Jesu, yizw’ amazwi am’ Lapho ubabiz’ abanye, Mawungizwe nam’.

Isihlalo esomusa, Ngikusona nam’; Ngiguqile, ngingumoni, Ungisize nam’.

Ngokulunga kwakho kodwa, Ngiyacela nam’;
Ungelaphe ngaphukile, Ngisindise nam’.

Ungumthombo wakho konke, Nokuphila kwam’;
Ezulwini nasezweni, Yikho konk’ okwam’.

WE BANGCWELE

Thina silindel’u suku, olukhulu

Lokubuya kukaJesu O Lapha bangcwele
Beyothweswa ,o imiqhele… Halleluya! Oyeki’ntokozo , yokwazana Nayu’Jesu, oh thina sise la Oyeki’njabulo, injabulo
O Yabangcwele, o yabangcwele.


Webangcwele , ikhoni’njabulo Ebekelwe amaqhawe
Hawu Ngisho nezembatho Ezimhlophe, zicolekile…Halleluya! O yeki’ntokozo , yokwazana
Nayu Jesu, oh thina sise la O yeki’njabulo, injabulo
O Yabangcwele, o yabangcwele.


We bangcwele ikhoni’njabulo Uma singena
Ekhaye’zulwini
Sekuyophakama, izidalwa o namalunga…Halleluya! Oyeki’ntokozo , yokwazana
Nayu’Jesu, oh thina sise la Oyeki’njabulo, injabulo

O Yabangcwele, o yabangcwele.

Yifune Inkosi


Yifune iNkosi ekusithekeni,
Uhlolwe nguJesu, usemthandazweni, Ulalele kahle ‘kunyenyeza kwakhe, Ezintweni zonke buz’intando yakhe.

Ubamb’isikhathi, ngoba siyadlula, Uhlale noJesu la kunokuthula, Ubike kuyena konke ukuswela, Nangomcebo wakhe uyakwenezela.

Libala noJesu, ngoba nxa umbuka, Yonk’ im’hambo yakho iyakuguquka, Ukuba ilunge, ifane neyakhe, Nabantu babone uhambis’okwakhe.

Hamba-ke noJesu, yen’uyakuhola, Nalokhokuhola ungabokusola.
Umlandel’ eduze ezinyathelweni, Umdumise njalo nasenhluphekweni.

Ube-nokuthula ngasemphefum’lweni, Yonk’ imicabango efik’ enhliz’weni,

Ibuswe nguMoya okaNkulunkulu, Uzolungiswelwa inkonzo phezulu.

Sinomhlobo OnguJesu


Sinomhlobo ongu Jesu, Unothando; Akanjengeminy’im’hlobo, Unothando;
Akanayo injabhiso, Akanayo inkohliso, Uyasiza ngeqiniso; Unothando.

Ungumhlobo weth’uJesu, Unothando; Akadel’abantu bakhe, Unothando;
Ubahola endleleni, Ubagcina engozini; Unothando.

Sezomuka emhlabeni, Wabathanda;

Seyekhona ezulwini, Ubathanda; Ubalungisela khona, Uyabahlalela bona,
Wobamkela bonke khona, Ngal’uthando.

Nina niyamdinga yini? Unothando;
Kade nihlupheka yini? Unothando; Kungezono zenu yini? Enilahlwa ngazo yini? Wonikhipha kuzo yena, Unothando.

Loluthando, hawu, lukhulu, Siyabona;
Masimthande ‘he kakhulu, Osithanda,
Ngalo masihambe sonke; Ngalo sokwahlula konke; Luyadlu’olunye lonke, Loluthando.

Ikhaya Elihle


Yek’ ikhaya elihle nantiya! Silibona ngamehl’ enhliziyo, Masinyane siyakulishiya Izwe elingajabulisiyo.

Khaya lam’ lihle hle, Ngaphesheya kwethuna ngale! Khaya lam’, lihle hle, Ngaphesheya kwethuna ngale!

Sizombona uJesu phezulu, Nabalwile, benqobe ukona, Basilangazelela kakhulu, Ngokukholwa sesiyababona.

Bonke abanethemb’ elinjalo, Bayazihlambulula impela; Bayalahla izono nem’thwalo, Nakho konk’ okubabambezela.

Ngomsindisi owasifelayo,

Singangena ekhaya phezulu, Thina sonke esimlandelayo, Siyothol’ intokozo enkulu.

Thula Nya!

title: Nkosi, ubhek’ isiphepho Namaza agubuzayo,
lyrics:
Nezulu seliguqubele, Amukho osisizayo.
Nkosi, senga’ ungavuka, Usisindise thina;
Ngokuba nguwen’ uSomandla Onakho okusigcina.

Nang’ olalelwa amaza la, Thula nya! Thula nya!
Noma ulwandl’ olugubayo, Nom’ amademoni alingayo, Kungesishonis’ isikhebhe le, EsinoSomandla phakathi-ke; Uyalalelwa umoya la,
Thula nya! Thula nya! Uyalalelwa umoya la,

Thul’ uthi nya!

title: Manje osizini lwami Ngikhala nje kuwe, Nkosi, Uvuk’, uphuthum’, ungisize, Ngokuba ngesab’ ingozi. Naz’ izilingo ezombi Zihluph’ umoya wami, Ngiyafa, ngiyafa, ngisize, Ngihleng’ ebubini bami!
Sesithulil’ isiphepho, Lilihle-ke manj’ izulu, Ilanga libukw’ emanzini, Ikhon’ intokoz’ enkulu. Ungangishiyi ngedwa, Hlal’ esikhebheni sami, Ukuze ngifik’ ezulwini, Itheku lethemba lami.
lyrics: Bala Izibusiso Zakho

title: Mhla ukhathazeka emhlabeni la, Udiniwe, aphelil’ amandla nya,
lyrics:
Bal’ izibusiso, aziningi na?

Bong’ iNkosi ngazo, Ungasoli, qha!


Bal’ izibusiso zakho-ke, Uzibale-ke ngazinye, he! Bala phela, aziningi na?
Bong’ iNkosi ngazo, ungasoli, qha!

title: Uthwesiw’ umthwalo osindayo na? Siyasind’ isiphambano sakho la?
lyrics: Bal’ izibusiso zakho, qina ngo; Khona wobalul’ umthwalo wakho, bo.

title: Nxa ubon’ abanye benemfuyo he, Bhek’ imfuyo, yakho e phezulu le.
lyrics: Bal’ izibusiso, yeka, zihle hle! Ifa ligcinelwe wen’ ekhaya-ke.

title: Impi isashisa, qina uthi ngo, Ungesabi, nang’ uJes’ unawe, bo! Naz’ izingelosi zokuphatha-ke, Zokuyisa kahl’ ekhaya lakho le.
lyrics: UJESU ULIDWALA

title: UJesu ulidwala lam’, Umpheme wokuphephela. Nguyena oyinqaba yam’, Umpheme wokuphephela.
lyrics: UJesu ulidwala ehlane la, Ehlane la, ehlane la, UJesu ulidwala ehlane la, Umpheme wokuphephela

title: Emini ulithunzi lam’, Umpheme wokuphephela. Empini usihlangu sam’, Umpheme wokuphephela.
Esivunguvungwini la, Umpheme wokuphephela. Ngihlezi ngiyahuba, ha, Umpheme wokuphephela.
‘Lidwala lami liqina, Umpheme wokuphephela. Othembayo kajabhi, qha! Umpheme wokuphephela.
lyrics: BUYA, MNTWANA

title: Wen’ ondinda kude phandle kwesibaya, Yizwa izwi lithi: Buyel’ ekhaya!
lyrics:
Buya, mntwana, buya, Ubuyel’ ekhaya!
Mus’ ukulibala, Buyel’ ekhaya!

title: Izwe osukulo, linendlel’ enkulu, Woza ekudleni kombus’ wezulu!
Shiy’ indlela embi ephambukisayo, Kuyo unosizi oluhlabayo.
Wena usathandwa, uhlalelw’ ekhaya, Sebekubhekile abalaphaya.
lyrics: WEBANI, YIZWA!

title: Webani, yizw’ indaba yami: Ngangisekulahleken’,
lyrics:
Kodwa wehla uMhlengi wami, Wangikhipha ekufen’.

LoMhlengi ungubani na? NguJes’, amukh’ omunye, qha! Wenzani na? Wehla wafa,
Uphi namhla? Wavuka, ha! Usesimel’ ezulwini.

title: Wabudel’ ubukhosi bakhe, Wehla wafa emhlaben’,
lyrics: Igam’ elingu Jesu Kristu, Malibongwe ezizwen’.

title: Lendaba isahamba njalo, Ivus’ abasekufen’,
lyrics: Yebo, ivez’ imvuselelo, Isiqhuba endlelen’.

title: Wena-ke, woz’ uzinikele
lyrics:
Usabizwa, vuma he!
Nawe uthole nans’ inhlanhla, Usindiswe namhlanje.

MINA NGINGUMNTWANA

title: Mina ngingumntwana, Kodwa sengizwile
lyrics: Ngaye uJehova, Yen’ osenzileyo; Futhi ngitsheliwe Abafundisayo NgoMsindisi wethu Owasifelayo.

title: Sengibusisiwe Kun’ ensaph’ ezinye; Kuhle mangilunge Njeng’ abantu bakhe. Ngiyakulalela Abazali bami, Ngimuthand’ uThixo Ngenhliziyo yami
Ngiyakuthandaza Ngamasuku onke; Okungafanele Ngokunqaba konke. Thixo, ngibusise Ngobusiso lwakho, Ngihambise kahle Endleleni yakho.
lyrics: WANGITHAND’ UJESU LO

title: Wangithand’ uJesu lo, Kush’ incwadi njalo-bo, Ngiyingane yakhe-nje, Anginaw’ amandla, qha.
lyrics: Yebo, uJesu uyangithanda, Uyangithanda, incwadi isho la.

title: Wangithand’ uJesu lo, Wawuvul’ umnyango lo; Wazigez’ izono zam’, Ngongeniswa khona nam’.
Wongithand’ uJesu na? Uyohlala nami la?
lyrics:
Uma ngimuthanda-nje, Wongiyis’ ekhaya le.

KHUMBULA IKHAYA LAPHAYA

title: Khumbula ikhaya laphaya, Koba-mnandi kakhulu kunala, Babuthen’ abangcwele kulona, Abembeth’okumhloph’ okuthe qwa! Laphaya, laphaya,
lyrics: Khumbula ikhaya laphaya.

title: Khumbul’ izihlobo laphaya, Ezahamba zangena ezulwin’, Sezigwaba igama leWundlu, Ziphumule zisenjabulwen’. Laphaya, laphaya,
lyrics: Khumbul’ izihlobo laphaya.

title: Khumbula uJesu laphaya, Nabakithi asebekhona le; Senginas’ isizungu sakhona, Sengikhohlwa usizi lwala. Laphaya, laphaya,
lyrics: Khumbula uJesu laphaya.

title: Masinya ngofika laphaya, Masinyane ngibone abam’;
lyrics:
Sebefike balinda ekhaya, Sebelinda ngofikake nam’. Laphaya, laphaya Masinyangifika laphaya.

Thula Nya!

title: Nkosi, ubhek’ isiphepho Namaza agubuzayo,
lyrics:
Nezulu seliguqubele, Amukho osisizayo.
Nkosi, senga’ ungavuka, Usisindise thina;
Ngokuba nguwen’ uSomandla Onakho okusigcina.

Nang’ olalelwa amaza la, Thula nya! Thula nya!
Noma ulwandl’ olugubayo, Nom’ amademoni alingayo, Kungesishonis’ isikhebhe le, EsinoSomandla phakathi-ke; Uyalalelwa umoya la,
Thula nya! Thula nya!

Uyalalelwa umoya la, Thul’ uthi nya!

Ngangisekulahleken’,

Let Us Break Bread Together


Let us break bread together on our knees; Let us break bread together on our knees.
When I fall on my knees,
With my face to the rising sun, O Lord, have mercy on me.

Let us drink wine together on our knees; Let us drink wine together on our knees.
When I fall on my knees,
With my face to the rising sun, O Lord, have mercy on me.

Let us praise God together on our knees; Let us praise God together on our knees.
When I fall on my knees,
With my face to the rising sun, O Lord, have mercy on me.


Great Is Thy Faithfulness


GREAT is Thy faithfulness, O God my Father, There is no shadow of turning with Thee;
Thou changest not, Thy compassions they fail not, As Thou hast been Thou for ever wilt be.

Great is Thy faithfulness! Great is Thy faithfulness!
Morning by morning new mercies I see;
All I have needed Thy hand hath provided, - Great is Thy faithfulness, Lord, unto me!

Summer and winter, and spring-time and harvest, Sun, moon and stars in their courses above,
Join with all nature in manifold witness To Thy great faithfulness, mercy and love.

Great is Thy faithfulness! Great is Thy faithfulness!
Morning by morning new mercies I see;
All I have needed Thy hand hath provided, -

Great is Thy faithfulness, Lord, unto me!


Great is Thy faithfulness! Great is Thy faithfulness!
Morning by morning new mercies I see;
All I have needed Thy hand hath provided, - Great is Thy faithfulness, Lord, unto me!

Pardon for sin and a peace that endureth,
Thine own dear presence to cheer and to guide; Strength for to-day and bright hope for to-morrow, Blessings all mine, with ten thousand beside!

Great is Thy faithfulness! Great is Thy faithfulness!
Morning by morning new mercies I see;
All I have needed Thy hand hath provided, - Great is Thy faithfulness, Lord, unto me!

Ikhaya Elihle


Yek’ ikhaya elihle nantiya! Silibona ngamehl’ enhliziyo, Masinyane siyakulishiya Izwe elingajabulisiyo.

Khaya lam’ lihle hle, Ngaphesheya kwethuna ngale! Khaya lam’, lihle hle, Ngaphesheya kwethuna ngale!

Sizombona uJesu phezulu, Nabalwile, benqobe ukona, Basilangazelela kakhulu, Ngokukholwa sesiyababona.

Bonke abanethemb’ elinjalo, Bayazihlambulula impela; Bayalahla izono nem’thwalo, Nakho konk’ okubabambezela.

Ngomsindisi owasifelayo,

Singangena ekhaya phezulu, Thina sonke esimlandelayo, Siyothol’ intokozo enkulu.



Umhlobo Wami

title: Sewakhile enhliz’weni, Umhlobo wam’.
lyrics:
Nguy’ omkhul’ ezihlotsheni, Umhlobo wam’.
Ngoba nguy’ owangimela, La’ ngilahlwe ngokwempela, Ngal’ uthando wangifela, Lomhlobo wam’.

title: Wabe kad’ engithandile, Umhlobo wam’.
lyrics:
Ngisenguye omdelile, Umhlobo wam’.
Nxa ukona kwami kwanda, Weza yena wanginqanda, Ngisemubi wangithanda, Umhlobo wam’.

title: Wazisus’ izono zami, Umhlobo wam’.
lyrics:
Na’ izinyembezi zami, Umhlobo wam’.
Nxa ngiduka endleleni, Unyenyeza enhlizi’weni, Ungivusa emoyeni, Umhlobo wam’.

title: Uyathwal’ umthwalo wami, Umhlobo wam’.
lyrics:
Uthi, wongithwala nami, Umhlobo wam’.
Wayehlatshwa njengemvana Az’ angenz’ owakh’ umntwana. Yek’ inhlanhla yokwazana Nomhlobo wam’.



Ngino Jesu

title: Thatha konke, nginoJesu, Konk’ okuny’ indiva nje;
Thatha konke, nginoJesu, Ngukuphila kwami la;
lyrics: Nxa ekhon’ uJesu wami, Angisweli lutho qha.

title: Thatha konke, nginoJesu, Unganele mina la;
lyrics: Nxa nginaye la empini, Ngokunqoba konke nya.

title: Thatha konke, nginoJesu, Engimethembayo, he. Masinyane wongibiza, Ngiyohlala naye le.
lyrics: Thula Nya!

title: Nkosi, ubhek’ isiphepho Namaza agubuzayo,
lyrics:
Nezulu seliguqubele, Amukho osisizayo.
Nkosi, senga’ ungavuka, Usisindise thina;
Ngokuba nguwen’ uSomandla Onakho okusigcina.

Nang’ olalelwa amaza la, Thula nya! Thula nya!
Noma ulwandl’ olugubayo, Nom’ amademoni alingayo, Kungesishonis’ isikhebhe le, EsinoSomandla phakathi-ke; Uyalalelwa umoya la,
Thula nya! Thula nya! Uyalalelwa umoya la, Thul’ uthi nya!
