lyrics:
Uvuk’, uphuthum’, ungisize, Ngokuba ngesab’ ingozi.
Naz’ izilingo ezombi Zihluph’ umoya wami, Ngiyafa, ngiyafa, ngisize, Ngihleng’ ebubini bami!

title: Sesithulil’ isiphepho, Lilihle-ke manj’ izulu, Ilanga libukw’ emanzini, Ikhon’ intokoz’ enkulu. Ungangishiyi ngedwa, Hlal’ esikhebheni sami, Ukuze ngifik’ ezulwini, Itheku lethemba lami.
lyrics: Bala Izibusiso Zakho

title: Mhla ukhathazeka emhlabeni la, Udiniwe, aphelil’ amandla nya,
lyrics:
Bal’ izibusisso, aziningi na?
Bong’ iNkosi ngazo, Ungasoli, qha!

Bal’ izibusiso zakho-ke, Uzibale-ke ngazinye, he! Bala phela, aziningi na?
Bong’ iNkosi ngazo, ungasoli, qha!

title: Uthwesiw’ umthwalo osindayo na? Siyasind’ isiphambano sakho la?
lyrics: Bal’ izibusiso zakho, qina ngo; Khona wobalul’ umthwalo wakho, bo.

title: Nxa ubon’ abanye benemfuyo he, Bhek’ imfuyo, yakho e phezulu le.
lyrics: Bal’ izibusiso, yeka, zihle hle! Ifa ligcinelwe wen’ ekhaya-ke.

title: Impi isashisa, qina uthi ngo, Ungesabi, nang’ uJes’ unawe, bo! Naz’ izingelosi zokuphatha-ke, Zokuyisa kahl’ ekhaya lakho le.
lyrics: UJESU ULIDWALA

title: UJesu ulidwala lam’,
lyrics:
Umpheme wokuphephela. Nguyena oyinqaba yam’, Umpheme wokuphephela.

UJesu ulidwala ehlane la, Ehlane la, ehlane la, UJesu ulidwala ehlane la, Umpheme wokuphephela

title: Emini ulithunzi lam’, Umpheme wokuphephela. Empini usihlangu sam’, Umpheme wokuphephela.
Esivunguvungwini la, Umpheme wokuphephela. Ngihlezi ngiyahuba, ha, Umpheme wokuphephela.
‘Lidwala lami liqina, Umpheme wokuphephela. Othembayo kajabhi, qha! Umpheme wokuphephela.
lyrics: BUYA, MNTWANA

title: Wen’ ondinda kude phandle kwesibaya, Yizwa izwi lithi: Buyel’ ekhaya!
lyrics:
Buya, mntwana, buya, Ubuyel’ ekhaya!
Mus’ ukulibala, Buyel’ ekhaya!

title: Izwe osukulo, linendlel’ enkulu, Woza ekudleni kombus’ wezulu!
Shiy’ indlela embi ephambukisayo, Kuyo unosizi oluhlabayo.
Wena usathandwa, uhlalelw’ ekhaya, Sebekubhekile abalaphaya.
lyrics: WEBANI, YIZWA!

title: Webani, yizw’ indaba yami: Ngangisekulahleken’,
lyrics:
Kodwa wehla uMhlengi wami, Wangikhipha ekufen’.

LoMhlengi ungubani na? NguJes’, amukh’ omunye, qha! Wenzani na? Wehla wafa,
Uphi namhla? Wavuka, ha! Usesimel’ ezulwini.

title: Wabudel’ ubukhosi bakhe, Wehla wafa emhlaben’,
lyrics: Igam’ elingu Jesu Kristu, Malibongwe ezizwen’.

title: Lendaba isahamba njalo, Ivus’ abasekufen’,
lyrics: Yebo, ivez’ imvuselelo, Isiqhuba endlelen’.

title: Wena-ke, woz’ uzinikele Usabizwa, vuma he!
lyrics:
Nawe uthole nans’ inhlanhla, Usindiswe namhlanje.




MINA NGINGUMNTWANA

title: Mina ngingumntwana, Kodwa sengizwile
lyrics: Ngaye uJehova, Yen’ osenzileyo; Futhi ngitsheliwe Abafundisayo NgoMsindisi wethu Owasifelayo.

title: Sengibusisiwe Kun’ ensaph’ ezinye; Kuhle mangilunge Njeng’ abantu bakhe. Ngiyakulalela Abazali bami,
lyrics: Ngimuthand’ uThixo Ngenhliziyo yami.

title: Ngiyakuthandaza Ngamasuku onke; Okungafanele Ngokunqaba konke. Thixo, ngibusise Ngobusiso lwakho, Ngihambise kahle Endleleni yakho.
lyrics: WANGITHAND’ UJESU LO

title: Wangithand’ uJesu lo, Kush’ incwadi njalo-bo, Ngiyingane yakhe-nje, Anginaw’ amandla, qha.
lyrics: Yebo, uJesu uyangithanda, Uyangithanda, incwadi isho la.

title: Wangithand’ uJesu lo, Wawuvul’ umnyango lo; Wazigez’ izono zam’, Ngongeniswa khona nam’.
Wongithand’ uJesu na? Uyohlala nami la?
lyrics:
Uma ngimuthanda-nje, Wongiyis’ ekhaya le.



KHUMBULA IKHAYA LAPHAYA

title: Khumbula ikhaya laphaya, Koba-mnandi kakhulu kunala, Babuthen’ abangcwele kulona, Abembeth’okumhloph’ okuthe qwa! Laphaya, laphaya,
lyrics: Khumbula ikhaya laphaya.

title: Khumbul’ izihlobo laphaya, Ezahamba zangena ezulwin’, Sezigwaba igama leWundlu, Ziphumule zisenjabulwen’.
lyrics: Laphaya, laphaya, Khumbul’ izihlobo laphaya.

title: Khumbula uJesu laphaya, Nabakithi asebekhona le; Senginas’ isizungu sakhona, Sengikhohlwa usizi lwala. Laphaya, laphaya,
lyrics: Khumbula uJesu laphaya.

title: Masinya ngofika laphaya, Masinyane ngibone abam’; Sebefike balinda ekhaya, Sebelinda ngofikake nam’. Laphaya, laphaya Masinyangifika laphaya.
lyrics:
Esiphambanweni


Entaben’ ekude kwem’ isiphambano. Esinobuhlungu nehlazo; Ngisithanda sona, ngob’ uJesu wami Wabathelwa kuso ngenxa yam’.

Ngakho ngisibabaza sona, Ngize ngibeke phans’ umthwalo,
Ngizobambelella kusona Ngize ngizuze umqhele wam’.

Leso siphambano esadelwa yizwe. Siyangimangalisa njalo.
Ngoba ngenxa yaso ‘Jesu weza lapha Asithwalele eGolgotha.

Esiphambanweni l’oph’ igazi lakhe. Elimangalisayo kimi.
Ngoba ngenxa yami ‘Jesu wafa khona. Angithethelel’ angihlanze.

Esiphambanweni ngiyakuqinisa Ngithwal’ ihlazo ngenjabulo; Wongibiza mina khona ekhaya lam’ Angiqhelise ngomqhele wam’.

ICULO LEBANDLA

title: SIDUMISA WENA NKULUNKULU ; SIVUMA UKUBA WENA UYINKOSI

SIYAKHOLWA UKUBA UYAKUZA: UBENGUMAHLULELI WETHU

lyrics:
28. NKOSI SENGITHEMBELE KUWE: MANGINGAJABHISWA NAPHAKADE

TO GOD BE THE GLORY!

To God be glory ! Great things He hath done; So loved He the world that He gave us His son; Who yielded His life an atonement for sin
And opened the life gate that all may go in.


REFRAIN:
Praise the Lord , praise the Lord! Let the earth hear his voice:
Praise the Lord, praise the Lord! Let the people rejoice:
O come to the father , through Jesus the Son , And give Him the glory ;
Great things He hath done!

title: O perfect redemption , the purchase of blood! To ev’ry believer the promise of God;
lyrics:
The vilest offender who truly believes,
That moment from Jesus a pardon receives.


REFRAIN:
Praise the Lord , praise the Lord! Let the earth hear his voice:

Praise the Lord, praise the Lord! Let the people rejoice:
O come to the father , through Jesus the Son , And give Him the glory ;
Great things He hath done!

title: Great things He hath taught us, great things He hath done; And great our rejoicing through Jesus the Son;
lyrics:
But purer , and higher, and greater will be Our wonder , our rapture , when Jesus we see.

REFRAIN
Praise the Lord , praise the Lord! Let the earth hear his voice:
Praise the Lord, praise the Lord! Let the people rejoice:
O come to the father , through Jesus the Son , And give Him the glory ;
Great things He hath done!


Jesus, My Lord, My God, My All
Jesus, my Lord, my God, my all! How can I love Thee as I ought? And how revere this wondrous gift, So far surpassing hope or thought?

Refrain:
Sweet Sacrament, we Thee adore!
Oh, make us love Thee more and more. Oh, make us love Thee more and more.

title: Had I but Mary's sinless heart
lyrics:
With which to love Thee, dearest King, Oh, with what ever fervent praise,
Thy goodness, Jesus, would I sing!
Refrain

title: Thy Body, Soul and Godhead, all! O mystery of love divine!
lyrics:
I cannot compass all I have,
For all Thou hast and art is mine!
Refrain

title: Sound, then, His praises higher still, And come, ye angels, to our aid;
lyrics:
For this is God, the very God
Who hath both men and angels made!
Refrain


This is a beautiful classic Catholic hymn, used by the universal Church for countless decades. It expresses the deepest sentiments of love and piety, but with a dignity and reverence

that is seldom found in modern hymns. It is still sung today in many conservative or traditional Catholic circles.

NOTE: There is more than one melody for this beautiful hymn. There is the melody shown below, but also a MUCH BETTER one which ChantCd.com does not have in scanned (electronic) form. It can be found in many older hymnals, however.
